Description: 02/20/2024 HDA JKG. Sailor came to desk expressing that he finds it extremally deceptive of virgin to be charge 200$ for each device for internet. HDA explained to the sailor this is not necessary as 1 premium can fit 2 devices. The sailor was not sure if the purchase had to be purchased for the cabin too. HDA informed the sailor a report will be logged and management will be requested to remove the charge. Apologies were expressed. Issue number two he is here with a group here for a friends 60th. sailor was at a bar in the corner on deck 7, they were having drinks there, spending a lot of money. The sailor ordered a round of drinks and when the drinks came they were asked to please leave there was an activity that the ship was hosting that was about to take place. They got no notice or respectfully asked to move with the assistance of offering them another area to continue their drinks and chill at. Issue no. Two. Their frend drinks a specific beer. they were told that the bar was out of this beer however when he requested this in another area the bar had it. he questioned the barman regarding this and was disappointed by the answer he received. why is there a difficult for another bar to assist the bar with the sailors request. The bar man explined this in more detail. Then in Bimini the same thing happened to the sailor there being "apparent" no supply. he ordered a bucket of beer on the island and was told they do not do buckets. he as then told the be he requested was OT of stock on the whole island they only have 2 more to provide, only to find out later the that the bar at the entrance had a full fridge of the desired beer. The sailor expressed that he does not appreciate being deceived and miss treated. He is requesting things he is happy to pay for however the customer service is poor and the information given is incorrect. And being lied to is not fair. The sailor has requested to see a manager from the bar team. They have dinner 6pm and then a show. HDA informed the sailor that we will reach out through the cabin phone or message on SQ.
Resolution_Details: 02/21 HDM OM: The package is refunded

Description:
Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae at 6:30 PM and were seated on time. After few minutes and after the server approached the table to give water and menus, sailor approached the desk to ask if she was going to have a dedicated server, RS explained that the SV will do his best to guide them through the experience but he will divide his time equally with the other tables/ 
Same sailor confirmed during taking the order she has shellfish allergy, she just came to GB for the chicken nuggets, which unfortunately are cross contaminated as fried in the same oil of the "hot bar". 
Sailor didn't have anything else and she left before RM could approach her, RM spoke to the rest of the party which reassure that she was fine and she left because of a personal issue. RM still sincerely apologies for the inconvenience. 
RM asked RS Jake to check where the sailor went for dinner, Sailor went to eat in Razzle,RM contacted RS Razzle to have him apologize on our behalf but the sailor already left.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Having cruised with the company over the summer (Departure port: Athens) we were excited to come back. We are highly disappointed in this experience. Knowing we booked this cruise last minute (due to personal schedule) we haven’t been able to make any dinner reservations. We had success one night to make a “waiting list” at razzle dazzle, but were told by every other restaurant that they were booked for the week. This is unacceptable for the money paid and the experience that’s advertised.  It has made dinner a stress and unenjoyable. With this in mind, we went from raving about virgin to probably not sailing again with the company.
Resolution_Details: 02/20 HDM OM: RS Nadia assisted the sailors with their dinner reservations SC-35434746787999342

Description: There was an issue on kitchen expo today during brunch service that caused main courses to be late; Sailors were approached by RS Bart to check if everything is ok- they said that their mains are late; while RS Bart was checking on the food ETA Sailors left in the meantime;
Latest_Comment: RS Bart messaged Sailors via Virgin App to offer apology for the inconvenience; Sailors' booking for the night was identified and RM Bruno went to Pink Agave to speak to Sailors; they were offered an apology and complimentary first round of drinks; Sailors very much appreciated the gesture

Description: There was an issue on kitchen expo today during brunch service that caused main courses to be late; due to delay Sailors left the venue before the main courses were served;
Resolution_Details: Sailor did not have a dinner booking for tonight however was seen in RD; he was approached by RS Bart and offered an apology for the earlier inconvenience; he inquired about availability of muffins served in the morning and was informed that unfortunately they are only served for breakfast; RM Bruno was called to speak to a Sailor about the incident and offer an apology; RS Bart went to pastry department and organized the pastry the Sailor asked about- Sailor was very appreciative of the gesture; he mentioned that he will be back tomorrow for breakfast- the booking was made for him;

Description: waiting time for omelet 40 minutes.
Resolution_Details: RM Sara deeply apologies, offer a glass of honey bubble and delivered the meal personally. Sailor was happy with the resolution

Description: There was an issue on kitchen expo today during brunch service that caused main courses to be late; Sailors were approached by RS Bart to check if everything is ok- they said that their mains are late; Sailors were offered an apology and were offered drinks, however they refused; mains were delivered shortly after;
waiting time for omelet 40 min
Resolution_Details: RM Sara deeply apologies, speed up the order and offered a glass of mimosa. Sailor was happy with the resolution.

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 3

Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 3

Resolution_Details: 02/22 HDM OM: HDM sent an apology message to the sailor for the challenges the sailor faced during embarkation day

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 1
Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 5
Q: Check in process?, A: 3
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Your app is complete garbage. We pay $1000 plus dollars for a cruise and have to fight your app to book anything. I had to go to customer service three times for issues with your app. It would not even play the safety video. Next up I bought one drink at the bar with no issues and then when I order a second one I’m told that I have to go back to customer service for a fourth time because there is a problem with my account. I’ve sailed on Norwegian three times and it was some of the most relaxing trips I’ve ever had.  I had nothing but complete stress the first two hours I was on this ship due to your technology failures. There is no way that you don’t know that this is an issue because your app rates 1.6 in the App Store. Everyone hates it.  At this point in my sailing I would never book Virgin again. I seriously hope conditions approve because I paid a lot of money for this vacation and so far it has been a complete disappointment. I considered getting off the ship before it left Miami because I was so stressed out.
Resolution_Details: 02/22 HDM OM: HDM sent an apology message to the sailor for the challenges the sailor faced during embarkation day

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 1
Q: Cleanliness of the terminal?, A: 5
Q: Time it took to get onboard?, A: 1
Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 5
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I’m very disappointed with the Virgin Voyages mobile application and it keeps dying and always have a bug. It took me forever to book any shows or reservations. Please fix this issue. And also my magic band was having technical difficulties as well and wasn’t letting me order any drinks.
But other than that I’m really enjoying the cruise. But I’d really like if the app works better
Resolution_Details: 02/22 HDM OM: HDM sent an apology message to the sailor for the challenges the sailor faced during embarkation day

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 2
Q: Service?, A: 2
Q: Cleanliness of the terminal?, A: 4
Q: Luggage handling?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: My understanding is that employees are paid well and there is no need to tip. I was very much turned off by the luggage handler asking for a tip. Bad first impression. 

App kept crashing. Over and over and over again. 

Check in was fast, good service and the greeters were fun.
Resolution_Details: 02/22 HDM OM: HDM sent an apology message to the sailor for the challenges the sailor faced during embarkation day

We will continue to follow up on Sailors dining experience toward the end of the cruise ensuring a Rockstar service is provided every single night.

Description: Sailor was very aggressive to server as he was dissatisfied with his dinning experience, sailor mentioned that rock salt that was served for their main ruined the steak for them and that his side dishes were not served at the same time with his steak (french fries and spinach) but they were served right after we served the main course which lead to the sailor shouting to the Server (Mircia) in front of fellow crew and sailors around the couple.
Latest_Comment: ARM Oliver approached sailor asking how was dining experience and he was very aggressive towards Oliver mentioning and I quote "food was as good as service was terrible". He then added that back home he would tip the server .03 cents and that in german culture that is considered an insult.
Resolution_Details: Oliver once again apologized and took care of them personally, serving them their desserts and making sure they didn't needed anything else. Sailors also mentioned that back home they would've not paid for their dinner. Oliver mentioned that the two drinks they had would've been complimented and sailor appreciated the gesture and thanked for serving the dessert and keeping an eye on them. Sailors didnt care for the dessert but after having a deeper conversation, sailors mentioned they are coming back again on Saturday and that Oliver will make sure they have an excellent dinning experince and to make sure to have proper salt for them. Sailors when leaving the restaurant thanked Oliver once again for the follow up.

Description:
Q: How would you rate your cabin or RockStar Quarter?, A: 2
Q: Cabin Host knowledge?, A: 5
Q: Cleanliness of the cabin?, A: 4
Q: Friendliness of Cabin Host?, A: 5

Description:
Q: How was your bar experience?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 5
Q: Vibe of the bar?, A: 4
Q: Menu choices?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: More flavorful seltzer options, please.
Resolution_Details: Ahoy sailor, thank you for your feedback on our recent beverage experience survey. Regarding your comment for hard hard seltzer I would like to draw your attention to the options we have onboard. We have two brands that we offer - Ketel One Sprit and Quirk. Ketel One Spritz can be found at most of our beverage outlets and has 3 flavor options Peach & Orange Blossom, Cucumber & Mint and Grapefruit & Rose while Quirk can be found at Draught Haus on Deck 7 Mid Ship & The Red Room during shows and comes in Cherry Blossom & Lime flavor and Strawberry, Basil & lime. Unfortunately due to space restrictions that come with being on the a ship we cannot carry vast ranges of all products and not all locations can stock every item that we have onboard. I hope that this information helps to guide you in the correct areas to seek those libations that will tickle your taste buds. If you have any concerns please reach out to the beverage management team via our Sailor Services Help Desk. Regards, Conor O'Malley - Beverage Operations Manager

Resolution_Details: RM spoke to the sailors and informed that the package is only for 2 people and explained that if they want to avail the package, they need to pay. Sailors refused. FYI

Description: Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae for a party of 10 pax at 6:45 PM and were seated on time. Latest_Comment: 2/23/2024 @ 20:19 DM Nestor went to follow up on the issue, and the sailor opened up about some of their concerns regarding the cabin. They explained that they wanted the mattress to be placed on the floor because it was difficult for their friend to climb up and down. There had been an incident where their friend hit their head while using the ladder. The DM manager apologized for the inconvenience and offered medical assistance, but the sailors declined as the injury was not serious. The DM asked for permission to consult with AEHK for advice and confirmed that placing the mattress on the floor was not allowed for health and safety reasons. The sailors understood the situation but declined to move to a different cabin as they preferred to be together. They mentioned that they would raise a complaint with the person who booked the cabin for them. The DM apologized again for the situation and offered further assistance if needed, directing them to Sailor Services for help.
Resolution_Details: 02/25 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 2
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities during the day?, A: 2
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 2
Q: Are there any shows or activities that you would like to see that we don't currently offer?, A: It’s unclear what show there are and what they are about.  Communication is very lacking. 
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Extra Virgin’s atmosphere was crowded, service was slow, server was distracted.  Food was not good.  Someone (presumably the manager) asked us how the service was while our waitress was standing next to him, it made us uncomfortable to speak freely.

Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: 1. We paid extra money for a sea terrace XL but these rooms don’t have the glass front to see the ocean, so I sit on my balcony and stare at a wall of metal. 
2. The rooms are RIGHT next to the mechanical room both next us and below us so we hear banging and loud noises-enough to wake you up from a dead sleep or keep you from sleeping. HORRIBLE ROOMS-and we paid MORE for them! I’m just so disappointed with them.
3. One of our rooms hadn’t been cleaned properly at all’s hair tie left in the shower from the previous people are no hand soap either. I had to track someone down no less than 4 times on our arrival day for different reasons and then had to call that night because the pillows I had asked for never arrived. 
4. The app has been terrible this trip. Wouldn’t work AT ALL the entire time we were in Miami so by the time it started working, tons of things were already sold outs so we had no opportunity to attend several things we had anticipated being able to enjoy while on the cruise. 
5. Many of the restrooms around the ship either had no toilet paper or were out of hand soap or the sinks didn’t work. 
6. There was no drag queen bingo onboard, which was our favorite activity from the last cruise. Not being able to see the lineup before you book just doesn’t sit will with me. Had I known this particular cruise was going to be all poker tournaments and no drag queen bingo, I never would have purchased this particular cruise. 
Overall-we LOVED our first cruise and couldn’t wait to get back on for our second cruise. After this one, I doubt that we will voyage again With VV. There are too many other cruise lines to try and this one just made us realize that so many others have better things to offer and have a higher level of customer service.
Latest_Comment: 2/24/2024 11:00AM -DM met the sailor in cabins 8366z and 8370z and apologized for any inconvenience. I offered them a bubble and also "first round on us," as well as arranging for dinner time. They accepted and were thankful for the offer.
Resolution_Details: DM met the sailor in cabins 8366z and 8370z and apologized for any inconvenience. DM offered them a bubble and also "first round on us," as well as arranging for dinner time. They accepted and were thankful for the offer.

Description: 02/23/24 @23:22 HDA Barbara: Sailor sent message on Support Queue "I wanted to take some time to provide feedback. This is my third virgin cruise in two years. We’ve loved the first two so much that we’ve gifted future sailing vouchers to our family and friends to experience it themselves. More over, for my moms 60th birthday celebration, I saved up to take her on one this weekend. Unfortunately, if this trip had been my first virgin voyage, it would be my last. My mom gets motion sickness and is a light sleeper, and I told her that this ship would be great because it’s quiet and you don’t feel the motion. I wasn’t afforded an option to purchase a central terrace during booking and this was our only weekend we were available to go. Once receiving our room number I panicked. I was worried about the back of the ship and 8th floor for motion and the noise from the entertainment below so I tried to level upgrade to at least a larger room on a higher floor. By the time I received the room location, our flights were booked and my mom was ecstatic to finally take her first real vacation in years. So I decided to stay quiet and hope for the best. But regardless of that, for the price I paid to treat my mom, i have been embarrassed all weekend long by all of the things i had experienced in the past that i knew she would love and appreciate. I want to start by saying the crew, per usual has been amazing. David has tended to our every need. When We got in on day one, our cabin carpet was stained likely from a previous sailor spilling food in drips, the mirror and cabinet in cabin has residue smears, the people who stayed before us tore up wall and cabinets, the lights on the wall were hanging down from the wall (I fixed). Our bed wall panel vibrated so loud with the ship movement (I have a video) that we couldn’t sleep in night one. I’m a big planner, and this itinerary was chosen because I had done it before and never had a problem feeling the ship move. Unfortunately, at the back of the ship even I have felt it and my poor mother does too. To add to my embarrassment, the music blaring from directly under our room in the Dock or the karaoke each night. I understand that this is fun for everyone but we haven’t been able to sleep before midnight any of the nights. My mom has been an angel telling me that it’s no big deal, but I know that it’s because I’ve paid for the entire trip and she doesn’t want me to feel badly. If I had known at time of purchase that our cabin location would be where it was, I would not have booked this trip. This is all to say I really believe it could be beneficial to your future sailors to have the option to select their room if they aren’t doing a lock it in rate. I hope that this feedback proves beneficial. And if not, thanks for taking the time to read it anyway. Also, the internet is the worst it’s ever been. My network is consistently not working or able to connect to the app."

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 2
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 4
Q: Vibe of the restaurant?, A: 2
Q: Service?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Once seated, next to a bus station, a staff member spilled several plates right behind my husband.  There was no apology, nor did anyone check to see if spilled items hit his clothing.   Staff congregated at the bus station laughing and talking, not focused on how nearby diners were affected.  Dinner courses were delivered without clearing previous courses.  
Staff does not seem to possess "situational awareness"
of the pacing of the dinner and just delivers whatever comes from the kitchen, without considering whether the previous course is completed.  Managers do not seem to be assisting or supporting (training) their staff.  This was our experience on the last two evenings, although our first dinner in Test Kitchen was flawless.  Thanks for asking.  We'd truly like to see service delivery improve.
Latest_Comment: Tonight the sailor will be dining at Pink Agave. The Restaurant Manager will extend sincere apologies and express gratitude for the feedback received.
Resolution_Details: The Restaurant Manager extends heartfelt apologies and appreciation for the feedback. The insights shared have been communicated to the team for continuous improvement.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Service?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: NA
Q: Quality of the food?, A: NA
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The girl name Jazmin that was working by the DJ area on beverages area was very very rude I asked for coconut water because they ran out on the other side. I asked her did they have any more she looked and said yes but I  would have to wait for a bartender. I replied okay. I waited... and waited... and waited.... until I asked another person  that did the same job as she since its not a alcoholic Drink could I get two coconut waters he said sure got them under two minutes and went on doing what he was doing. I  spoke to a gender not sure of but it said nothing but the Drink was FREE! OF COURSE its Water!! I  wanted to pay a down payment on a cruise again but my husband and I had a serious second thoughts due to this treatment at Bimini. No apologies the girl Jazmin literally looked at me in my Face rolled her eyes and the Gender just looked with no remorsefulness both could careless I do YouTube video and I will definitely be posting my blog on YouTube and the important facts of this trip I experienced. I am not looking for hand out or Freebies. My husband and I not people of that nature but good customer service. This my first trip on Virgin voyages. I will definitely get home and make sure the owner 
Sir Richard  Branson get a letter from me to know exactly how his workers treat his customers  also "Apollo" will hear from me. All the good I will say is on this review is You guys DO HAVE  A COUPLE EXCELLENT EMPLOYEES that Won't unnoticed  "FAISAL"  CLEANING  DEPARTMENT  8TH FLOOR EXCELLENT MAN  GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

Description: Sailor was upset with wrong cake that was given on her birthday.
Latest_Comment: 02/24/24 22:00 GrpMgr AV: Got a call from TW Rest Mgr advising sailor Natalie was very upset since the Cake was received was not the one ordered. GrpMgr along with Rest Mgr checked the information was sent for the cake with the pastry on duty - the information was not clear on his side so the cake that was served was the standard small chocolate with no message as it was requested. Executive chef came as well and a Big cake was going to be prepare however by the time we were going to the table sailor had left the restaurant. 2 bottles of Moet were not charged to the account as an apology and another 2 will be deliver to the cabin. GrpMrg called @22:38 sailor Natalie to apologize again for the experience we had with the request she made long time ago. Sailor was calmed but very disappointed although she appreciate the follow up call just wanted to have a rest, GrpMrg offered the bubbles to be send to her cabin but she denied politely and request to end the conversation. sailor has a balance due of $19.85 (A retail charge of 19.95 was removed from her account and charged to Circles account 9328)
Resolution_Details: ARM and RM spoke to the sailors and apologized. Sailor mentioned that she specified the cake to have a written message on the cake as "Happy Big Birthday, Natalie." However, there was nothing written. Sailor ordered 2 bottles of Moet. On behalf of the team, bottles of Moet were offered as complimentary.

Description: HDA SB 2/23 11:20PM - Sailor sent message on SQ. "Hello! There's a reservation under my account for a snorkeling trip. I did not make that reservation, nor did I authorize it. Can you remove from my account?" - Sailor was informed that the booking was made pre-cruise, and also about the 48 cancelation policy.  Sailor said "I never made this reservation. I saw this today for first time on my account. I don't even know where to call for excursions, I believe this is an error and someone added this without my authorization. I also found out from you, that I was charge without my approval. I haven't gotten any emails, nor haven't signed waivers, don't even know where this event will take place or what to do about it" -
Latest_Comment: HDA SB 2/23 11:20PM  - Shore things team was informed, and they will check in the morning.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The romance package was misleading with the shake for champagne. Until we got on board we assumed you got champagne at any time each day. The treats only served on last 2 nights? We wanted our romance to start right away. The dinners were excellent food was great. The last night we scheduled as our special night. The only time we could do a show that was available was 10 pm and yep at 9 it was cancelled. No option to rebook as it was the last night. We the shows “selling” out this was very disappointing. The ap is awful. From day one of download through the entire cruise and when we asked about it we got a “yes, we know but it gets better when we are out at sea” well that’s a nope it doesn’t! Also telling us the are washing balconies during the cruise at 9:30 am was disappointing for us as we were going to sleep in that day since our tour was 2:30pm. Individually this issues were things you could overlook but all together made for a disappointing cruise.
Resolution_Details: 02/25 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
02/25 HDM OM: The email from the shoreside received: Ahoy team,

Just wanted to inform you about a sailor who did not want to turn over her prohibited item (Steamer).

Sailor insisted she went over the prohibited item list and the steamer was not on there. While the word "steamer" is not on there, it does say "Any appliance with a heating body or element". Although she was very upset about this, she later understood after explaining that it is a fire hazard.

Vazquez claims she waited over an hour for an answer on this prohibited item. I spoke to security about why it took so long to get assistance when I was available. They said they called their supervisor and then Ship security for assistance. I asked them to please contact me next time as well to expedite the response.

Vazquez also mentioned she has a very short window to make her flight on disembarkation day. She will be very upset if she misses her flight when trying to claim her item again.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: The sailor requested to get a spot for Ship Show which was sold out. HDM contacted BOM Joanna who managed to book a spot for the sailor. HDA Irina notified the sailor about the show
Resolution_Details: 02/28 HDM OM: The sailor was offered a Thermal Pass for her experience on the first day. HDM offered any other assistance, however, the sailor refused.

Description: Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae at 6:15PM and were seated on time. Server informed RM that sailor Ilya is giving her a hard time and an awkward situation. Sailor asked the server where she was from, and the server answered that she was from Indonesia. Then the sailor said in a sarcastic way so what do you know about korean? since you are from Indonesia and not from Korea. Server professionally handled the situation very well, but after the game the sailor asked the server if he could have the leftover bottle of Soju from the game. Server explained that the first round was already complementary and if they want more Soju it will be charged. Sailor just went silent and asked what was next for their meal? the server answered that it would be dessert. The sailor said to the server that he was still hungry so they ordered more food and again asked if he could get the leftover bottle of Soju? But the sailor was declined as he did not want to pay. RS went to the table to check and right away the sailor asked RS if could have another free shot of Soju, RS explained to sailor that the complimentary shot was the one they had when they did the game, if he wants one more shot then it will be charged to their account,  RS also noticed that sailors are already intoxicated with alcohol.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Description: Sailor went to Gunbae as a walk-in at around 7:00 PM. RS offered the sailor an 8:45 PM reservation and the sailor gladly accepted it. When the sailor came back for his reservation and was escorted to the table, the sailor did not like that he would be seated with other sailors. RS again explained the sharing concept of Gunbae, but the sailor insisted that he wanted his own table. RS mentioned to the sailor that if he really wants it that way and if he is willing to wait then we will find a way. For the meantime the sailor was advised to wait by the couch in front of the desk as we will just seat the sailors in the line first. At around 9:15 PM the sailor was accommodated and given a table just for himself.

Latest_Comment: 02/25/24 23:50hrs HDA AC: Sailor approached SS upset about her cabin, said she was waiting to hear from sailor services about her upgrade request. She was upset about the room she was allocated. She said that she knew that it was a limited sea view  and before she came on to the ship she checked on website and on youtube on how a limited sea terrace looked like and she was okay with what was advertised however when she came onboard the room allocated had no partial sea view it was completely blocked by the lifeboat  Infront and now view of the sea at all. The sailor even took pictures of the view she had and showed the HDA AC. She went on to say that initially she had been told when she came down to check upgrade that it would cost additional $150 to upgrade but however was changed to $525 and was not happy at all about this. HDA then extended apologies and advised the sailor that to give him a moment while he checks best solution for her and asked her to have seat. HDA then checked empty cabin list for another limited sea terrace available but there was none and saw that only central sea terrace were available. Also upon checking, HDA noticed that it was sailors' birthday on the 26th Feb already and decided as a guesture of good will he offered a comp upgrade for the sailor as a birthday gift and sailor was moved to 10258A and was happy.
Resolution_Details: 02/26 HDM OM: The sailor moved to 10258A

Description: 02/25/24 11:48hrs  HDA AC: The sailor approached SS reported that she threw up twice after eating dinner at Razzle Dazzle. She said she could see the chicken she had in the vomit and suspects that the food at the Restaurant was not not good. HDA then offered Medical assistance to sailor but refused at first because she said she was fine and then later asked if she would be charged to see the medical. HDA then called Medical and spoke to Nurse on duty  who informed that since it  was just a one time vomit she would get charged, Upon telling the sailor this she was not happy and demanded that she wanted to speak to a Manager. HDA apologized and informed the sailor that there wasn't a Manager available to speak to her at the time but however he was going to document her case and escalate it to the relevant Manager who will reach out to her in the morning as per request.
Latest_Comment: ROM Harry gave a courtesy call to Sailor at 7:30PM after noticing that Sailor don't have any reservations for the entire voyage. Sailor explained that she had the lamb shank for dinner in Razzle Dazzle and that she felt that made her vomit. She continued to mention that we are lucky that she's not escalating this on social media because we are using poor quality meat and smothering it in sauces. Furthermore she continued to mention that she vomited all night because it was undercooked. ROM apologized for her experience and mentioned that our Galleys/Kitchen are in compliance with health & safety standards to ensure the well being of our sailors and the quality of our products. ROM also offered medical assistance and offered to assist with reservations in any of our restaurants. Sailor declined.

Description: 2/26/2024/ HDA IRINA/ 3:02 PM/ Sailor is deeply disappointed with her Restaurant Reservation experience.  She is not able to get Reservation for The Wake and Extra Virgin around 6-7:30 pm for 27th and 28th of February. First night she was trying to walk in and was rejected in every restaurant. Finally was able to get a table around 9pm. Sailor was advise to visit Reservation Supervisor tomorrow, but refused since she is irritated to waste her time by hunting for the spot. Sailor would like to escalate the case to the Managers.

Description: During peak time brunch service, when there was a long queue on the door, Sailors cut the queue and started talking to RS Bart while he was dealing with the Sailors at the front of the queue; approaching Sailors started asking where is their table however RS Bart had ongoing interaction with Sailors at the front; approaching Sailors were informed that they will be offered assistance as soon as possible, once the Sailors already taken care of will be seated;
Latest_Comment: Sailors that were at the front of the queue (12330A) were seated by RS Bart in the meantime; they complained about their experience and said this is the 2nd time they are rudely cut in front of by the same couple (first time happened the night before in different restaurant); Sailors thanked RS Bart for solving the issue in a kind manner, they were offered an apology for their unpleasant experience;
Resolution_Details: Once the queue cleared out Sailors were again greeted by both RS Bart and RM Bruno; Sailors said they are Rockstars and they were told that they can cut through any queue anytime and get seated right away; Sailors said that RS Bart "shouted at them" earlier, which was not  true, and also that they waited for 25 mins, that was also not true; despite the fact that earlier interaction was different than described by Sailors, RS Bart offered an apology if they had an impression that his behavior was any different than polite; RS Bruno took care of Sailors and offered them comfortable table right away; he looked after them and made sure they have a good experience after the confusion at their arrival;

Description: Sailors were almost at the front of the queue to the front desk before their brunch; while they were waiting in the queue, couple of Sailors cut through the entire queue, approached the front desk and started asking about their tables; situation made Sailors uncomfortable and they mentioned this to RS Bart upon their sitting; they also mentioned that the same thing happened during their dinner last night, and it was the same couple who cut the line; they said it was very unpleasant experience; Sailors thanked RS Bart for dealing with this situation in a kind manner and making them feel appreciated after unpleasant situation at the door;

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Overall, and my first experience of cruising, I don’t think I have been delighted with it. 

- breakfast wasn’t fantastic and didn’t quite know what was happening. I requested several items from the waitress, and they either came incorrect, or not what I ordered.
- on deck 16, during the day, the music was too loud and wasn’t offered a drink at all. Instead, had to go down to deck 15 every time I wanted a drink. 
- issues with credit card, despite being uploaded in advance and checked at checkin. When asked at Sailor Services, the colleague had no clue as to what it could be. 
- went to Razzle Dazzle last night, and was completely lost with the menu. Didn’t know what was happening, or what was supposed to be received. Very little explanation on the menu, and it was just confusing overall - we were sitting on a table and all three tables to the right of us sent one course back, at least, for not liking it!!
- the general ‘attentiveness’ of service is not fantastic. For example, was in the Sip lounge, and had to wait 15 minutes for someone to take the order and that was only after calling someone over. Another example is the room wasn’t cleaned until c.midday. 

I recognise that, maybe, my expectations are not quite right. I, several times a year, stay in Virgin Limited Edition hotels, and having stayed in most of these, they different vastly from a virgin voyage - I wasn’t expecting this, as it is part of the wider ‘virgin group’ but recognise that, maybe, I shouldn’t compare.
Latest_Comment: 2/29/2024 11:09 HDA Bagas : Sailor replied " Thanks for your message and for getting in touch. That would be great, thanks for letting me know ?? "
Resolution_Details: 02/29 HDM OM: The package has been refunded.

Description: 02/26/2024 hda jkg. I just had breakfast delivered to my room. This is my 2nd cruise with Virgin. Last time when I ordered coffee, it came in a carafe. It was still hot and there was more than 1 tiny cup. This time, in a small paper cup, coffee is cold not hot. Do you no longer bring it in a carafe? Also, last time there was ketchup, salt and pepper. This time none of those things. And finally, my roasted potatoes were still raw, barely cooked through. Not an enjoyable breakfast to say the least. The quality seems to have decreased since my last cruise in December 2022.

Description: 02/27/24 6:11pm Sailor sent a SQ: " This has been the most stressful situation trying to fix this issue with an excursion we cancelled 2 weeks ago when my mom was given devastating news that she could easily become paralyzed with the slightest slip. She cancelled the excursion that night but we have spent every day on board trying to fix this situation. If you can not credit our card back can you at least give sailor loot (non bar tab) this way we don’t have to spend another 3 days going to different decks and talking to different people. " / HDA answer: Ahoy Mikala, we apologized for the inconvenience you had about the cancellation of your excursion. Be assured this will be scalated to Shore Things Management to follow up directly with you and provide a solution about this matter.
Latest_Comment: 02/28/24 ASTM Tobyn: following messeg sent via SQ : Ahoy Mikala! This is Tobyn, Assistant Shore Things Manger. I am just getting back to you in regards to your tour in Cozumel. Sailor services has shared with us that you have tried to cancel your tours prior to boarding the vessel. I do still see it on your agenda and have checked you booking history for the voyage and do not see any mention of attempt cancellations. As a Goodwill gesture i have refunded the tour for both yourself and your mom to your onboard account which you can view from your sailor app. It can either be used as a credit towards your account or if not spent you are able to cash it out from Sailor Services on the last evening of the voyage. Our Apologies if this has caused any inconveniences to you whilst onboard. Have a lovely Sea day"
Resolution_Details: 02/28/24 ASTM Tobyn: Both sailors have been refunded for their tour in Cozumel.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: My tablet did not work the whole first day and half of the second. I called 3 times for it to be fixed.
Latest_Comment: The high power charging outlet was not functioning on embarkation day, and the tablet was switched off after the sailor embark by 4 pm. CH reported to IT via Aims and DM as well. DM checked the situation and find out the problem. DM used the other charger port to charge the tablet and it was working. DM and CH couldn't met the sailor as they were out from the cabin already and came back late. in the evening Sailor changed to the old USB port again to the old port which is not working and the tablet went off again. DM met the sailor in the next day morning and apologized for the inconvenience and explained them about what happened exactly and showed them the proper USB port which is working. Sailor understood and thanked for the assistance. Electricians changed the socket but with wrong one. An AIMS created to electrician to change the port again. A bottle of bubbles was delivered to the sailor as a gesture of apology.
Resolution_Details: no further assistance needed at this moment

Description: VIP Day at Anemona Beach in Punta Sur, 10:00AM. Sailors missed tour, arrived on pier at 10:08 when tour had already departed. STM was dispatching ferry at the time and asked sailors to wait till ferry has left as pier was crowded and ferry had to depart on time. Sailor were adamant to still do tour, however TO advised that sailors would have to take taxi to location 45mins away at their own expense.
Latest_Comment: 2/27/24 HDA CANSU - ST Manager approached to desk and spoke to HDA about all the conversation that they had in the morning, accordingly, HDA sent message to Sailor : "Ahoy Zhaneta, this is Jansu from Sailor Services, I reached out to Shore Things Manager and he told me that he already spoke to you in the morning and he refunded $50 each already in your account. I hope this information help you. Have a good evening!" After an hour, Sailors approached to desk and asked without realizing the message that HDA sent, HDA explained the situation to Sailors. Sailors were not satisfied and HDA recommended them contact with Shore Team about escalations and told that she will be provide solutions letter. Sailors thanked.
Resolution_Details: TO arranged a taxi for sailor at around 10:45am. Sailors were reminded again that they would have to pay for their ride to location and would return with the rest of the sailors. As GWG STM compensated sailors 25% each as they would have missed part of their experience. Ticket price $200 each, refund $50 each. Sailor was happy and thanked STM for assistance and compensation.

ASTM explained to RSA that yes it does state on the description that they will be receiving drink at 3 mentioned bars but that it does not specify the size, type of drink, type of glass ect. and that comparison between Key west and Cozumel cannot be done as its in a different country which has different culture, different experience and different Tour Operator. ASTM also advised that sailors did not inform the TO/Guide that they will be leaving the tour midway. ASTM also checked with the TO as well as the EOD (End of day report) where no mention complaint of issues were reported by an sailors. This is the best that can be offered onboard.
Resolution_Details: 02/29/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% discount applied towards their tour on their onboard account.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 2
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 4
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Food is less than stellar and akin to military mess hall quality. There is a dearth of quality non-fru-fru dishes for the non-foodie. Astonished that VV won awards on the food quality. Dining reservations are difficult but there is no real choice as a food option for the non-foodie but nightly burgers or pizza. Each “specialty” dining option has left us looking for other options (again burgers and pizza). As a travel agent and blogger/podcast I have an issue recommending the main dining options. The Test Kitchen should be an experience not an other dining option. I’m underwhelmed as a whole regarding dining options and quality.
Latest_Comment: HDA Virgil 11:03PM- message was sent to sailor on SQ to arrange the meeting.
Resolution_Details: ROM Harry gave a courtesy call to the Sailor and scheduled a dinner reservation for them in Pink Agave.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 3
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 2
Q: Menu choices?, A: 4
Q: Service?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I sailed on Valiant Lady for the first time last Nov 2023...and Extra Virgin was very good on that cruise. It seems like here on Scarlet the food is tasty ..but often luke warm or seemed to be pre- cooked and presentations have been dissappointing as well. I expected a "wow" experience when it comes to food since being here on Scarlet because it has been said this vessel has the better food...So we shall see...
Resolution_Details: Apologies have been extended to the sailor, who has been nvited for a second dining experience promising exceptional food quality and presentation. The feedback has been shared with our culinary team to ensure an outstanding and improved culinary journey on their return.

Description: A sailor with a dairy allergy received a pasta dish with butter in error. The restaurant manager expressed sincere apologies for the oversight and promptly offered the correct dish.
Resolution_Details: As a goodwill gesture, a glass of Moët was also extended. The galley team has been duly informed to prevent any such errors in the future.

Description: The sailor took offense as we had reserved the window table for mega rockstars.
Resolution_Details: The restaurant manager extended a sincere apology and offered an alternative table by the window. However, the sailor declined the offer, expressing contentment with the current server.

Description: 2/28/24 HDA Adeliya - Sailors approach to the SS desk stated that they purchase second wi-fi accidently
Resolution_Details: wi-fi removed

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Unfortunately for me I sailed on Valiant Lady in 2023 Nov. Pink Agavae was a highly recognised food venue and it lived up to my expectations ..But here on Scarlet they failed miserably. Although our staff was nice. The food was just not well prepared, it wasmt freshly prepared or hot...(luke warm at best) There just seemed to be too much going on with wayyyy to many staff moving around at the same time. I understand being busy and all. But we actually waited a very long time for our main course entree's, very tight seating arrangements the back of my chair was right by a supporting column which was also a high trafficked pass through and the back of my chair was bumped several times by patrons and staff. I applaude Pink Agave for attempting to accomodate guest but there were sooo many other spaces that had no activity at all that couldve been used to "spread people out" more. I also loved the musical vibe but the DJ just played it a bit too loud which caused diners to have raise our voices and people were basically talking over each other so that they could be heard
Resolution_Details: We contact the sailor and thanks for the feedback he give us. We invite the sailors to returned to PA but want to try other venues. They was happy with our attention.

Description: 27th feb. 8am. Sailor contacted her Mrsa that her blue short sleeve top is missing from her laundrey, that she had 1 pants and 1 top. Mrsa went down to laundrey to check and on their logs when they count the laundrey they had stated only 1 pair of pants. Mrsa relayed this information on to her sailor and her sailor replied "I know I put the top in there, but I understand these things can happen". Mrsa said she will keep checking. That evening Mrsa went back down to laundrey and spoke with the guy who actually did her laundrey and he can swear he only counted 1 pair of pants, no top. Mrsa contacted sailor to let her know she will keep checking incase anything has been missed.
Latest_Comment: Mrsa checked in with sailor to offer her to write a statement through security then we can take it further with a cabin check etc. Sailor dismissed and said that's not necessary.
Resolution_Details: Lost and Found manifest checked daily, Sailor declined cabin seach or statement.

Description: When ordering a drink the bartender was moving very fast and spilled half my shot on the counter and still served me the drink.
Resolution_Details: Ahoy sailor, thank you for your feedback on our onboard survey. We are very disappointed to hear that we made such a mistake with making your drinks at the Aquatic Club earlier this voyage. We will ensure that something like this does not happen again and we have also refunded these drinks on your account. We hope that your voyage since then has been a memorable one. If you would like to discuss the matter further or if there are any other issues related to beverage you would like to highlight please feel free to reach out to myself or any of the beverage management team via our sailor services help desk. Regards, Conor O'Malley, Beverage Operations Manager.

Resolution_Details: Both 24h packages refunded. Sailor informed.

Description: Sailor was having dinner in GB tonight 02/28, sailor reported a shellfish allergy but wanted to try the chicken anyway. SV clearly explained to him the risk as chicken is cross contaminated by the "hot bar" which is fried in the same oil. Sailor insisted he was going to be fine.
Resolution_Details: After having the chicken sailor started to feel itchy, RM promptly approach him and ask if he would like medical assistance, he said he was fine., even the skin around his neck was getting quite red. His partner was with him, they both reassure RM that SV explained very carefully the cross contamination, sailor stated that he was going to be fine as he was going to take "Benadryl".

Description: Sailors came to check in 30 minutes earlier than the reservation time.  Venue was full and could only accommodate the reservation as per the timing.
Resolution_Details: RS apologized to the sailors and advised them to be back according to reservation as other sailors who have earlier reservations are checking in as well.  Sailors came back without checking in and directly went down the venue. Seater called the attention of the RS because one sailor was rude to her. Upon checking, it was Mr. Jeffrey. Sailor went back to the podium and starting raising his voice. Sailor was very rude to RS even the RS apologized and explained that other sailors are waiting to be seated, still the sailor was very rude and said "I don't care. Give me a table. I want to eat right now. Give me a table." Sailors from 9294z (Mr. Felder) felt upset towards the sailor and apologized to RS in behalf of Mr. Jeffrey and Mrs. Susan, who was very rude as well. Sailors were supposed to be seated on time. However, there was a delay just because they were talking rudely to the seater and RS. RM was informed. FYI

Description: Cabin Safe

HDA Virgil 2:15PM- sailor fell down next to the bar by the entrance of the beach club. I approached the sailor to check up and see if she's ok. Sailor assured me that she is ok, just needs to take a seat. I sat her down and offered medical assistance, which sailor refused. Then I got her some ice and a towel to put on her leg. Sailor was thankful. I showed sailor where medical center is , as well as I showed her where I was in case she needs anything.  I checked with her one more time before leaving if she does not need medical assistance, which sailor confirmed that she does not.
Resolution_Details: 02/29 HDM OM: HDM called the sailor and asked how was she feeling. The sailor confirmed that she is doing good and doesn`t need any assistance. The sailor requested ice. The sailor appreciated the call.

Description: 02/29/24 14:57HRS HDA AC: The sailor stopped by SS to express his disappointment with massage experience at the Beach Club. He said that when he booked the appointment he was made to believe that it would be in a building with AC in a quiet place, only to find out  that it was in a cabana right next to the rest rooms. He said it wasn't relaxing massage because there people constantly going in and out of the bathroom and could here the noise of flushing toilets and water running and this ruined his whole massage experience and he feels that it wasn't fair as he has paid a lot of money for a relaxing massage but instead it was  horrible. He is was asking for Management to reach out to him so that they can chat and sea what they can do for them for the inconvenience. HDA extended apologies for the bad experience and  thanked the sailor for his feedback and advised him that he would create the report for him and escalate it to the Spa Manager who will reach out to him as per his request.
Latest_Comment: I spoke with the sailor myself at the spa and immediately applied over $100 discount to the treatment for the in convenience. Sailor thanked me for listening and was happy with the discount applied

Description: 02/29/24 @16:40 HDA Barbara: Sailor Julia sent a message in Support Queue "Hey! I was told I could file complaints here. Uhm. I don’t want to be that person, but I’ve interacted with Amin (the Hype) (Scarlet Lady) on the entertainment team multiple times on this voyage and he’s been awesome! But we interacted today after his dancing set on Bimini and he just made me uncomfortable. I’m an adult, but I’m 19– he knows this. He asked multiple times if he could see my tits and if I was a virgin and if I wanted to practice sex on the beach with him. He also pressed and asked if I sold nude pictures or if he could have them. He told my friend he was obsessed with me and in love with me. Which is fine. I’m not that distressed. It made me uncomfortable. But if y’all could just tell him— not to do that to others? He assured me he was joking but I don’t want the same thing to happen to others. Cheers."

Description: RM sought feedback, and a sailor expressed dissatisfaction, describing the calamari as rubbish and fishy, and the eggplant as excessively watery. Furthermore, when the sailor accidentally spilled water, none of the servers offered assistance.
Resolution_Details: The restaurant manager sincerely apologized for the unpleasant experience and, as a gesture of goodwill, removed the charges for the drinks.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: NA
Resolution_Details: 02/29 HDM OM: The below message was sent to the sailor: We hope your day started well, We received your feedback. Please let us know if you experiences some rough seas during your voyage, we will try our best to make it better. Have a lovely Bimini day!

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The bed is rock hard. The food options are terrible. Lunch doesn’t start until after noon. Not everything is open during eating times. Walk ins for the restaurants is a joke it’s just standby in case someone cancels. Very minimal activities. The board games are missing pieces. Took us to an excursion that had kids all over that resort. Had our Original cruise cancelled and had to settle for this one. Directions on the ship are awful. I will never recommend a virgin cruise to anyone
Resolution_Details: 03/01 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 2/29/2024 8:19 HDA Bagas : sailors reporting a diarrhea and would like to refund his excursion, HDA Called sailor to advise him to to go to medical for further medical assitance, nurse has been informed.
Latest_Comment: 20/29/2024 11:43 HDA Bagas : HDA called nurse as per her it is not a diarrhea  it just stomach upset, medication has been given. attempted to call sailor but sailor ashore
Resolution_Details: 2/29/2024 19:09 HDA Bagas : HDA called sailor to check on him and offer medical assistance incase he needs it, he said he feel better, and do not need that

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 1
Q: Knowledge of the crew?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Food Choices are not appealing. Wanted to do a walk in at The Wake and was told we couldn’t get a table unless someone cancelled their reservation. That is not how you portrayed walk in dining. The beds are not comfortable. I Have gotten undercooked meals, bad service, and just a lack of service from some of the staff. The way you swap from breakfast to lunch is ignorant and not organized. This has not been a very appealing cruise and probably wouldn’t go on another one nor recommend to a friend. The resort we went to in Cozumel was littered with kids and the kayaks and snorkeling just not what was portrayed on the advertisement. Why does someone having type 2 diabetes that is controlled a problem to go “snorkeling” which was just swimming in shallow water with a life vest and a snorkel. Our original cruise was cancelled abruptly due to lack of planning on Yal part. Directions on the ship are horrible and very confusing due to the lack of signs. This has just not been a great trip for me and my wife. I had great service by a couple of your bartenders but other than that not so good.
Latest_Comment: Due to late response Sailors were contacted thru the phone to be invited for brunch on disembarkation day, however sailors did not reply to the call phone. Sailors were contacted thru the app with invitation.
Resolution_Details: Due to late response Sailors were contacted thru the phone to be invited for brunch on disembarkation day, however sailors did not reply to the call phone. Sailors were contacted thru the app with invitation.

Description: Air Conditioning
Resolution_Details: Ch confirmed everything is fine

Description: HDA Virgil 8:45PM- sailor approached ss desk as his premium wifi wasn't working. I checked his account to find out that he only had 24hs one. Sailor is unhappy as he purchased it here at ss desk with a  help of HDA who was suppose to buy the one for the whole voyage and not just one day. Sailor purchased proper package with me and want the day charge to be removed from his account, and only keep $30 which is for the correct amount.
Resolution_Details: 03/01 HDM OM: HDM refunded $30, however, the sailor will have $50 on his account, as he had used premium package of WiFi

Description: Sailor approached RS Bart at the front desk after his breakfast saying "do you even know how to cook over easy eggs?"; he was visibly upset and angry; he stated that every time he had eggs it was done hard and not easy as it should be;
Resolution_Details: Sailor was offered an apology; he was assured that his feedback will be passed to the kitchen;

Description: Ms. Amar was dining in Extra Virgin, he commented to the server the pasta (Bucatini Carbonara) was too salty, assistant restaurant manager approached the table sincerely apologized, assured the her we'll share the feed back with the culinary team. She was offered a fresh one to be prepared immediately, she accepted the offer. The food was prepared and served and she was happy with it, appreciated us for the quick response we took.
Latest_Comment: The food was prepared and served and she was happy with it, appreciated us for the quick response we took.

Description: 02/29/24 07:53pm HDA AC: The sailor shared his feedback on Razzle dazzle on the SQ and it read:"We had a very disappointing experience with Razzle Dazzle tonight. It was 15 minutes before we received water and nearly 25 minutes before our order was taken. We had to ask the woman who served our dinner to check on our drinks because they had still not arrived when our main course was served. The drinks were terribly watered down when they finally arrived. Additionally my wife noted that her lamb shank was very salty but that was more a personal preference. It was a disappointing last meal for the cruise and especially since it was our anniversary dinner." // The sailor then went on to say :"For what it’s worth, our other dining experiences have been great, (Hendrix from the Test Kitchen and Gustavo from Pink Agave were exceptionally attentive). Razzle Dazzle tonight was unfortunately the outlier."  HDA AC then replied the sailor with a message that read: "Thank you Timothy for sharing your feedback with us. I will make sure your comment is shared with the leadership as we are constantly looking forward to improving the service we provide on-board our Lady Ships."
Resolution_Details: Apology message was send to sailor trough the vv app

Description: During double checking quality of  the order with the sailor, sailor stated that the  macchiato its too small for her and that some of the food was luke warm.
Latest_Comment: RS Bogdan apologized and offered to remake the order for her. But sailor said she does not want to waste food and that she only wants a new Machiatto
Resolution_Details: RS Bogdan remade the coffee and delivered personally, and apologized again

Resolution_Details: RM Rojer offered them a bottle of wine a long with their dinner instead. Sailors are happy and appreciate managers gesture.

Description:
Sailors seated at Table 53 ordered the "Treat Yourself" Halibut Lobster, a chargeable item from the menu. After consuming the lobster, they expressed dissatisfaction, citing that the halibut was undercooked, and the accompanying civicche of scarloops was excessively sour.

Restaurant Supervisor  Upon receiving the complaint, the restaurant supervisor promptly approached Table 53 to address the concerns raised by the sailors.
  
The supervisor engaged with the sailors, collecting detailed feedback on the undercooked halibut and the overly sour scarloops. 
To ensure accuracy, the supervisor consulted with the chef regarding the preparation of the dish, confirming the validity of the sailors' complaints.
Resolution_Details: Following consultation with the chef, the restaurant supervisor acknowledged the issue and, in a gesture of goodwill, informed the sailors that they would not be charged for the "Treat Yourself" Halibut Lobster.

Description: Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae and were seated on time. After a few minutes, the sailors wanted to leave the venue because as per them it was too loud. RM approached the sailors and apologized for the inconvenience, RM assisted the sailors for a reservation in Extra Virgin and sailors were thankful for the gesture.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Description: 02/29/2024 HDA JKG. Sailor called furious as he is at the beach club and cannot charge. HDA explained to the sailor his cc on file did not allow our preauthorization. And that the cash deposit he placed has depleted. We require a method of payment in order to utilise the account. The sailor swore that he came to the desk and was informed that the 50$ was sufficient amount to keep the acc open. HDA explained this 50$ took the charges of the retail purchase and the account currently has a pending charge for the balance of his purchase. The system will recognize this as an onboard spend and will close the account as we require a method of payment. He refuses to understand this as he continuously repeated that he has 400+ bar tab. HDA informed this BT doesn't not stand as a method of payment. etc. Sailor swore and insisted to speak with a manager. HDA informed management is unavailable at this time. He said he is on his way and put the phone down.
Resolution_Details: 02/29 HDM OM: HDM called the sailor and checked if the account is working properly. As per the sailor, everything is fixed. HDM offered any other assistance, however, the sailor refused.

Description: 29 February 2024 - Dress for stained at dinner
Latest_Comment: 29 February 2024 - Lisa had dinner at TW and the bottom of her dress was stained by what seems like chocolate sauce. She only noticed when she was taking pictures that the bottom of the dress was stained and only reported to RSA in the evening of Bimini while they were at dinner. She thinks chocolate of some sort was spilled and she soaked it up with the hemline of her dress while she was sat at dinner.
Resolution_Details: 29 February 2024 - Premium wiifi charge was removed from their account.

Description: RSA Mel - sailor John sent message (Sailors were on the Cozumel Carribean BarCrawl on 02/28- just wanted to let you know that the excursion that we did in Cozumel the pub crawl we were very disappointed with it. It wasn’t exactly what was explained in the guide the first stop we only had a few small shots of tequila. There was no drinks offered and almost everyone that we talked to that was on the excursion was disappointed with it.
Latest_Comment: RSA MEL- advised Sailors, they were appreciative of the discount
Resolution_Details: 02/29/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% discount has been applied towards their tour on their onboard account.

Description: Sailor came to check in while the ASV was at the door. Reservation was only for 2, the sailor and 1 crew member who's staying with him. The crew member would like to join two more crew members with them. ASV called the attention of the RS to handle the matter. The venue at the moment has reservations of crew members, 10 from SS, 3 from Entertainment, 2 from Restaurant, 6 from IT and 5 from Technical Department excluding the sailor and one crew member with him.
Latest_Comment: RS informed the RM and RM called the attention of Entertainment Manager.
Resolution_Details: RS apologized to the sailor and explained that at the moment, we can only accommodate limited number of crew members as the venue reached the maximum allowed crew members already for brunch. Other crew members who are not on the reservation should create a request on the form. Crew member mentioned that they submitted the form. Upon checking, request showed that it was not approved. Still, the crew member (KIARA MONET FLOWERS) insisted to be accommodated while other sailors were behind them waiting to check in. RS explained that the reservation will be accommodated. Kiara started acting up and said "We only have couple of hours left in this ship. Are you really not gonna let us eat here?" RS apologized and mentioned that we will accommodate the reservation. Kiara declined and said "What's your name? I will make sure to remember that". RS gladly replied. Crew members left with the sailor. FYI

Description: RSA Mel  - Sailors expressed their disappointment with the Cozumel Carribean Bar Crawl on 02/29. Sailors said that the first bar they stopped at they only received tiny tasters of tequila, at the other stops the drinks were weak and watered down. They only went to 3 out of 4 of the bars. The food that was given was very small portions and not good at all. Sailors were leaving on their own after the second bar and by the end of the tour only 6 of the approximate 30 people remained until the end. Sailors were very disappointed with the experience.
Latest_Comment: RSA Mel  - advised the Sailors, they were appreciative of the discount
Resolution_Details: 02/29/24 ASTM Tobyn : 30% discount has been applied towards their tour on their onboard account.

She could not get to the beach, there are no low chairs etc. HDA checked if sailor requested  anything with SS at the club, as per sailor sand riders were not available.

Description: 02/29/23 11:53am // Sailor came on Feb 26 and he shared this: 13258A has the Passion Island Beach, Lunch, and Open Bar excursion booked for tomorrow at 1:30PM, however sailor Kim had an injury onboard and have to go to the Medical center tomorrow too. They won't be able to attend to the excursion, I asked sailors to tell the Medical Center to send email to ST in regards to a refund. / Sailor attend the medical.

Description: Mr. Van Haam has been playing the whole voyage on the tables and although he had a great time gambling he would constantly like to drag the attention on him winning about the rules we have, about the pace of dealing the cards, being to fast, about the fact that he got paid in $50's, wanting us to deposit his winnings back to his credit card.
Resolution_Details: Casino Supervisors, Casino Manager and Casino Host all talked to him and kindly advised him about the company's rules and procedures and apologized for being paid in $50's. Overall he had a great time, apart for few small issues he had at the SS with the onboard account being mixed with his friend's from #10146Z. Log created as an FYI.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Service?, A: 2
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 2
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The Wake....hmmmm...Second time around...2nd strike...Lets see what happens in Dec 2024 because we will be back on another Virgin Voyage...We arrived at 9pm were seated within 5 mins. We didnt recieve our appetizers or mains until almost 1030 no BS! there seemed to be alot of mis understandings with our waitress who was very nice but...not sure why the dsiconnect because we were very clear about what we wanted to eat. In all we recieved clam chowder that was luke warm at best and my I requested bone marrow which was not hot..and my main (shrimp and grits) came out with my off the grill entree which was not cooked as requested. One waitress didnt know the diff from Sprite and Mineral water...After several misunderstandings and with time winding down we had to leave. We requested that our meals be sent to our room. Once recieving our food we had a total of 6 different items that were all stuffed into 2 containers..so our sides were mixed into our mains and even some items were never even put in. I called and explained what happened and $7 was removed but the Wake once again failed us miserably...We had our first wake experience on Valiant Lady...it too was dissapointing
Resolution_Details: 03/01 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 3/1/24 HDA CANSU - Sailors approached to desk and told that Sailor Kendra was having sickness and Sailor Kendra not attend to the Fishing Charter excursion. Sailors are approached to desk to ask a refund for the Sailor Raul as well, HDA Cansu went to the excursion office and contacted with ST Manager. ST Manager explained the situation clearly. HDA Cansu advised to Sailors what is the decision from the ST Management side. Sailors escalated the situation again. HDA Cansu open the vlog for solution letter purposes.
Resolution_Details: 3/1/24 HDA CANSU - Vlog opened for solutions letter purposes.

Description: March 1st at 10:30 Sailor William Foster III was listed on the refund list from account for an amount of $2.360. Sailor was flagged on Embarkation Supervisor (picture attached), however, the Sailor disembarked at 10:25 without cashing out the amount. At 10:33 SSM informed RSM who double checked MXP and the amount was still in his account to be cashed out. SSM called their contact number and spoke with Sailor Elizabeth who on the phone stated that the money should go to "Peter - the cleaning guy", SSM put the Sailor on speaker and again repeated that we have a refund on the amount of $2.360 (two thousand three hundred sixty) in cash to give back to Sailor William Foster III, Sailor Elizabeth restated that they do not want to come back and the cash should be given to Peter, their Cabin Host, in the presence of SSD, SSO, RSM and SSM.
Latest_Comment: SSD called SSO to revise CCTV and called GM for advice.
Resolution_Details: Email will be sent to shoreside team.

Description: 03/01 HDM OM: HDM came to the desk to speak to the sailor Alison, because she wanted t disembark at 5:15 PM on embarkation day. HDM asked the reason. As per the sailor, her fiancé is on serious medication which makes his behavior difficult and cranky. HDM sympathized with the sailor and offered a medical assistance. The sailor refused. HDM  asked if she would like to disembark or have a separate cabin for the extra charge. HDM offered to make a report with security. The sailor refused to report and decided t disembark. The sailor's fiancé was calling all the time and after talking to him, the sailor decided to stay. The sailor checked how much will be the price for the extra cabin. The price for the insider is $1000. The sailor said that she would try to live with her fiancé, but if something, she will come to have an extra cabin. HDM informed the sailor that security team will be notified.

Description: March 2nd at 11:45 Sailors approached SS for the second time and asked to speak with the manager. HDA briefed RSM that the day before Sailors requested for the charge for grog walk ($50 x 9 Sailors = $450) to be split on their account, but it hasn't been done yet. RSM spoke with the Sailors and they shared their dissatisfaction with the time it's taking for this to get solved, they are asking simply for each Sailor that attended to be charged for the activitym all Sailors are in agreement for that. Sailor Mary informed RSM that she doesn't want to stay in line again so this need to be solved now. RSM extended apologies and advised finance team was already contacted by SS team, however, from his end, he was moving the whole charge $450 temporarely so it wouldn't reflect on their account anymore. The Sailors were very appreciative for the fast solution and thanked RSM a lot. RSM also noticed they were keeping separate accounts onboard and the loots were posted to only one account. Sailors confirmed that's how they want the accounts to be. RSM also informed as Rockstars they have a dedicated support from their assigned Rockstar Agent and they don't need to stay in lines for any issues, just report to theyr RSA. Sailors thanked a lot.

Description: Sailor Jared was in the Casino at approx 4 pm and won a jackpot on the machines. The casino host offered him a drink on the house and this was put through POS at 4:15pm. At 4:45pm Jared had still not received his drink and when he tried to get the attention of the bartender he was met with a rude attitude. Jared went to tell senior bartender Okta that casino was busy and what had happened him who then accompanied him to casino to make his drink. While making this drink bartender Nemanja argued with Okta in front of the sailor saying he had only been waiting 8 minutes (already too long) but was already waiting 30 mins. Nemanja began to get upset after this incident and sailor Jared reported that he had made comments to other sailors about him. Sailor Jared was very upset over the whole incident.
Resolution_Details: I met with sailor Jared not long after this incident and he was still visibly upset. I reassured him that this situation will be dealt with and that Nemanja will no longer work in the casino bar. I apologized very much for this and re-assured him that this is not tolerated onboard for crew to be rude to sailors.

After speaking to Alison I was left with the sense that sailor was asking for help because she doesn't know what to do and she doesn't know where he might be right now.
Resolution_Details: We told her that we would take care of her as we always do with everyone, we encouraged the sailor to enjoy the rest of her dinner but she was a bit shaken up.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Too much to text right now, but took over a day and a half to hear back from a team re: sea rover status which should have been automatically granted prior to arrival. Has impacted our priority embarkation, daily credits, and wifi. Team has provided multiple different and incorrect answers along the away - or simply said they couldn’t provide answers which is just as useless. Customer service is below expectations with better information found in convos with fellow cruisers. Unacceptable
Latest_Comment: HDA Virgil 1:05PM- Duplicate case SC-37173789940186449
Resolution_Details: 03/03 HDM OM: HDM called the sailor and apologized for her experience. As per the sailor, SS was not helpful and she got different answers on the same question. The sailor is also unhappy that it took us 2 days to confirm information with the office.  The sailor requested $80 charge to remove for the lotteria as a compensation. HDM removed the charge ton 9024. Also the sailor is asking to have a VIP access to RRT, the access was granted by SSD. The sailor appreciated the help.

Description: 3/2/2024 10:29 HDA Bagas : Sailor came at the desk to show their disappointment with their cabin, as per sailor once sailor came the cabin it smell weird, there are a lot of stain in the carpet, and then once  Kelly took shower  the door is fall on her ( she is pregnant ) HDA apologies  extend apologies and offer medical assistance sailor said she is okay, sailor requested to move, HDA could not find any other XL cabin, sailor was in hurry for brunch and looking forward to hear from us. HDA assure sailor that we are taking care of this case and will get back to them accordingly
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: the sailor replied that she is doing fine. And appreciated the flowers sent to her cabin.
Resolution_Details: 03/02 HDM OM: HDM met with the sailors and sincerely apologized for their experience. HDM asked if the sailor needs a medical assistance. The sailor refused. HDM informed the sailor that we are ready to apply $300 refundable SL on their account as a compensation for a downgrade. The sailors are asking to cover their spa treatment. As the sailor is pregnant and she was scared when the door fell. HDM sympathized with the sailor` experience and consulted with SSM who confirmed that the Spa treatment in amount of $398 can be compensated. The charge was moved to 9024. The sailors appreciated a help and left the desk satisfied.

Description: 01 March 2024 - Sailors want to split BT and SL
Latest_Comment: 01 March 2024 - Sailors were informed they would each receive $267 each in SL and their $300 BT would be split into $100 each. RSA explained that we cannot split their SL into those amounts as they have 2x $300 and 1x $200 and cannot split an amount. They informed RSA they booked the voyage from their friend who is a Virgin employee and informed them the loots can be split onboard. RSA advised sailors that she can reall0 the amounts already allocated but cAnnot split them, and can move drinks charges to Heather who has all the BT in the amount of $100. Sailors were not happy about this and requested to have the pots split how they were informed they would be.
Resolution_Details: Loots were moved $300 for Heather, $300 for Christine and $200 for Pamela, plus $100 added from our end to Pamela.
