Description: Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae and were seated on time. After a few minutes sailor Jeremy went to the desk and mentioned to RS that the drinks are taking too long to be served and that they have been sitting there for 30 minutes. RS apologized and mentioned to the sailor that we will follow up on this. When the sailor went back to his table the drinks were already served while he was at the desk, and upon checking with the server the drinks did not take long to be served. Also with the appetizer, it only took 9 minutes based on the time in the ticket. RM was also in the expo area taking care of the orders and saw that 9 minutes time frame. RS went to talk with sailor Jeremy and just apologized for the inconvenience he felt and assured that we will expedite their main course as well. At that time RS also noticed that most of the sailors in the party were already intoxicated.  After several minutes, SV came to the desk just to inform RS and RM that sailor Jeremy is not eating much and asked our assistance to check again if there is something wrong. RS approached the table to check and sailors mentioned that everything was fine. No further issues.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Description: 03/03/24 @12:45PM @HDA Barbara: Sailor Paul came to SS reporting that his father had an accident in the morning while disembarking in Puerto Plata. Sailor Andre is wheelchair bound, he has partial use of his upper body. While disembarking, the ramp on the Gangway had an app. 10 cm gap between the ramp and the ground. As sailor went on the round with his scooter due to the gap his front wheels bumped to the ground which changed the balance of the scooter and sailor fell forward to the ground. Sailor fell face first and had multiple bruises on his body, some surface scratches, his glass broke however both his knees got injured, one side more seriously. Medical response and assistance came after 5 minutes, and sailor Andre feels okay. Sailor was advised to go to the Medical Center for another check up in the afternoon. Sailor Paul says this was due to negligence and would like to ring our attention to the gap that was there. He says coming back onboard there was already an extra ramp attached, as seen on the photos. Sailor Paul said other sailors told him he could sue the company for negligence as the attached extra ram could have been attached earlier. Sailor says he is not here for that however he would like to bring our attention to what have happened as it could have ended up much worse.
Latest_Comment: 03/05/24 @21:35 HDA Barbara: HDA called sailors in the cabin to see if everything was okay, there was no answer
Resolution_Details: 03/05/24 @21:35 HDA Barbara: Nothing further unless sailor approaches

Description: HDA Virgil 4:26PM- sailor sent the following message to SQ "Just returned from sosua snorkel… the experience did not match the experience, at all… while I know that weather and sea conditions change things, we didn’t leave the bay that the ship was “docked” at… additionally the VV description. Fairly disappointed with the experience … thoughts?"

Your feedback has been documented and while immensely help us improve and better their tour for future. after investigating and communication with the local Tour Operator we have applied 30% discount towards your tour on your onboard account as authorized by the Tour Operator. Once again apologize for any inconvenience caused. Hope you had a lovely day in Bimini
Resolution_Details: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% Discount applied toward sailors tour.

Description: March 2nd at 20:00 RSA called RSM reporting that Sailor Jared is extremely angry as he reported the balcony door to be rusty making a noise when opened and also a gap in the bathroom shower gasket, the carpenter on duty visited the suite a couple of minutes before, however, none of the problems were fixed. RSA asked for RSM to meet with the Sailor. RSM checked that AIMS were still open and called Carpenter on Duty, who advised that both problems can only be fixed tomorrow morning as the silicone gasket needs to be replaced, at this time he had an emergency at Deck 15 Mega suite to attend to without an estimated time to finish. RSM informed that this has become an emergency as the Sailor has an aggravated mood. Carpenter on duty informed he is the only one on duty now and he cannot go back to the suite immediately, he will call RSM to check if when he can come back it will be a convenient time to go to 13011A. RSM proceeded to the suite.
Latest_Comment: 2 March 2024 - RSA received multiple calls and messages from SS stating Jared is looking for RSA and wants her to come to the suite. RSA was with sailors at the time and met Jared about 15 minutes after the last message from SS. RSA met Jared in the suite and he was visibly upset and stated the shower still leaks and the balcony door makes a screeching noise and hard to open it. He stated he reported the shower door in the morning to CH and a carpenter came but didn't fix the door. He mentioned the balcony door was making a noise but was not at that time. RSA apologised for the delay and called the carpenter on duty right away to come and assist in the suite. Carpenter came and had flipped a panel on the balcony door which made it easier to open but still made a screeching noise. Carpenter assessed the shower door and stated the rubber needed to be replaced. He received a call while he was assessing the shower door and stated he has to rush somewhere for an emergency and will have to fix the door in the morning. Upon hearing this Jared got more upset and stated he used his hard earned money to pay for this suite which cost him $9000 and should be prioritized as he is a VIP. RSA calmed Jared down and assured him both doors would be fixed by that evening. RSA contacted RSM to contact Carpenter to send someone to assist with both shower door and balcony door. Jared was getting irate at waiting for someone to come to the suite and started to speak loudly and stating he's not dramatic or high maintenance. CH and ACH came to the suite as Jared had seen them in the hallway and asked them if he did not report this in the morning. Jared demanded for CH to call his supervisor to come to the suite. DM came to the suite to talk with Jared, Jared was explaining his frustration towards not having the doors fixed and thought DM was laughing at him, RSA stated he's not laughing, Jared asked what is DM smiling about then, does DM think this is funny or a joke. RSA stated there seems to be a misunderstanding but jared ignored RSA and shouted that DM must leave his suite immediately. DM tried to calm Jared down but he was getting more aggravated and stated "If he does not leave, I will start swinging." RSA asked DM to leave the suite to avoid physical conflict. RSA called RSM to come to the suite as Jared had asked for RSM, DM was waiting outside the suite at this time along with CH. Jared saw that DM was outside the suite and shouted he doesn't want him anywhere near his suite and doesn't want to see him, DM left. RSA calmed Jared down and was chatting with him when RSM came to the suite. Jared and RSA explained the problem with the shower and balcony door to RSM. RSM contacted Carpenter supervisor for assistance.
Resolution_Details: March 4th at 12:23 RSM paid a courtesy call and spoke with Sailor Jared. Sailor mentioned he was sleeping but it is fine. RSM apologised for waking him up and checked if everything was fine. Sailor Jared confirmed everythign is great and mentioned RSA NJ is amazing. RSM tahnked for the comment and wished the Sailor a great day.

Description: HDA Vigil- Sailor approached ss desk asking o speak to a manager. I asked sailor if I can help them first. Sailor explained to me that they purchase a valuable stones on land forth $400 and when they tried to bring it on the ship, security took them and informed them that they cannot bring these on board and confiscated them to throw them back on land. Sailor wanted to speak to someone as they purchased these stones to take home. Sailor did not have any proof of payment and said that they bought them by cash. I asked SSM to come out and speak to a sailor.
Latest_Comment: 02/03 SSM: Sailor wanted to pursue further claim for the money they spent. SSM informed them that we can provide our post voyage team contacts and they will be assisted. Sailor accepted to receive the letter with the information. After departure SECO approached SSM and informed that the stones were kept onboard as they were cleared out from the port agent stating that they were not regular stones. SECO informed that we need clearance from MIAMI authorities to give back the stones. Sailors were informed and were very happy.
Resolution_Details: 03/06 SSM: Stones were given to Mr Armando by SeCo. Mr Armando was very grateful.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Horrible experience! It’s very clear Virgin is not prepared for full capacity sailings. Outside of Pink Agave every other dining experience has been horrible. I’m sitting in Extra Virgin right now with extremely salty carbonara, bread with no oil and vinegar, and a charcuterie board that never made it to the table. Service is horrible, which is apparently the new Virgin standard. This is our fourth and last Virgin sailing.
Resolution_Details: RM sincerely apologize for the unpleasant experience. To make amends, a complimentary glass of bubbly has been extended as a goodwill gesture. The feedback has been shared with our team to implement necessary improvements.

Description: Sailor ordered the fish but when he tried it was not of his like.
Resolution_Details: RM approached the table and offered to bring another fish or order another main course. But sailor mention he was find. Just he ahs not that hungry any more. So decided not to have a main course. He order dessert after and enjoy the dinner with us.

Description: ?Sailor went to Gunbae as a walk-in, RS explained that we are currently full and offered the sailor to be on the waitlist. Sailor agreed and after a few minutes he came again to check but was still declined as there were no cancellations yet. A few minutes later,  the sailor came back and approached RM if could come in, RM mentioned to give us a few more minutes as there were still no cancellations. 5 minutes later after the sailor talked to RM, he went to RS and insisted to come in saying that RM assured him to come back after 5 minutes. RS mentioned to RM the situation and so we decided to sit him.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Description: Sailor came to Gunbae at 5:43PM and wanted to come in saying that her companions are already inside, RS kindly inform the sailor that no one is inside yet. After a minute the sailor came back to the desk and insisted that they were already inside, again RS mentioned that no one was inside as we just opened so the sailor left.  At 6:30PM, sailors in cabin 10330a came to Gunbae for a 6:30PM reservation and only for 2pax, he was asking if it is possible for another person to join them. RS explained that we are currently fully booked and the other one will have to be on the waitlist, the sailor understood and was escorted to table 8. After several minutes, sailor Lola arrived and went straight to the table, RM approached the sailor and explained that she will be in the waitlist as she doesnt have a reservation, also the table can only fit 6 people because  of the chairs. Sailor does not want to be in the list and insists on sitting, she mentioned that she will wait at that table, squeezing in the chair with her friends and asking the other sailors if she can sit with them. RM went to the desk to inform RS of the issue, so we decided to transfer the 3 of them to another table with the booth.
Resolution_Details: For documentary purposes.

Sailor was not aware that it would stop at 12 midnight, he thought it would be ongoing all night. He also did not know that this only happens during Scarlet Night. His wife was fine, but he just couldn't handle the vibration in the suite. He did mention to RSA that he was offered a cabin or sleeping purposes, but he thought it would be a very tiny room and a low deck. RSA explained to him what the purpose is of a sleeping cabin. Sailor was very understanding and took a nap after breakfast with his DND sign on.
Resolution_Details: 03/04/2024 17:00 RSA LH: RSA explained to sailor the process of SN and that the music generally dies down at midnight. They were fine and understood, nothing further.

Description: RSA Gugu received the above message fon Conrad last night at 11:30pm - Hey gugu just really disappointed that our reserved seats were given away tonight. We rushed dinner at gunbai and made it on time (10) only to have to stand in the back. This is unacceptable. My wife (her 40th bday trip) was crying and embarrassed because she felt responsible for our friends that came on the trip. Please see us tomorrow to discuss.
Latest_Comment: March 3rd at 4:56 am Sailor Linday wrote a comment in the survey: "I like my cabin and I like the food but my reservations for my rockstar status for a show was given away when I showed up on time.  I wasn’t informed I had to be 10 min early or else my rockstar reservation would be given away. Why did I pay to be a rockstar? My rockstar agent looked at my dinner reservation and didn’t think I would need to move it to earlier. Unfortunately we rushed our dinner and then were still denied. I’m very upset. I think she is great but I am a new sailor on Virgin and I need her expertise to time everything appropriately. She has been so helpful with everything else but food and shows are the most important to me."
Resolution_Details: Sailors are happy and enjoying themselves.

The sailor shared that his vacation is ruined and he needs to be compensated. HDM sympathized with the sailor and invited him to SS to discuss the sailor`s experience. SSM apologized because there was no meeting the previous day however his concerns are understandable and for this type of situations compensations will not be applied as our security intervened and assisted both parties and protocols were followed for his claim. Mr James started adding that his towels and his bedsheets had "shit" on them and we were doing it on purpose, SSM asked him if this was reported and he claimed that all his experience was affected without replying to the question. SSM apologized and informed him there was no compensation to be given because the incident was taken care by our security team. Mr James got more upset and started recording SSM with his phone. SSM informed him he was not authorized to do that, sailor stated he was in his right. Mr James continued his argument, and he left the Sailor Services desk.

Description: Sailors had a reservation in Gunbae for a party of four and were seated on time. Upon check-in, RS confirmed to the sailors their Splash Dinner  for tonight and sailors mentioned that it was supposed to be in The Wake tomorrow. Sailors were escorted to the table to enjoy their dinner. RS realized that sailors thought it was only for one time. so explained to the sailors that they were entitled to do a brunch and a dinner with the Splash your bash package, sailors mentioned that they are not aware and that the package was not clearly explained to them.  RS apologized for the inconvenience, sailors were understanding and accepted our apology and also asked if it would be possible for them to have their Slash your Bash dinner with us tonight. RS gladly said yes.

Description: 03/04/24 10:17pm HDA BV: Sailor sent a SQ : "I messed up on the comment for the pink agave. I wanted to let you know that our server never really came back after our main meal was served. Someone served us our meal and then we never saw our waitress after that. A manager saw that we were finished and then gave us the dessert menu and dropped the dessert we wanted. After we were finished we had to ask some random worker if we can go now and she said to wait for our waitress. That random worker had to go up to the actual waitress to tell her that we were ready to go. She also didn’t explain the food very well like I heard another waitress tell her people at her table. The food was very good but that particular waitress was not. We were never asked if we wanted more water or anything . We had a feeling that we were forgotten that’s why maybe the manager stepped in to serve the dessert menu and dessert. I had actually thought that she was on break or something " / HDA answer: "Mila, we apologized for this experience at the restaurant. Be assured this has been already shared with our Restaurant Management team to follow up your concern, your comments are always important for us, we appreciate your time to bring this to our attention. Once again we apologized for all the inconvenience you had had today."
Latest_Comment: During the service, we approached the sailors and they mention they enjoy their experience. The reason we clean the table and served the dessert was because the server was busy with a big circle. Tomorrow I will contact direct the sailors. RM Paulo

Description: 03/04/24 9:16pm HDA BV: Sailor sent SQ "We went to the LOLz Supper Comedy and the first comedian was not funny at all. She asked the audience if there were any interracial couples and we commented that we were and advised what nationalities and she said oh the audience is full of white people and literally just blew us off like nothing and we did not matter. Like the only acceptable interracial couples have to be just a white person and any other race. That was totally uncalled for and prejudicial in my opinion. We met another couple and were talking about shows we went to and they happened to be at the same show and also heard that comment and thought it was wrong. we live in a diverse state and culture and that comment was not right in this day and age. I personally don’t think she has seen any other interracial couples of different nationalities than hers and as she says white people. We as a couple had to deal with racial bias in our relationship and for this comedian to do that in a public setting like that was unacceptable. The staff aboard this ship is very diverse in itself which is very nice but that specific comment during her show was not. / HDA answer: Ahoy Mila, thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the show. We really appreciate your time and feedback, this help us to improve our service. Be assured this will be shared with the related department as it's not the Virgin way to provide our rockstar service.
Latest_Comment: BOM forwarded feedback to ED and the Company Manager. SS was requested to send the above message to the sailor.
Resolution_Details: feedback received.

Description: 03/04 @8pm-DM received a call from CH stating that the sailor is yelling at them because they disturbed him as he was asleep when they rang the door bell and knock on the door
Latest_Comment: 03/04 @8:05pm-DM rushed to the cabin to know what happened and sailor was really aggressive with the CH/ACH stating they disturbed him.  CH went to the cabin as the cabin had a blue sign but the sailor was saying that he did not put that sign (sailor was loud and even using abusive or foul words.  DM apologized many times but the sailor did not even listen a thing.  He said, he paid 3700usd and why we need to invade his privacy and that we just random picked him to open his cabin as we probably suspect him for something.  "Am I a drug lord or something.  Until now I was so happy and enjoying the cruise, I even bought a 5000usd watch" Believe me, I want to get all your names and I will make hunt u down until the day that I die"  We did not say a word anymore as he seemed to be intoxicated.  Asst Exec. HK went as well but the same thing happened.  He was asking for compensation, of all the compensations that were offered to him, cabana, which he refused as why we offered such thing that he does not even want , the same goes for  thermal spa and lastly a round of drinks, but he mentioned that they are a family of 9 pax onboard and Asst Exec HK mentioned that we can arrange for all but then he said, oh we love to drink and I love to drink.  Offered a champagne to him and he said he would love to drink that alone and he was so happy, apologetic for how he behaved that he was a bitch and even hugged as.  At around 9:15pm, DM & AEHK went back to the cabin with the Moet in a bucket but he was not inside.  Then finally DM delivered the Moet at 9:35pm and sailor was so happy and hugged DM again and said not to take it personally.  DM thanked the sailor and left with the issue resolved.  DM advised as well to call 0 for SS if he wanted to have the cleaned tomorrow and he said, it does not matter if we come to clean or not.  CH will be instructed to call DM before cleaning the cabin tomorrow.
Resolution_Details: logged for reference

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I don’t understand how a cruise line that does so many things right can make such pretentious garbage of stage shows (Ships on the night, untitled dance). I don’t know how anyone can walk out of those 2 shows and say “wow that was great”. The actors are all very talented, it is a shame to waste them. This is our 5th cruise with Virgin and at this point I am not sure I will return since the entertainment has remained so much the same. You guys need to do something to keep repeat guests interested. Duel Reality is great and worth the repeat viewing, the rest is hardly worth viewing once.

Description:
My sailor from the massive Suite 15339a Mr David Hendricks is disappointed because we cannot provide another bottle of his favorite tequila for consumption in his room.
I delivered and charged him three bottles of tequila Don Julio 1942 to his personal account. Unfortunately as per BOM we cannot provide another one because there won't be enough for the following days and future voyages.
I came with the mixologist and we tried to offer another tequila instead but Mr. David likes only this particular one.
He understood that he can still get it at the bars per shots however he does not look satisfied at all.
Latest_Comment: March 5th at 00:01 BOM advised RSM that Sailor was at On the Rocks and a full bottle of 1942 was opened in front of him. As his bottle had just a little remaining, the recently bottle was kept with the Sailor to keep him happy.
Resolution_Details: March 5th at 00:01 BOM advised RSM that Sailor was at On the Rocks and a full bottle of 1942 was opened in front of him. As his bottle had just a little remaining, the recently bottle was kept with the Sailor to keep him happy. Nothing further.

Description: 3/04/2024 STS MANUELA - Sailor John joined the Sailing Catamaran and Coral Reef Experience in Puerto Plata on 03/03/2024.
Latest_Comment: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: Following messge sent to sailor on SQ: "Ahoy John! This is Tobyn, Assistant Shore Things Manager. I am just getting back to you in regards to your comments and feedback you gave regarding your tour in Puerto Plata. Firstly i would like to extend my apologies for your experience whilst on tour. Your feedback has been documented and while immensely help us improve and better their tour for future. after investigating and communication with the local Tour Operator we have applied 30% discount towards your tour on your onboard account as authorized by the Tour Operator. Once again apologize for any inconvenience caused. Have a lovely day in Bimini"
Resolution_Details: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% has been applied towards sailor tour, on the onboard account.

Description: 3/4/24 // 12:05PM // HDA TT: Sailor sent a message through SQ: "Yesterday’s ATV Countryside excursion in D.R. was dreadful and the quality/value was not close to being worth what we paid. We spent the entire day mostly on the open-air truck ride to and from the location, only rode the ATVs 20 minutes, and was told we had to wait before and after riding because they didn’t have enough ATVs. There were almost 50 people signed up and they only had 16 ATVs so they divided the group by 3, they did this coin toss process to determine who had to sit around and wait. We left the port late, so everything thereafter seemed rushed. We were last to head back to the port and initially it seemed we wouldn’t make it back in time because we had to wait for group 3 to ride the ATVs and stop by a woman’s house for a few minutes for an espresso. Also, the helmets for our heads were not thoroughly cleaned and disinfected between users which exposes each people to communicable diseases and germs. I watched as people were directed off and on the ATVs, likely due to tight schedule, and a guy walked by and randomly sprayed a little Lysol inside, which is not supposed to go on things that we wear on our bodies, and did not attempt to clean the eye covering. On the truck ride back, we got stuck on the dirt road because cars and people attending a funeral blocked the road, so we were just sitting waiting and then the truck ran over a motorcycle which was stuck under the truck. Some local people got it out. There was absolutely no cellular reception so there was no way to alert the ship as to our location or what was happening. When we finally made it back, I realized we had been gone 6 hours for an excursion that was supposed to be 3 hours; the whole day was practically gone so we had no time to shop in D.R. as we needed to swiftly get back onboard the ship."
Latest_Comment: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: Following message sent to sailor on SQ : "Good Morning Kanika! Its Tobyn here. just getting back tour in regards to your tour in Puerto Plata. We will be issuing a 30% discount towards you tour on your onboard account as authorized by the Tour Operator. your feedback and comments all has been documented which helps us immensely to work with shoreside and the local Tour Operator to better this tour for future. Once again we do apologies for any inconvenience caused. I hope you have a lovely day in Bimini today."
Resolution_Details: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% applied towards sailor tour on their onboard account

Description: 03/03/24 11:45pm HDA AC: The sailor sent a message on SQ that read: " Virgin Voyages had such a great thing going. The first time I was on it was an awesome cruise. Now I am on it and it is a mess. Every restaurant is booked for every time slot, no space for walk ins. I lost $6k in the casino in the first two days, the best the casino host could do is get a 9:30pm spot for us at the wake. If you can't accommodate the passengers, open the restaurants at 5 instead of 5:45. I enjoyed my last cruise and food was great, but I won't be back if I end up having to eat in the Galley because no decent restaurant has any space to serve us. As a travel agent, I will also inform my clients if the scarcity of dining reservations and not to get their hopes up to get the quality food I told them about the first time I was on!" HDA then responded to the sailor with a message that read:" Ahoy Peter! Good evening. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. I will make sure your comment is shared with the leadership as we are constantly looking forward to improving the service we provide on-board our Lady Ships. We are sincerely sorry that you haven't had any luck with your dining reservations during this busy voyage. Again as mentioned we have created a report on this and escalated it to our Restaurant Operations Manager.
Latest_Comment: Restaurant Leaders getting in touch with Mr. Peter to assist
Resolution_Details: On 03/04 2024 @ 8:40 am RS Nadia Gave a call to Mr. Peter listened empathized and apologized to the sailors and offered him Dinner reservations which Sailor appreciated a lot. Sailor chose his dinner timings as desired and appreciate the leadership follow up. We will monitor Mr. Peter dining experience in daily basis and ensure the recovery.

Description: 03/04/2024 STS MANUELA - Sailor Erin and Adam joined the Sailing Catamaran and Coral Reef Experience in Puerto Plata on 03/03/2024. Sailor said to be very disappointed. Adam could only do one snorkeling spot and Erin could not enjoy the snorkeling at all, as there were not enough life jackets for all Sailors on the boat. Sailor also said the tour returned one hour later to the port. Sailors are asking for compensation.
Latest_Comment: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: The following message sent to sailors on SQ: " Ahoy Erin! This is Tobyn, Assistant Shore Things Manager. I am just getting back to you in regards to your comments and feedback you gave regarding your tour in Puerto Plata. Firstly i would like to extend my apologies for your experience whilst on tour. Your feedback has been documented and while immensely help us improve and better their tour for future. after investigating and communication with the local Tour Operator we have applied 30% discount towards your tour on your onboard account as authorized by the Tour Operator. Once again apologize for any inconvenience caused. Have a lovely day in Bimini"
Resolution_Details: 03/05/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30% discount applied towards sailor tour on their onboard account.

Description: 03/04/24 // 13:32pm // HDA TT: Sailor sent a message through SQ: "Hello, I debated sending this but I ultimately decided to share some feedback on my experience at the Spa. Upon arrival, the receptionist walked me to a locker and walked away without at any point explaining how the locker locked, what spa amenities I could or could not use, or really any helpful information whatsoever. I booked a 75 minute deep tissue massage, and my masseuse Arcel essentially just inconsistently rubbed lotion and oil on my skin for 75 minutes. To say there was zero pressure is perhaps an overstatement. I say this in the spirit of constructive feedback and hopefully some retraining. I was disappointed to leave spending so much money and feeling the opposite of relaxed."
Latest_Comment: I have contacted the sailor and spoke to her. I conveyed my apologies to her and extended a 25% discount. I also changed the services to a Swedish massage  75mins instead. I thank her for taking the time to listen to me and she thanked me for taking the time to contact her.
Resolution_Details: Sailor was happy and said she didnt expect discount, just wanted for give feedback. She was grateful for the discount.

Description: March 4th at 12:38 after thanking for the follow up on the incident reported for the AC SC-37367654331181241, Sailor Jenna sent the following message: "Also Gabriel just as an FYI we really have not found the rockstar agent service to be as good as advertised. When we reached out this morning to schedule a massage we were instructed to call the spa. If I wanted to call the spa directly I would’ve done that. The spa is booked and it was my understanding that the agents would be able to help get reservations etc but that has not been the case. I’ve ended up having to call the sailor services desk repeatedly and they are generally bothered and rude. Not at all up to the standards I would expect for the premium prices you’re charging and not even close to the level of service we have on the other cruise lines we have been loyal to over the years. Definitely not what I expected when we decided to try Virgin". RSM extended apologies and found a message from RSA Tanya on the SPA group at 9:15 am without follow up. RSM called the SPA and help a slot for the Sailor at 16:30. Sailor asked if that is a convenient time for the massage.
Latest_Comment: 2X $100 PREMIUM WIFI REFUNDED.
Resolution_Details: At 16:22 Sailor thanked for the gesture and asked for dining reservation to be adjusted to 7 pm. Dinner adjusted to 6:30 pm. Sailor advised. Nothing further.

Description: Sailors reported to SS regarding the sewage smell in the cabin
Latest_Comment: 03/05/ 2024 HDA JKG. Sailor came to desk to inform the cabin is still a vey terrible smell and his wife cannot bae it. They have tried to air the cabin etc. HDA offered a cabin for sleep and apologized to the sailor. Sailor for sharing his concern and decided to apologies and leave mid conversation. HDA requested for he sailor to take a sea nd await a manager. HDM Was informed.
Resolution_Details: 04.03.2024  2:30pm Bathroom was special cleaned. however sailor is fine now. sailor thankful.

Description: 03/05/24 11:48am HDA BV: Sailor sent a SQ: "While at Bimini resort. Your bartender ATTILA WAS VERY aggressive towards me. I ordered two drinks and I wanted another drink. Attila got very aggressive by saying in a raised voice "I already ordered your drink" I asked what's the problem can I not get another drink. I asked him why are you talking to me in this manner. He then tries to cover by saying. "You can get whatever you want". I was so embarrassed and confused. I always thank the employee because they are very polite and are ready to greet you. So I was very surprised that Attila had such a very disrespectful attitude. I am not sure why he would be so upset by me ordering another drink. Even if I was changing my drink order shouldn't be a problem. I paid a bit more for my cruise because I wanted quality services. When I made my choice to choose virgin I did my research and the reviews I Read help me to make my choice to choose virgin voyages. I paid for my drinks by Scanning my wrist band. I basically paid for your employee to make me feel like I was not welcome. I should not have to be feeling this way. I am so disappointed." / HDA  answer: Janice, we apologize for this attitude from our crew. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the beach club. We really appreciate your time and feedback and, this help us to improve our service. Be assured this is already shared with the related department as it's not the Virgin way to provide our rockstar service.
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Vibe of the restaurant?, A: 3
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: First I was told I was there too early (30 minutes). However upon inspecting further your establishment, it was less than half capacity! After that I am placed in the “lounge for 27 minutes.Then I get my server Nikolai. After giving me the run down of the restaurant and telling me it’s the flagship of the Scarlet Lady when it comes to fine dining. Fine dining went down hilll! I ask for pepper he proceeds then walks away. Not a word. Any thing else? My pleasure! Nothing! Time passes my wife did not like the bean and corn appetizer and ask for the wedge salad in it’s place, reluctantly he complies. Upon receiving the salad, he placed down and again proceeded to leave. Again, no thank you, is that all? ,may I get you anything else? Nothing! Not one word but instead walks away as if I was bothering him! Now he leaves a wine menu on the shelf right next to me after I told him we didn’t need it. Our second course still hasn’t come out yet, the the next table has gotten there’s. The second waiter apologized for the inconvenience and got right on it. Now the final straw, my table is covered with water and butter. He proceeds to place my new silver ware on the dirty table before cleaning it! I tell him this and he just pushes or utensils to the side instead of 

 
 









removing them and cleaning it properly .
Latest_Comment: Sailor came back for brunch on Bimini 03/05. were seated next to the window. RM apologies to the sailors and RM follow up with sailor order for brunch , sailors request extra hot food. Sailors happy with attention
Resolution_Details: VIR #: SC-37462575950449325 Mar 4, 2024 10:28 PM Sailors mentioned that fillet mignon was too smoky for them. RM apologized and explained that any kind of wood is not used at the venue. RM offered to change the dish. However sailors refused. RM Tetiana called chef to approach the table. Alternative options were offered to the sailors, but sailors refused. Chef were called to talk to the sailors and offer to the sailor any alternative dishes except file, however sailor refused. During dinner experience sailors check next table to them and ask server what did they have, server mentioned that its espresso martini with shot of Bayles and sailor order the same, however when drink were served to the sailor he didn't like it. Server Nikolay informed RM Tetiana right away about sailors experience and RM apologies, drink were voided from the sailor account. RS checked the table and asked how's their experience. Sailors mentioned that they were not happy with the service. Espresso martini was not good as per the sailor and did not like it. RS apologized and offered to remove the charge from the account. RM was informed. RS mentioned to the sailors that they will be taken cared for next dining experience. Sailors were happy with the follow up.

Description: Tablet or TV Issue

Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The service (for the most part) is horrible. There have been a couple of people who were great such as D at Extra Virgin out first night, Naveen at the Wake for brunch, Jessa in the galley, & one helpful custodian who’s name I failed to get. 

Almost every meal had been served cold.

The clientele leaves little to be desired (though I realize this isn’t some the company can control). The fact there were swingers at the PJ party nearly having sex on the lounger my friends & I (and others) were on with crew walking by without saying anything is disgusting. 

Sadly, I’m an avid cruiser but will not sail with VV again. This has been a huge waste of money & loss of vacation time. I do believe the company should do some better marketing to allow those of us who might be considered “prudes” a better idea of how to set expectations.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: The sailor read the message, however, there was no response
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 03/05/24 4:00pm SQ sent by sailor: "Good Afternoon. We had reservations for the Wake Yesterday. We were 30 min late and our reservation was cancelled even after calling sailor services. I called again and they told me I could show up and we’d be “fine”. So we showed up, and were treated extremely bad. We were 1 hour past our reservation and explained the issue. We even said we called. The host said “well you didn’t call me, it must have been sailor services”. We were added to the waitlist, and never got a message. We booked that reservation weeks in advance. I asked if we’d be able to get in tonight, and told “probably unlikely”. This was extremely disappointing, and I was extremely happy and grateful that Pink Agave got us in, and also got us a table even with a wait. Is there anyway we could get a reservation tonight. We brought my mother for a special occasion, and after dressing up and being very excited we didn’t get in. If there is anything you could do that would be amazing! That was the one dinner we looked forward to." // HDA answer : "Ahoy Cody, we apologize for the experience you had last night at The Wake, be assured this has been already shared with the Restaurant Manager. Also we requested the booking for tonight, they will do the best to accommodate you, however we cannot guarantee at this time if it will be confirm. Can you be so kind to share with us for how many people should be the booking?"
Latest_Comment: 03/05/24 17:25 HDA AI: HDA called the wake manager and ask if there is something we can do about this situation. Wake manager told HDA that they have only 21:30 time and they can come than but if they have other restaurant they would need to cancel it .Sailor agreed on that and told that he confirms that.

Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 2

Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This rating is about the Horserace painting/Ali the Artist, but there was no category for that so this was the closest. We’ve done the seahorse race multiple times before and both times with Ali have been subpar and awkward experiences especially compared with other Happenings Cast interactions. She has a standoff demeanor and makes it seem like the Sailors are inconveniencing her scheduled. Every other race we’ve done, the artist has offered two sessions or at least one two hour session. Here we were offered one one-hour session or to be sat on the side of a separate event. While I know this isn’t a directed session, other artists have made themselves available, offered some input and suggestions, or at least had fun and positive interactions during the session. She also maintained more of an authoritarian attitude during the painting and racing session than lighthearted fun. While our group wasn’t impacted, one group was a little late for the race coming from Drag Bingo and they were only afforded a few minutes to arrive (we were also told we could be a few mins late while the mock race was completed), yet the mock race and intros took close to 30 minutes. We’ve had very positive connections with other Happenings cast members over our 11 Virgin Voyages but Ali doesn’t seem to invite those interactions.
Resolution_Details: Feedback received and passed on to PSM and cast member

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Virgin Voyages has been my cruiseline of choice since 2021. I've cruised 7 times and booked two groups on Virgin. But I see things changing. I feel like you are becoming more like every other cruiseline. It use to be that every crew member would speak to you. Now not only do they not speak but they seem to always be annoyed. Of course there are exceptions but this now seems to be the norm. I have always raved about the food. Now not so much. Again, as the ships have gotten more towards capacity at sailings, your attempt to make it more efficient, you've made it feel like other cruiselines. The galley use to feel special in itself that you could walk around and view what selections were available, then sit down and be waited in. Now, while convenient and probably quicker, you stand in line, tell them what you want, and they prepare it and hand it to you when ready. New take on buffet. Then I made a reservation at the test kitchen after looking at the menu on the app for that evening only to get there and be told that that menu wasn't available until two days from then. I had tried this particular menu before and did not like it. So I was very disappointed. I would not have booked had I known. You also changed the menu at Razzle Dazzle. While there are those who like smoked flavor, it is an acquired taste. A few items are fine but it seemed that since it's in vogue, you want to make it the main flavor for most of the dishes. Smoked flavored cream burlee. Seriously! Next, you used to have excellent shows. Different, but that's what made them special. Now it seems like very little effort it put into them. I am so sorry that I sound so negative, but I loved everything about the Virgin Voyages Brand. So seeing you become more and more mainstream is disappointing. I loved how special I felt rather I was in a regular cabin or suite. I understand business, profit and stakeholders, but please don't forget Richard Brandon's vision for a casual luxury sustainable cruiseline.
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: ABOM and BOM were checking the Sip Lounge when they were stopped by the Sailor Mrs. Werner, asking about the uniforms and how the rank works after Augusto and Conor did ask about his experience, and unfortunately, He was not happy with basically everything, boarding, bar service, restaurant service and service in general, being a regular sailor in other companies he tends to compare, and Augusto and Conor try to explain the Virgin idea, that is very different than Disney or Crystal that the sailor mention, from the simple point as having cold wet towels at the gangway when we dock, or the Shore experience on the Purto Plata, that 30% discount was not the case, but more about the expectation on the experience. Augusto and Conor apologize for the overall experience, they told him that the concerns and ideas will be logged to improve if that is the case, but we also explained that some services and entertainment do differently and we are looking for different ways to Voyage, that the service experience isn't what we want to provide, we keep looking to improve and provide a premium service, he like that ABOm and the BOM took time to listen to him, we thanks him for all the feedback and the sailor left a bit happier.
Latest_Comment: The conversation was logged on IM for further review.
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 5

Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 1

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I paid for 3 hours at redemption spa and noticed I was charged for 6. I went Monday from 9-12. During that time there was no water available anywhere from 9-10:30. Considering you are in saunas and steam rooms that is dangerous. I was so dehydrated when I left. I was given a locker and no other instructions. I was traveling with a friend and she had our bar credits on her wrist thing so if I wasn’t with her I couldn’t drink and Tuesday night mine wasn’t even charged to hers it was charged to mine. This was not the cruise for me I guess. I thought having no kids would be great and relaxing but instead it was a frat party for four days. We went to the Test Kitchen for dinner. I’d have to say the worst meal ever. I didn’t stay for the entire thing. On the app what the menu was advertised was not what was served. I dont eat fish and my only other option was lamb which I don’t like. The app menu said it was beef. It was very uncomfortable for me. I realize the manager of the test kitchen was trying to help but I was insulted. He came to the table and said maybe this wasn’t for me and I could go to another restaurant. I say maybe if you had the right menu this wouldn’t have happened. Our cabin steward was wonderful as well as our server at pink agave. The one thing I was really hoping to do was the bungie workout. I tried to sign up as soon as I boarded at 2:00 and all the slots were already full.
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
This evening in RD around 8.40 pm while I was walking around the venue I encountered a lady, Miss Anjanette, who was approaching RS Bart with a very serious feedback. Right in that moment I heard the beginning of their conversation and step in right away: sailor were explaining how she was feeling discriminated and how hurt as well she felt that somehow many time and in different restaurant, as this is not her first voyage, she ended up being seated only with black people as well as of now. Sailor mentioned she had a picture from her previous voyage and she could prove it. 

Sailor explained to me her perception and how this was not being fair as VV is all about inclusivity and she loves our ships and our concept. RM listened to everything she wanted to share and sincerely apologized, in the first place, if she felt this way, RM reassured her that was not done on purpose but only based on table availability. RM promised to escalate this matter to ROM to make sure it is properly addressed.
Latest_Comment: QSM joined RM in Razzle after few minute, RM reported the situation and a meeting with sailor were set for 9.30 pm in SS with ROM
Resolution_Details: ROM met up with Sailors. Sailors mentioned that wanted to share an observation with us that felt needed to be addressed. She felt like we were grouping; brown people on one side of the restaurant and non-brown people on the other side. ROM thanked her for her feedback and informed her that this is not done by intention and that we are sorry she felt that way. Sailor thanked ROM for taking the time to listen.

Description: Sailors came to make a reservation for the venue. Sailor was very rude and shouted to RS and ARM when they were told that there was no available slot as they want an earlier booking.
Resolution_Details: RS apologized to the sailors and offered to be accommodated for the night but they refused and wanted to choose their own timing. Other sailors were in line waiting to check-in and got annoyed with the sailor's behavior.  RS apologized to the other sailors and ARM accommodated the Mr. Jean and his wife on the side to discuss the reservation details. Sailors agreed in the end to have their reservation at the most possible time they could be accommodated which is the least seating for the next night. RS made the reservation. FYI

Description:
Sailors from room 9186z have dining experience in TK tonight. 
Server Last brings to our attention that ladies are looking for  specific rose wine from winery Gerard Bertrand, Cote the Roses, stating that they always drink this wine on-board. 
Sailors were approached, the sommelier offered them different choices of rose wines and explained that Cote de Roses white  is available and it's part of our program. They refuse to taste Gris blanc, a rose from the same winery. 
They complained that they did not have a really good experience from boarding time.
Resolution_Details: Sailors were advised that Cotes De Roses Rose has never been part of our beverage program and we have never carried this item onboard. Sailors still felt that this was not true although it is fact and questioned the crews knowledge. Apologies were still extended for the inconvenience and assistance. RM Bruno refund their drinks.

Description: 03/07/24 2:36PM Sailor approached the desk sharing her concern about the ADA accessibilities services and areas for her. Sailor mentioned about the ramp at the gangway (it's not the right size) is not secure at all . Shore things excursions no one is an option for her.  HDA tried to have more details but sailor is concern about this and she wants to talk with someone above to express all her concerns.  HDA listened carefully and empathized with sailor about this. We mentioned this will be shared with HDM and sailor asked for someone above, (the person who is charge of the security onboard and all the experiences onboard). HDA mentioned this will be shared with SSM.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called the sailor and invited to talk about her experience. As per the sailor, she is a lawyer who works in the company that protects the rights of people with  disabilities. The sailor started with the positive experience - as per her , the ADA cabin she is staying in - is one of the best ADA cabins she has ever stayed in. However, the gangway and metal detector are completely out of ADA compliance. The ramp on a gangway is not safe and the sailor is not able to go ashore as she doesn`t want to put herself or someone else in a danger. The metal detector should be 32 inches from the wheelchair so the sailor can safely pass it without touching the detector itself. The sailor is highly disappointed that she will not be able to leave the ship and will definitely report it to the right organization. Overall, the sailor loves the ship and staff, everyone is kind and friendly. The sailor is not blaming the crew, however the company needs to pay fine to fix the issue. HDM sympathized with the sailor and her experience. HDM explained how our spaces on board are accessible and if the sailor would love to use any of those facilities - we are here to assist. HDM offered some onboard experience to release the frustration and make the time on board more enjoyable which the sailor politely declined. HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback and assured that it will be shared with the office. The sailor thanked for the time and left the desk.
Resolution_Details: 03/08 HDM OM: The case is open for documenting purposes

Description: HDA YANS- Sailor send message in Support Chat  "Why is it that my neighbors can see into my balcony and I can see on theirs? No privacy?! Very unhappy and concerned." Both sailors mentioned that they had to call a couple of times to get a solution for this and they were upset and stressed because they wanted to enjoy the scarlet night. Both sailor stated they were trying to celebrate Ms Anjanette birthday and the fact that they were having a sister trip, specially after their parents died they were feeling very emotional. SSM listened to their concerns and they stated that just a cabin change will not be enough, they were looking to feel relaxed in this voyage and so far it didn't happened. SSM apologized about the experience of waiting and the stress and offered them to have a thermal pass to which they stated it was not enough to solve their concerns. SSM extended the thermal spa pass for both days and a manicure for Anjanette. Both sailors agreed, bookings at the spa were done and SQ message with the information was sent.

Description: March 6th at 18:45 RSM received a call from HDM asking for Sailor John to be escorted to 15331Z as he was interested in upgrading to the suite. RSM asked MRSA to escort the Sailor to the suite and call him with feedback. Sailor shared if he upgraded he wanted all friends (7 in total) to have access to the suuite, unlimited bar and Mega services. Also, he added if he upgraded to the Fab Suite his cabin should be given to one of his friends in a lower category for free. Sailor also shared he was not happy that at first he was informed the total price for upgrade would be $10.275 and then $8.220. MRSA informed the Sailor she would reach out to RSM.
Latest_Comment: At 21:27 Sailor wrote the following message: "I spoke with my group and we have choose not to move forward. The word segregation and segregated was used and offend me personally. As a person of color that sounded personal. We have already had a bad experience on deck 7 asking question's and not getting a correct answer. Agent said $10k and you came back with a less price. Lastly, I understand the beach has a separate area for people in a suite but using segregation to describe the environment came off wrong. Goes back to the point of already being viewed based on our color of our skin. We rather just keep to ourselves and make the best of this Voyage. Last thing it's not about the money it's about the experience abroad the ship."
Resolution_Details: March 7th at 09:15 MRSA responded to the chat extending apologies the Sailor feels this way and will feel sorry he will not upgrade. Sailor informed his comments would be relayed to leadership. SSD,SSM and HDM informed.

Description: 03/08/24 07:29pm HDA AC: The sailor sent a message on SQ that read: "Hello. Earlier I ordered a FROSE at the bar near the pool for $13. I was disappointed because it looked like all ice to me. I asked for it to be remade and the bartender said it was fine the way it was. I asked for a different drink. I asked to see the menu. I was then ignored. I finally left the drink. Please refund the $13." HDA then replied to the sailor with a message that read: "Ahoy Teresa! Good evening and thank you for contacting sailor services. Firstly we would like to extend apologies for the service by crew, we have taken note of this and have escalated it to the Bar Manager and they will address this accordingly and also the charge will be rectified as per request."

Description:
Q: How was your bar experience?, A: 3
Q: Vibe of the bar?, A: 3
Q: Menu choices?, A: 1
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: There are too many bars on this ship and not enough quality restaurants.  We’ve been on many cruises, however this is the first Virgin cruise we’ve taken .. We SMELLED VOMIT on numerous occasions walking through the ship .  Obviously from people vomiting alcohol from being drunk .  The fact there are NO quality restaurants without making a reservation is unacceptable for us .  We could not get a reservation due to all of them being sold out nightly.  We felt ripped off quite frankly . You advertise Virgin as a higher quality experience but in reality you are actually sailing a floating bar so that you can bring in extra very lucrative bar bucks! You seriously need to rework the entire experience. Yes bars are fine but quality (and available) meals and entertainment are also an important part of the overall cruising experience. The hype on the scarlet night experience was a total disappointment.  We attended .. wore red and felt the whole experience was a bar crawl that was a total bore .  Dancing was minimal what we saw and we left .  The wedding was a bit strange . Some of the crew members were not trained in that realm and whole thing was amateur.  Disappointment is what best describes our experience on this ship .
Latest_Comment: Restaurant supervisor Nadia talked to MR. Darrell, express the apology, and make them reservations for 5:45 at the  Gunbae on 3/8 and The wake at 5:45 on the 3/9.
Resolution_Details: Restaurant supervisor Nadia talked to MR. Darrell, express the apology, and make them reservations for 5:45 at the  Gunbae on 3/8 and The wake at 5:45 on the 3/9. Sailors were very happy.

It's worth noting that the sailor had not consumed much food either, but when queried, they did not voice any dissatisfaction. A negative comment is anticipated given the circumstances.
The ticket for the order was not delivered, resulting in the sailor waiting for 20 minutes to receive the two espresso martinis.
Resolution_Details: The restaurant manager sincerely apologized for the inconvenience caused.

Description:
My sailors booked the massage for 9.15 am specifically as they travel with a bog circle and they have lots of other activities. Resolution_Details: RSA Mel apologized and thanked Sailors for feedback

Description: SURVEY FEEDBACK: Ordered bulleit bourbon  waitress came back and told us it was unavailable so we selected buffalo trace. Waitress told us we would see two charges for each drink but that the supervisor was crediting the bulleit. When I checked my ship account this morning the credit had not occurred and I contacted guest services who said they would follow up with the supervisor. I’m a little surprised that on a 4 day cruise I have to double check my account to make sure this is done and fill out a survey already. The reliance of this app for sailors is a bit extreme. It’s my vacation, not Virgin’s marketing research time.
Latest_Comment: This check was voided at 7 am yesterday morning and unsure why the sailor was not advised of this. the sailor will not see a refund on the app - the balance just reflects the refunded charge but no transaction specifically saying "Refund" shows. Will follow up with the sailor though to put their mind at ease.
Resolution_Details: 03/10 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 03/08/2024 hda jkg. Hi so the floor above us is very loud again with banging in the galley I think.Please ask them to be more quiet -I am sorry to hear of this disturbance. We can offer you a sleeping cabin for sleeping if you are unable to take rest. If you would prefer to move completely we can offer this for you. SAILOR - I’m not sure I want to move I just wish there was a way to keep it more quiet up there I think it’s the kid to the trash can right over our room can it be moved? - I have requested for the area manager to please take a look and request for less noise and activity. However i cannot promise this will be better. As crew is at work. -  Thank you -Please if this does not get better. Know that you are welcome to move for sleeping purpose.
Latest_Comment: Ahoy Summer! It is Olya from Sailor Services. First of all, please accept our apologies due to the noise. We would like to inform you that in case you experience some noise again during the night, you may dial 0 and we will offer you a cabin for the sleeping purposes. Have a great evening!
Resolution_Details: 03/06 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 03/08/2024 HDA JKG. Hi... is it normal to have a noise coming from the gym above? Someone is working out and is creating a constant thumping noise ocer our room. - Thank you for informing. We will have someone go take a look and request for less activity. Should you still be unable to rest we can offer you a cabin for sleeping.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: The sailors are ashore, to give a courtesy call.
Resolution_Details: 03/09 HDM OM: HDM called the sailor and confirmed that the noise went away. The sailor doesn`t need a cabin for the sleeping purposes. HDM offered any further assistance, the sailor appreciated

Description: 07 March 2024 - Sailors stated they waited a long time to receive order
Latest_Comment: 08 March 2024 - RSA spoke Jared and asked hi how his food was, he said it was cold as it had been ready for a while but not delivered. RSA spoke to SE supervisor and he confirmed that it took 25 minutes to be delivered from the time the order was placed. RSA inquired about the message Jared received, he stated he "bumped" the order which sends a notification that it is out for delivery but actually its being prioritized and being made not out for delivery yet. It took about 8 minutes to deliver the order once it left SE as the QSA had to wait for the elevator and walk from the AFT to the FORWARD to deliver the food.
Resolution_Details: QSM Hamed met with Jared , apologized, emphasized and assisted. Jared asked for cookies to the room and was delivered in timely fashion.  Cabin will be prioritized for the rest of the voyage.

Description: Sailors did not like Carrots main course; Sailors were offered an alternative and decided to go for V Chicken; Sailors were offered an apology;

Description: Sailors approached RS Bart at the front door at 6.15PM with the reservation for 6.45PM; Sailors asked if they can dine earlier; Sailors were informed that unfortunately we could not accommodate earlier dining due to full first sitting; Sailor opted to sit at the bar; in the meantime team managed to sit Sailors in the bar area and also offer food service so they can finish their dinner quicker- ARM Kenta communicated this to Sailors; the order was taken promptly by a server, food was delivered in a timely manner, especially considering that kitchen was busy with first sitting orders; Sailors were approached by RS Bart while waiting for main courses- even though food was not late, RS Bart offered to check with the kitchen on their mains as they were concerned that they will be late for the show; mains were delivered after another approx. 2 minutes; several minutes later Sailors were already gone from their table- no one even saw them leaving so they must've left in a hurry;
Resolution_Details: for documentation purposes only

Description: 08 March 2024 - Sailor has had multiple incidents this voyage.
Latest_Comment: 08 March 2024 21:15pm - RSA, SSD and AEH met Jared outside the suite and he reiterated what he had told RSA and AEH to SSD. He also stated that this voyage is the worst he's been on. Last week he was in 13011A and enjoyed his voyage but stated he didn't like his CH as the suite was dirty and there was hair in the bathroom from previous sailors that stayed in the suite. RSA commented with surprise as he didn't mention the suite was dirty or hair in the bathroom to anyone. He stated that he didn't have any issues on his last voyage but this time there are a lot of issues especially with the food. At the Galley the servers will wipe down the counter and hand food to sailors without changing their gloves which will cause cross contamination. He was served raw chicken from the Diner and Dash and when he spoke to the Chef he didn't seem to be bothered and fried another batch of chicken wings in 3 minutes, which he stated that chicken wings take 7 minutes to cook, he would know as he owns a restaurant. The food at SE has  been cold and arrives late. The steak at The Wake was overcooked , he had asked for medium. The sanitizers' around the ship are not working and addressed AEH as he had mentioned the ones on Deck 6 & 7 were empty or not working, the Midship and Forward sanitizers' on Deck 12 by the elevators were not working as. AEH  stated that she called the electrician to fix the sensor and he stated its not working, SSD, AEH, RSA and Jared went to the Forward elevator to check the sanitizer and it was working. SSD, AEH, RSA and Jared all headed to the Galley as Jared didn't want Hamed (QSM) to think he is upset with him. He proceeded to test the sanitizers' by the entrance of the Galley and they were not working, AEH called for assistance with refiling and fixing the hand sanitizers' at the Galley entrance. When SSD, RSA, AEH and Jared reached the Dine rand Dash we found Hamed and SSD informed RSA and AEH they can leave as it was late (21:51pm) at that time. RSA and AEH excused themselves and left SSD, QSM and Jared together at the Galley. As RSA and AEH were walking out of the Galley 2 Public area attendants were refilling the hand sanitizers'. RSA offered meeting with SSD - Jared declined.
Resolution_Details: 03/10 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 03/09/24 1:40pm Sailor sent SQ notification: "Hello, we just wanted to let someone know we found a very sharp screw in the sabd at our Cabana. Also, the desk attendant Jules has been VERY rude to all of us (Cabin 10306A and 10350A) about our cabana braceletd. She basically accused is of lying about how many bracelets we'd been given. I am now dealing with this on my birthday instead of relaxing. They are incredibly difficult. We've left to come back to the ship stay FINALLY after multiple coversations with them to get the last two bands we needed. " / HDA answer: Ahoy Amanda, we apologized for the experience you had at the Beach Club. Thank you for your time to share this with us, definitely this is not the way we provide our Rock star service. Be assured this will be share with the management team to follow up and take action on this matter.
Latest_Comment: Ahoy Amanda! My name is Olya. I am from Sailor Services. First of all, Happy Birthday. We hope you enjoyed your birthday voyage and we wishing you all the best. I know you had some rough seas during your Bimini day with cabana. I personally would like to apologize for your experience. May I offer you a round of drinks on us during you dinner tonight at Gunbae? As an apology and a Happy Birthday gesture from our side. Please let me know if you would like to meet in person to share your experience. Have a wonderful dinner and evening on our beautiful lady ship
Resolution_Details: 03/09 HDM OM: HDM contacted RM Tetiana and notified that the first round of drinks will be on us. If the sailors don`t want drinks, we can offer a Treat Yourself. The sailor appreciated attention. HDM asked to serve the birthday cake to the sailor if one available.

The app has barely worked so I haven't been able to book a single dinner & when I showed up at dinner with my friends as guest services advised me to do, I was rudely told that they couldn't let me in. My bathroom was dirty with hair on the shower. No washcloths either.

Description: Sailors comment that : Gunbae first night-dinner was two hours.  Server forgot to play game until we asked.  He should have started grilling the food while we played.  Ordered KPop drinks for the disco ball for photo but we were brought regular glasses with no apology or explanation until we asked.  And no recovery was offered either.  One person allergic to seafood.  Seafood platter set next to him on the table.  It sat there for a while until another table mate moved it.  Allergic person given salad assortment to share even though several items contained seafood allergens.  Overall the allergy was not handled well.
Latest_Comment: Sailors were informed and approached during dinner experience that seafood will be cooked in last moment after meat and if sailor can smell it which sailors informed that they can smell in and fine to be seafood cooked at the last moment for sailors who were on same table experience. FYI.
Resolution_Details: Sailors were contacted and as apology drink were voided.

Description:
Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 1
Q: Are there any shows or activities that you would like to see that we don't currently offer?, A: NA
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 2
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities during the day?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is our first Virgin cruise . We have sailed  Princess several times and  Celebrity and carnival cruises . Most of all the food and dining fall well below our expectations .  Our coffee every morning is never hot .   It’s just warm after putting our cream in it.  Room service is always booked as is this dining situation you have on this ship .  The food in the food court set up you have is below average from our experiences of dining on other ships.   When we wake up and can’t get a hot cup of coffee without having to purchase it at that coffee bar ..  it’s very annoying .  Last night we had reservations in Gunbae…  but we refuse to sit in group sitting so we left .  The fact that we pay high prices then are forced to sit with other passengers to dine is unfair .  We are non drinkers . Bring forced to sit with other passengers that are drinking heavily is not what we expect from booking this cruise .  We had to eat the Chinese food in the food court and the selection is pitiful and the sweet and sour chicken was slimy and gross .
Latest_Comment: Sailors dining in The Wake tonight. Restaurant Leaders will get in touch and assist.
Resolution_Details: On 03/09/2024 @18:00 Sailors dining at the Wake Restaurant where Restaurant Leaders ensured a great dining experience. Sailors were having a great time and left very thankful for the extra care and attention given.

Description: A hair was found on her hamachi.
Latest_Comment: We apologized for the convenience, throughout the rest of the night we ensured that everything else was perfect.
Resolution_Details: We complimented the sailor with a glass of wine and sailor appreciated the follow up and concern.

Description:
Q: How was your bar experience?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: 1
Q: Vibe of the bar?, A: 1
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I’m not a heavy drinker and that seems to be the entire focus of this cruise line. Drinking is fine but the overall experience needs work. It’s like you can’t have a good time unless you’re wasted! Me personally do not need to be wasted to have a good time. Good food and good experiences with people that aren’t wasted is what I seek. This cruise line does not seem to provide this. Very unlikely I will choose virgin again. Might recommend to an 18 year old that just wants to stay drunk all the time!
Resolution_Details: Logged for feedback as this is a personal preference that we cannot influence.

And the employee says “oh I was talking to them” the whole experience was awkward and unprofessional. I didn’t appreciate that interaction.

Description: 03/09/24 // 7:22pm // HDA TT: Sailor sent a message through SQ very disappointed with what was provide by the cabana service today: "Also, the cabana rental was not seamless. The staff is very kind but need more training. The listing on the app said thermal spa was included. It also said we would be offered welcome fresh pressed juices. It also said we could order ships eats menu items but the app would not load and we were not given a menu. We also weren’t shown any special retail items for purchase. If I had not just checked my bill I would have been overcharged by nearly $140. I am disappointed. I went and found a galley menu in the galley and carried my own food up without a tray. I then asked to buy a bottle of $30 Rose’ on the menu. I was told they don’t have that and I was offered a $49 bottle that I bought. On land that bottle cost $13. I was under the impression that renting a cabana was a luxury. It should have been much more seemless. I would appreciate the thermal spa charge removed and at least half the cabana rental charge removed as well."
Latest_Comment: Cabanas charges was removed, and message was send to try another contact to the Sailor by Augusto ABOM.
Resolution_Details: Charges were voided.

Sailor also mentioned that their cabin host didn't meet them on the first day. Sailor Amy said that it is their 3rd voyage on Virgin and these small details could use some improvement.

RM Gunbae was informed to give extra attention. Depts in charge were shared the feedback.

Resolution_Details: RM explained that usually rib eye are more fatty that other kinds of meat cuts. But it was offered another main course. She said was already full. Server ensure she had a nice experience and deliver everything she order the fastest as he can .

Description: 03/07 Sailor reported to RSA Mel that the bathroom door does not lock. RSA Mel reported to CH David and aims was logged - carpenter investigated. on 03/08 CH David advised RSA Mel that there is more work needed to fix the door and that it can only be done once back in Miami.

I had a great time and would definitely cruise with Virgin again but only if I could get a decent deal. Between the higher than average fare and the lack of a drink package, I just don’t know if it’s worth it for me to cruise frequently with this line.
Resolution_Details: 03/10 HDM OM: The feedback is registered

Description: Sailors approached the RS during brunch to confirm the reservation for dinner for a group of 17. RS checked and informed the sailors that their reservation for dinner is in TK. Sailors mentioned that they confirmed with the shore side a month ago that their dinner will be at TW.
Latest_Comment: ROM Harry met up with Sailors and informed them that we will not have a table for 17 available at that time. However we will accommodate them in the same area on smaller tables. The Sailors thanked ROM.
Resolution_Details: RS apologized and informed the sailors that the reservation details were from the shore side as approved. RS explained that TW is willing to accommodate the group, however, the venue was fully booked in the evening making it not possible. RS called the attention of the RM. RM spoke to the sailors and apologized. RM also informed the sailors the willingness to accommodate them, however, due to the status of the venue, it will be difficult. Rm apologized to the sailors and informed sailors that they will have brunch at the venue the following day. Sailors were upset and left. FYI

Description:
My sailor from the massive Suite Bryan Lanzello who is traveling with us third time is extremely disappointed because there was not cabanas available for him to book in Bimini Beach club for him and his friends.
I explained him that unfortunately all cabanas were booked up in advance and I contacted shore ex team to book one for them in case someone will cancel.
Bryan is upset as he doesn't feel the perks of being on deck 15 for the third time.
Resolution_Details: 03/09/24 ASTM Tobyn: MRSA enquired regarding available cabana's for this voyage, but unfortunately all cabana's were booked and we had received no cancellations throughout the voyage.

Description: IM created for record purposes. Sailors had no dining reservations booked pre voyage, RSA Mel made bookings for the two sailors every evening at different restaurants before the sailors embarked. RSA Mel met with sailors on embarkation and advised sailors that she had made them bookings. Sailors were thankful and mentioned that they are sailing with 2 other non-Rockstar sailors and that they would like to add them to the dinner reservations, however at this time they did not know what the other sailors plans were and that they would let RSA Mel know. RSA Mel did advise sailors that the restaurants do book up and that it is harder to get bookings with more than 2 sailors. Sailor Cecelia messaged RSA Mel on 03/06 requesting that she cancel their dinner reservation at The Wake for that evening. Sailor Cecelia messaged again at 21:08pm requesting that their dinner tomorrow be made to include 8 people, RSA Mel replied requesting the cabin numbers of the people to add. Sailor Cecelia only replied to the message (with one of the cabin numbers only, and now only requesting to add 6 people) at 11:44am the next day. RSA Mel checked with admin reservationist if it was possible to add the extra sailors to the Extra Virgin booking and it was not possible, RSA Mel advised the sailor of this. Sailor Cecelia then asked at 8pm that night that RSA Mel to add the sailors to the bookings for the rest of the voyage, RSA Mel requested the other sailors cabin numbers and made the request in the reservations group. Sailor enquired at 5pm if the other sailors were added, RSA Mel advised that there was no feedback as yet. RSA Mel went to Pink agave at 6pm to queue there and see if the other sailors could be accommodated along with the booking for the 2 Rockstars, there was no space for them, RSA Mel informed sailor. RSA Mel went to Razzle Dazzle and made a reservation there for 8 people, sailor was not happy to eat there and cancelled the reservation. RSA Mel went to Test Kitchen and made a reservation there for 8 people, sailor was not happy and cancelled the reservation. RSA Mel went to Extra Virgin to see if they could accommodate, there was no availability. RSA Mel did not enquire at Gunbae as the sailors had Gunbae booked for the next night. At 9pm RSA Mel was in the queue at Pink Agave to see if they could accommodate the sailors, reservationist advised that if the sailors come now then they can be seated. RSA Mel advised the sailors and sailor said that they have already eaten and dont want the reservation. Sailors advised that they wanted to have at least one dinner with all of their friends and that this situation was becoming aggravating. Sailors demanded to have Extra Virgin, The Wake or Pink Agave for all 8 of them for the following night. RSA Mel went to Extra Virgin at 21:30pm and asked that they please assist to accomodate the sailors, the only time that was possible was 8:45pm. Dinner was booked and sailors advised.
Resolution_Details: 03/09 RSA Mel met with sailors at the cabin and advised that Extra Virgin was booked for the 8 of them for this evening. Offered to try and book them for brunch at The Wake on disembarkation morning with their friends. Sailors declined the offer.

Description: Sailors came to GB and mentioned to the server that she had some kind of pepper allergy which one she’s was not sure.

Resolution_Details: Allergies were added to TM and MXP
