Description: There were several issues from the Sailors' side during dinner- first, after Sailors were offered one of the best tables in restaurant (2 top, right in front of the window) they complained that they don't like the table as it's too small for the amount of food; they were offered alternative table; once the food was served Sailors were observed using their own, single-use plastic utensils; Sailors were checked upon after each course by server (Gede); towards the end of their meal Sailors were approached by RS Bart and asked about their experience- this is when they described their complaints; Sailors said that they did not like that the server was talking about Elevated Voyage cards, they interrupted him saying that "they just want the food"; they mentioned that they did not enjoy the service even though Gede was maintaining the table to the best of his abilities; also the way Sailors used to describe the server when asked by RS Bart was rather disrespectful, showing that they did not like the assigned server from the start; Sailors also mentioned that they did not enjoy any of thee food- Chicken Wings were bland, salad was soggy, cauliflower was too spicy and lamb was average; Sailors were thanked for the feedback and assured that we will look into discussed matters in order to avoid any negative experience for the future;
Resolution_Details: for documentation purposes only

Description:
Q: How would you rate your overall experience with the Elevate voyage?, A: 3
Q: How would you rate the Elevate programming onboard? , A: 3
Q: Value for money?, A: 3
Q: We are curating more Elevate sailings across the world. How likely are you to consider traveling to participate in it?, A: 2
Q: What made you book this particular voyage? (Special event, Elevate Voyage Programming, Just needed to use your PTO?), A: Wanted to try a different cruise line and have had good experiences with Virgins others businesses. Must admit our final day on board was the best and if the entire experience had been at this level my opinion of Virgin Voyages would be very good, but unfortunately the first 3 days did not meet expectations. The Wake restaurant was however fantastic! Both the service and food were exceptional! If we had been able to get reservations at other restaurants onboard I think our opinion of the overall voyage might be completely different. The availability of seating in restaurants is wholly inadequate and needs to be addressed in the worst way. The food quality in the Galley is very institutional, and poor quality. Staff were helpful but this did not overcome the poor food quality. I know you have the ability to create quality food, I fount this at the Wake.
Resolution_Details: Sailor Had fantastic dinner experience at The Wake Restaurant on his last dinner of the cruise. Sailor appreciate the team efforts and willingness to assist.

Description: At approximately 10pm on 03/09/2024 Mr. Dallas Neff joined us in the Casino, playing high-end Blackjack table. We had regular sailor – employee conversations until his wife Mrs. Ashley Neff with another gentleman came around. She was showing signs of heavy intoxication, so I sent a message to the Casino-Bar Team group on Workchat to stop serving her alcohol. Shortly after, I`ve seen message from the SERV SAFE group that she has been pointed out there too. Mrs. Ashley Neff did not start playing rather than socializing around her husband`s table, but occasionally I could see that she is “wobbly”, and that she is not able to keep balance when standing. Occasionally I could overhear swear words too that were addressed to her husband or to the other gentleman. I have alerted the Casino Supervisors of her state and I have advised them to pay attention to the table in case she needs assistance. Soon after, Mrs. Ashley Neff sat down next to her husband, and I could hear that she calls him M…. r F…. r. I double checked if everything is fine with them, and I asked them if they would require any assistance to be escorted to the room later. At that point Mrs. Neff started becoming aggressive by raising her voice, but Mr. Neff would try to calm her down and kept apologizing on behalf of her. I tried to reinstate that they are both fine, but Mrs. Ashley was aggravated already, telling me to get the f…k out. I advise them that I am calling the Security team to assist. Mr. Neff kept apologizing, but Mrs. Neff kept using foul language towards me as I dialed the Security number.
Latest_Comment: The Security team arrived soon after and I have escorted them towards the scene.

Description: 3/10/24 HDA CANSU - Sailor sent message through SQ:" Hi there I was totally disappointed with the service at Sailor Services we loved our first cruise with Virgin thus the reason we booked a second cruise- we were told we had 600 dollars for alcohol but when being assisted today by Bahug( spelling of name is probably in correct) he was not helpful and unbothered by our disappointment he also clicked through my phone and disabled my WiFi. I wanted to reach out and say the service already on day 1 has been subpar unacceptable -when we were told sailor loot is for all purchases that was not explained to us- you see it’s not about the credit it’s about what we intended to spend it on- which was alcohol the other disappointment was when he asked to see our original confirmation from a year ago- what in the world is what I was thinking and don’t you have our information and you made us look through emails from a year ago- terrible service- Tonja Thigpen"

Resolution_Details: 3/13/24 HDA CANSU - No reply from Sailor for confirmation for 2 days, vlog will be close.

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 5
Q: Check in process?, A: 5
Q: Luggage handling?, A: 5
Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The only issue was when we were getting queued up into our embarkation lines. The couple in front of us was confused about having to wait in a line. The port worker (in VV shirt) was telling them that travel agents will lie to make a sale. The passengers were offended and walked off upset, telling her that their travel agent would not. I then told her it was wrong of her to say that and as a travel agent, I was offended. She told me “it IS true and I don’t care who you tell”. Not a great start to the cruise. Thankfully the crew onboard are AH-MAZING!!!

Description: Sailors were ordering at the PJ party in the athletic club, they ordered a margarita from bartender Darko who made the drink as per our recipes. Sailor was not happy and questioned why Darko did not fill the measure when making the drink. Darko explained that our jiggers are 2oz pours and that we measure 1.5oz for servsafe reasons. the sailor alleged that Darko called her "puta" meaning "bitch" in Spanish and became a little aggressive. sailor then left the area.
Latest_Comment: I met the sailor just after this incident. I advised the sailor that Darko is Serbian and does not speak Spanish so would not have used this term toward her. the music was very loud in the area and I explained that we have never had any negative feedback for Darko nor would any of our crew use such terms to a sailor. I apologised for the inconvenience and the drinks were refunded from their bill as a gesture of good will.
Resolution_Details: Drinks were refunded and sailor seemed happy with my explanation that this would not be in the bartenders character. I apologized for the misunderstanding and wished the sailor a good night and voyage.

Description: sailor reported to sailor services that there is mosquitos in the cabin

The sailor requested chemical treatment in the room, but DM explained to the sailor that we can't perform any treatment without identifying the pest. DM also requested that to contact SS if they find any insect activity again, and we will follow up immediately.
Resolution_Details: sailor thanked for the assistance and no further assistance needed at the moment

Description:
*Affected Sailor was part of the party of 6 dining with Sailors from cabin 13242A marked on the reservation as "unidentified sailor"* 
There were issues with one Sailor from party of 6 since the beginning; when server Ni Ketut approached the table and started introducing the menu Sailor (middle aged lady) pushed Ni Ketut away saying "can you please not stand so close"; when server moved away from the Sailor to other side of the table the same Sailor complained that she can't hear anything; all served dishes were served in a timely manned (all tickets from expo saved as an evidence)- despite that the one Sailor complained numerous times that they are hungry and how much longer they have to wait; Sailors added extra starters after initial order numerous times which made service even more challenging however server brought the dishes to table almost immediately; the same Sailor complained on timing of main course service again- even though they were also served in timely manner (expo receipts provided as well); the same lady complained on waiting times for desserts- she mentioned waiting time even before the dessert order was delivered to pastry; on the way out the same Sailor mentioned that service was very good but "slow" despite all orders being given priority by server; Sailor was observed making rather straightforward comments for most of the evening;
Latest_Comment: it was determined that the same Sailor approached RS Bart at the front door during their dinner and asked for the way to female toilet; while RS Bart was explaining how to get there, Sailor said rudely "ohh just forget about it" and returned to the table;
Resolution_Details: for documentation purposes only

Description: Sailors were a walk in late in the brunch service- they sat at 12:47. At around the same time kitchen ran out of Salmon Bowl and the server who looked after the Sailors was not aware of it; Sailors ordered 2 Salmon bowls that could not be served; once Sailors were informed about the fact they seemed annoyed; Sailors were approached by RS Bart who offered an apology and alternative dishes; after longer conversation Sailors said it was all fine and they were happy with new dishes; Sailors were looked after very well for the reminder of the brunch and were very grateful for the care given to them; they were offered another reservation for brunch another day and were happy with the opportunity to come back and try Salmon Bowl;
Resolution_Details: for documentation purposes only

Description: 03/11/24 @16:45 HDA Barbara: Sailor came to SS saying that she has problem with the bathroom. When she took a shower everything got flooded and she was unable to move in the bathroom. Sialor has a walking cane and frame and she is mobility restricted. DM met Sialor and showed her how to close the shower door all the way so the water doesn't flood the bathroom. However Sailor doesn't have the wrist movement to be able to close and open the sliding bathroom door.
Latest_Comment: @03/13/24 @19:25 HDA Barbara: HDA sent message on SQ "Ahoy Cari, it's Barbara from Sailor Services, I was trying to reach you in the cabin, however you must have been outside enjoying our Ladyship. We reviewed the reports from your voyage and would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences. Please let us know if you would like to talk to our Management, they are available for discussion! Our Manager Olya will be at Sailor Services tomorrow morning should you want to reach out to her."
Resolution_Details: 03/15 HDM OM: The sailor stopped by to share her experience with HDM. As per the sailor, she fell in her cabin 2 days ago and reported it to DM Nestor. No records found in the system. HDM apologized and offered medical assistance to the sailor. The sailor denied saying that she is alright. The sailor mentioned multiple issues she faced during her voyage connected to the cabin change and cleanliness of the cabin. HDM sympathized with the sailor and apologized for all the inconveniences the sailor had. As per SSM, $300 FVC can be issued. HDM offered the sailor FVC which the sailor gladly accepted. The sailor thanked HDM for the time. The sailor went to deck 7 to book her next voyage with VV.

I didnt realize it was ship time and my phonr is an hour off. I went down to the excusion area right at 1130 which i thought was 1030. But they couldnt wait 2 minutes for us. The only 2 othet people going on this adventure. Which my phone is 1 hr off and said 1029 when i got there to the desk to ask if they could wait just 1 moment for us to run down but they left il us. Description: 03/12/2024 HDA JKG. Booked excursion for Parafise Island today. Got to meet area & the port staff told us our group was there way too early & Virgin Voyages had messed up. It took me literally tapping this person on the shoulder because he was very frustrated & on cell say no bueno virgin voyages over & over to so.Many sailors were waiting to here what was happening and he wasn’t answering. Then NIKOS who was very kind, explained the situation in detail. Nikos explained the tour would now leave at 230 instead of 1230 and back on ship at 730. We had reservations with friends book for a show & dinner so we couldn’t make that change. He said we would be refunded.Refunded isn’t enough really.can’t go to spa, reservations taken for food options today. Poolboacked when we came back to ship.have a torn meniscus so booked excursion that would pickup close to boat & drop back off & planned to take closest beach chair to drop off. Walking in Cozumel not an option. All or her excursions booked up. Basically very frustrated with this outcome & have a disappointed daughter whose trip this was for her 19th birthday. She begged for a virgin voyage. This is my 23rd cruise. I’ve never had an excursion fiasco like this one on any of my previous cruises. The whole thing was just really ODD & heartbreaking! Wish it would have been different & Cozumel would have beendoable at paradise beach excursion. Just wanted sailor services to know so they can work on this mix up & the next sailors won’t have to miss a day of cruising to a logistical mistake oneithervirfin or the excursion b. Vendor’s but as I said the vendor said over & over - no bueno virgin! I now tend to agree with him - NO BUENO VIRGIN!!!
Latest_Comment: 03/13/24 ASTM Tobyn: message sent to sailor explaining the following. For any tours booked through Virgin can be changed, rearranged or cancelled during time with a notification given ahead of time or even whilst sailor are on the pier checking in for a tour. We as sure things would never want to cause inconveniences to our sailors for any tour changes or adjustments. For this tour we were in communication the the Tour Operator office who informed us due to logistical reason and multiple ships being in port it would be best to change the time of the tour, as they and another tour derating at 02:30pm TO decided to move this tour to the same time. All sailor were advised on the pier of the time change and given a option if they would like to continue or receive a full refund. As these sailors decided no to continue they were refunded in full to their onboard account. No further compensation will be given.
Resolution_Details: 03/13/24 ASTM Tobyn: Sailors have been refunded in full to their onboard account

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: I am having a great time during the day but the time I lay my head down to the time I get up is absolutely horrendous. I can not even sleep longer than 2 hours of the non-real bed. The pillows are terrible and I have slept on couches that have felt better than the beds. And then I am in pain all day long because of the horrible night. I am in tear because of this. Everytime the boat sways my cabin door makes a knocking sound. This addition in the middle of the night is actually going to make me go insane.

Description:
11th March 8am.
Spa called Mrsa telling her that sailor Erika will be down as a no show because she didn't turn up for her massage at 8am. Mrsa went to Sailors cabin and caught them leaving and informed Erika about her missed appoitment, Erika told Mrsa that her appoitment 9am and her husband's is at 11am. Sailors showed Mrsa the appoitments on their app which stated that it was at 9am and 11am. Mrsa called back the spa to inform them that its actually 9am Erikas appoitment, the lady from spa said no she booked 8am, which sailor replied that when she was booking it came on the app 9am so she assumed that was her appoitment. Spa said she cannot have her quartz massage now she will only have the option to do a Swedish or deep tissue 50 mins , sailor agreed as she needed one as she is suffering from her shoulder but she was not happy at all. Sailor booked in for quarts the day after (12th)  at 7:30am in the morning instead as thats the only time they had before her excursion so she would of have to be rushing. After speaking on the phone with the spa sailor Joshua checked his app and whilst checking Erikas appoitment from the morning changed from 9am to 8am, but sailor Joshua has screenshots from Erikas appoitment stating 9am. Sailor Erika was not happy and said surley they should compensate some how as this is not their fault at all.
Latest_Comment: March 14th at 10:30 charge refunded as per WM. Sailors advised.
Resolution_Details: March 11th at 20:45 RSM followed up with WM as the Sailors are asking for an update. One of the treatments was cancelled and refunded to the Sailors account. Sailors advised by MRSA. Nothing further.

Description:
Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 2
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities during the day?, A: 4
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 4
Q: Are there any shows or activities that you would like to see that we don't currently offer?, A: NA
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: We loved Duel Reality!!!!  I gave sad face because we would have liked to go to Red Party events tonight but our excursion was delayed, and instead of a “comfortable bus” we travelled to Chichen Itza and back in an INCREDIBLY cramped and uncomfortable van.  We were rushed through the excursion once we arrived because of the delay in starting, we didn’t even get to see the giant stone head ruin that is pictured on the advertisement.  It definitely was not worth the high price we paid and we lost an entire day of fun because we chose that excursion.  I couldn’t be more disappointed with how today went and now we are exhausted.  Why make the party on the same day as excursions are scheduled?  Very poor planning on Virgin’s part.  So we decided to stay in the cabin and order food which has been a fiasco.  First, the app would not work.  After much effort, we finally got ahold of room service through phone and learned that we can’t get fries with a burger and can’t get a real margarita on the rocks, only canned.  Very frustrating.
Latest_Comment: 03/13/2024 STS Fabrizio called stateroom but no answer. SQ was sent apologizing and empathizing for the inconvenience. Sailor has been advised that I will be addressing directly with the Tour operator for further references. I appreciate bringing this to our attention as we always are constantly working on the improvement of our services and hoping they enjoy the rest of their voyage. Looking forward to have them again on one of our tours.
Resolution_Details: No further action is required until sailor approach the desk again

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: See sailor services complaint made at 120PM today. Excursion scheduled for Parafise island. Told when we met at appropriate spot that Virgin had made a mistake with vendor not telling us anything instead say virgin no bueno on cell phone over & over. Nikos cane to speak to group for excursion stating the tour would now leave at 230 & return at 730. We’d made dinner & show plans with friends so we couldn’t take that option. A refund was made but I sent to sailor services a refund isn’t enough I put on & took swim attire & all other excursions were booked. So couldn’t really do what we wanted on shore. Said to sailor services I had a knee problem so walking is difficult. Choose swim excursion so a boat was taking me & I could sit the whole day. Instead I got back to full pools. No reservations & no way to change all the plans made for day from 1130-600. Sailor services sent back forwarded to excursion group but zero contact from them & a notification sailor services thread was closed. As I said I my chat to them: never have I had a go fused vendor & an excursion group who basically believe it was messed up - too bad so sorry. Har lived this cruise until today.
Latest_Comment: Cross case is created SC-38111956743792287. The email was sent to the shore thigs team.
Resolution_Details: 03/14 HDM OM: SC-38111956743792287 refer to this case

Description: While Mrs. Pohutsky was enjoying her time at one of the slot machines, an unfortunate incident occurred where she accidentally urinated on her chair. This incident was observed by the Slot Team, who reported it to the Assistant Casino Manager.
Latest_Comment: 2.41am After receiving a message from CS Miguel stating that a woman had urinated on the seats at the casino, DM Made proceeded directly to the venue to secure the area while the Ship Squad team cleaned. The team was able to disinfect and clean the space.
Resolution_Details: In efforts to preserve Mrs. Pohutsky's dignity and offer support, a female representative (Casino Host), accompanied by the Assistant Casino Manager as a witness, approached Mrs. Pohutsky. She addressed the incident with kindness and respect, informing her of what had happened and extending their total support. She also offered to contact Mr. Pohutsky (husband) if she needed his assistance. Mrs. Pohutsky felt embarrassed but understood and recognized that it was an accident, refused the support offered, apologized for the inconvenience and left the Casino.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The customer service and interactions with your crew has not been great. I like to cruise. This is my first Virgin cruise. Your staff has made me feel rushed and not welcoming. I know that’s not the intention you set forth when creating this experience. I’ve walked into a store and no one greets me. I made a purchase Monday and the clerk only spoke to tell me the total. 

Three times now I’ve been overlooked by staff in The Galley and someone else was acknowledged and served before me, even though I was there first. 

There needs to be some serious customer service/hospitality training. Please tell your crew to be kind and attentive to EVERYONE. This will probably be my last Virgin experience if I don’t see changes prior to Friday.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called the sailor, no reply
Resolution_Details: 03/15 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: Sailors Deborah Friedman from Cabin 11270A and Sailors Anne Marie and Daryl Miles from Cabin 8334A, approached Shore Thing Staff to provide us their feedback regarding their experience with their excursion in Cozumel VIP Day at Anemona Beach in Punta Sur. They spent more time on the tour around Cozumel than at the beach. Sailors didn't receive refreshments (water) during the tour only on the way back from the beach. According to our Sailors what is in the description is not what we are actually offering for the high price. Sailors complained about worn-out beach chairs and dirty pillows. They also mentioned that in order to receive the service, they must call the waiters, who have an unfriendly attitude. The first thing the waiter said when they approached was that the menu only offered a limited selection of dishes, and ordering seafood would cost an extra 30 dlls. The free bar only offers a limited selection of drinks. If they ordered something else, like tequila,  they had to pay extra.  Sailors are requesting a refund for the VIP day at Anemona Beach in Punta Sur.
Latest_Comment: Tour operator is following up.
Resolution_Details: We've applied 30% off discount to our Sailors excursion. Sailors are happy with the quick follow up.

Description: 03/13/2024 HDA JKG. 10PM - Sailors went on the Cenote Hopping Adventure yesterday 03/12 in Cozumel. Sailor informed it was not to hot luckily but she was hungry and depended on the "light snacks" The sailor felt that the info was miss leading. HDA informed the sailor that we would inform our shore things team and they will follow up with the operators to check.

Have a lovely day in Bimini"

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is actually and issue today - I requested fresh food and was told “everything was fresh” as they proceeded to pull food from warming trays that had been sitting there for an extended period.  Warming trays are not “fresh” and you aren’t busy enough to be utilizing them.  Food should be cooked to order especially when a guest requests something fresh.
Resolution_Details: Due to late survey arrival we couldn't reach out to Elizabeth through a phone call. An apology msg has been sent through the chat which we also thanked sailor for her valuable feedback. Chef is informed.

Description: Sailor came in and had a massage and with on of my massage therapists and was requesting for the therapist to massage his Glutes and upper thighs. The therapist (Loice) explained that this is not part of our treatment protocols. Sailor asked to use the bathroom while the treatment was going on and after the therapist finished the back of his body, he decided he did not want to continue the treatment. According to my therapist the sailor has sailed with us before and had similar request from another therapist.

Description: 03/14/2024 HDA JKG. Sailor called on the phone requesting for a manager she was informed she was going to hear from management. HDA informed the sailor that management will be back between 3.30pm and 4pm. HDA asked what the concern maybe and can I assist. The Sailor would like to know how we are going to compensate her for her gratuities as she has had trouble since been on the ship. She is not happy they she has never received any follow ups when she was told she would her from someone. HDA Apologized to the sailor and informed her that management will be notified and they will reach out to her through the app soon as possible once back on duty.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called the sailor, no reply. The sailor`s bag was cleaned and doesn`t smeel wine anymore. The sailors were offered 2 Thermal Passes and a bottle of bubbles
Resolution_Details: 03/15 HDM OM: HDM met with the sailors and listened to their concerns. As per the sailor, on embarkation day she requested a wheelchair assistance prior to coming on board, however, it was never provided. The sailor is after the serious surgery and cannot move a lot by herself. The sailor mentioned that the room was not cleaned properly and the requests that they were placing were taking hours to be completed. HDM apologized for their experience. HDM offered a Treat Yourself at PA and assured the sailor that wheelchair assistance will be provided on disembarkation morning as requested. The sailor thanked HDM for the time taken

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 5
Q: Luggage handling?, A: 5
Q: Time it took to get onboard?, A: 1
Q: Check in process?, A: 5
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: NA

Sailors Jillian Cowhey and Kevin Marienfeld from cabin 14298A Christopher Coulter and Michael OShea  from cabin 11330Z approached STS at the chart table to provide us their feedback regarding their Bimini Heritage and Cultural Tour. The sailor mentioned that on the trip, they stopped at a shopping area where there was no water or history provided and sat for a while without receiving any explanation before moving on to the Dolphin House, where they spent the majority of the time, but again, no explanation was provided. They had just five minutes to swim when they took a seat in front of the beach. The tour guide failed to inquire about the sailors' dietary restrictions during the food tasting. When Sailor Jillian told them about her allergies, the tour operator said she would be alright but Sailor didn't feel comfortable eating there. According to sailors, this tour should only cost a maximum of 50 dlls. The sailors are requesting compensation for all four of them because the tour was not explained on the locations, not getting water on the way and not checking their allergies.
Latest_Comment: STS appreciated their feedback. Email sent to tour operation. We will contact our Sailors to provide a resolution. Sailor appreciate it.
Resolution_Details: We've applied 25% off discount to each Sailors: 21.25 dlls per person. Sailors informed.

DM mentioned to HDM regarding this issue just in case sailors approached the desk.  Blower will be removed at 11:30pm by PAM Made as endorsed or if sailors called before that time. Description: BIMH2O00020 - Fishing Charter - Sailor was very upset by the attitudes of the guides on who was supposed to conduct the fishing tour. Firstly the original boat that was supposed to be used had a mechanical issue and has to be replaced. Sailor understood that this was out of their control however didn't mind going on the replacement boat. Sailor mentioned that out of 6 sailors 2 decided to continue and waited for 20 mins. After a while the captain was upset as he didn't want to use the replacement boat. The guides were very dismissive and were using a lot of profanity while waiting. Sailor was upset by the way things were handled and did not want to waste a day with unfriendly crew, sailor was looking forward to the tour as she is an avid fisher. Sailor wanted to address the issue with the STM and wanted to know if another boat from a different company could be arranged STM advised that is was not possible as tours need to be vetted before sending sailors on them and that can't happen in a few hours. Sailor was offered another tour, sailor declined and said she would rather freshen up and make her way to the beach club as the ordeal ruined her day. STM apologized for the sailors experience and advised that his would be addressed with tour operator and shoreside team. STM advised sailor to enjoy the rest of the day and would follow up with sailor when she returns from the Beach Club. Sailor thanked STM for listening.
Latest_Comment: STM will met with sailor again to ensure all is well.

Ivan Temunovic, RN".

Description: 03/16/2024 - 6:31 PM - HDA Rone, Sailor came to Sailor services to advise that the wearable is not working, HDA Rone reviewed MXP and noted that the card on file is not for the sailor advised that we can not take card on file that is not in the sailors name. HDA advised that we will need to request authority from the card holder to confirm that we can use the card on file or we can use another card that the Sailor has. Sailor advised that this is poor management and that the app took the card we should as well he planned his holiday with the idea in mind that he will use this card and everything will be fine. The Sailor advised that he does not have another card here to use. HDA advised that we will have to go through the authorize the card. He advised that he is very upset and wants to talk to a manager and wants a complaint raised with shore side. I advised that I will get a manager to talk to him. Ruth assisted in the conversation and advised why it is important to get the authorization. The sailor again explained the frustration he expressed to me to Rut. The Sailor then provided the email address to get authorization.

Description: HDA Virgil 8:44AM- sailor approached ss desk telling me that he is on this voyage for his 5th year anniversary. He said that they are here mainly because of Puerto Plata and now its been cancelled. Sailor wanted to know what compensation we can offer him. I explained to the sailor that we are looking currently in alternative route. As well as this I informed him that it is a part of terms and conditions that he agreed with before voyage, that the ship can change itinerary at any point depending on operational needs and in this case due to an emergency evacuation. That is why no compensation can be offered. Sailor wanted to speak to manager, I went and asked HDM to come and speak to sailor.
Resolution_Details: 03/16 HDM OM: HDM spoke to the sailor and sympathized for their experience. HDM explained that as per terms and conditions , the company has a right to change the port of a call due to the emergency. The sailor was understanding, however, mentioned that they booked the private tour in Puerto Plata and will not be refunded. HDM sympathized with the sailor , however we are unable to compensate this. HDM offered to make a call to the tour operator using our internal phone complimentary to cancel the tour. The sailor will try to do it himself.

Description: 03/16/2024 HDA JKG. I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with my experience. The app has not been functional, and on board sailor services has repeatedly communicated false information that leads to expectations that are not true. we wanted to booked Loteria, but it was sold out grom. From the moment we boarded (4 pm on 3/15). Sailor services told us to go to Pink Agave 15 min before the event to get it as people always cancel. We got there 15 min before to be told to leave by another Representative that stated they were sold out and there would be no openings. We aren’t going to Dominican Republic as planned. I had booked an excursion to. See the water falls. The closest similar excursion in Nassau is the jeeps to the caves. I wanted to book that. I tried all day by the app wasn’t allowing me. I waited in line at sailor services. They told me to try the app later. I just tried again and the excursion is now sold out. this vacation has been disappointment followed by disappointment. Escalate this to a supervisor.
Latest_Comment: 03/19/24 at 13:45 HDA Lola: Sailor Daniel approached the desk at Bimini beach club to inform that he is not happy about the fact that his excursion in Bimini got cancelled due to the weather. Sailor mentioned that Virgin could arrange alternative excursions for them as they were unable to do any in Dominican Republic as well as in Bimini. Sailor is expecting someone to contact him about this matter.
Resolution_Details: 03/19 HDM OM: HDM spoke to the sailor and sympathized with his experience. The sailor understood the importance of emergency situation, however, felt that it could be handled differently. The sailor is expecting a compensation for the inconvenience and not many options to book a tour in Nassau. HDM apologized and notified the sailor that there is no compensation offered due to the port change. The sailor requested to have a contact number of the office. The sailor was given solutions letter.

The sailors are signing the Ticket to Sail before coming on board which mention these term and conditions. The sailor was not satisfied with the resolution. HDM offered a solutions letter to contact the shoreside once the voyage is over. The sailor accepted.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Have only seen our cabin host once. I used the app to order still water and ice at 8am and it never turned up. When I left the room at 11am I saw the cabin host and said that I'd been waiting 3 hours for water. She said she would place the water in the cabin, but when I returned to the cabin at 4pm there was still no water so I had to use the app again to order it. The air con in the cabin is also not working, with barely any cool air coming out.
Latest_Comment: HVAC has confirmed that he has checked the AC in the cabin. HVAC said it's already cold inside. The cabin temperature is now 20.5°C. Please see the picture below.
Resolution_Details: DM went to meet the sailors in the morning and apologized for the inconvenience. DM explained to the sailors that if they needed something urgent, they could dial 0. DM also instructed the sailors to remove the Do Not Disturb sign and put a blue sign on the door whenever they left the room to notify the attendant that they needed cleaning or were out of the cabin. The sailors understood and appreciated the visit. DM ensure to sailors that they will get their request on time. The CH and assistant CH stated that they had cleaned the cabin yesterday afternoon before taking a break. DM advised the CH to pay attention to all requests and to check the app as often as possible for any new requests.

Description:
DM visited the cabin this morning to meet with the sailors and apologize for the inconvenience. The sailors explained that their luggage had been misplaced by other sailors in a nearby cabin yesterday. DM reassured them that luggage deliveries were still ongoing until 6pm. 

The sailors also mentioned a sewage smell coming from the toilet. DM immediately checked the toilet with CH and found no issues with the drainage. However, CH applied Bio Gel chemical to be safe and DM arranged for a plumber to inspect the toilet at 10:45am. 

As a gesture of apology, DM offered the sailors a thermal spa session, but they mentioned they had already paid for it. Instead, they requested a refund for the thermal spa and a complimentary shore excursion tour. The sailors expressed disappointment about the change in itinerary and the high cost of the voyage to Puerto Plata. They also mentioned wanting compensation for the inconvenience.
Latest_Comment: DM and CH met sailors Sailors said everything is fine , everything is okay in cabin.
Resolution_Details: DM and CH met sailors Sailors said everything is fine , everything is okay in cabin.

Description: 03/16 SSM: Sailors upset due to the change of itinerary.
Latest_Comment: 03/16 SSM: Sailors expressed that the new port was "Shit" and expressed that they didn't pay over $2000 USD to visit Nassau. Both sailors were upset stating that Nassau is a port that they never want to visit and they didn't understand why the itinerary was changed since there was plenty of time to make it to Puerto Plata. Sailors stated they were confirmed that the ship will arrive and there will be no deviation. SSM apologized that the situation was affecting them however there was not much to be done. Both sailors started complaining that internet was not working for them and we should be compensating all the sailors because of the change of itinerary. SSM assisted them to connect to the internet and to inform them that our itineraries are subject to change.
Resolution_Details: 03/16 SSM: Sailors got really upset stating they will not return to Virgin and there was no reason to change our destination ports. SSM apologized one more time and gave the solutions letter for them to continue the claim

Description: 03/17/2024 HDA JKG. Going to bed. Nice acrobatic show. Disappointed with Virgin in general. Book a lot of sailors, provide limited show, dancing, activities. If this were hotel I would be in my own bed tonight not TRAPPED. Disappointed disappointed disappointed disappointe. HDA. So happy to hear you had a medioca time. Sorry not everything is to your liking. We do aim to please. However we are aware that not everything is for everyone. You very well know that telling someone how happy you are over their bad time is terrible What kind of person says that. A person who doesn’t care. You guys are happy to take $ but return sub standard service. Having my reservations erased from app, app being slow and buggy, internet not working, not being able to see shows because I can’t book them. Having to ask dining supervisors to make exceptions so we can eat not in the galley. Lack of entertainment compared to other cruises. You should be aware however, your everything is below what I experienced from less expensive cruises. Again so happy to hear you jus disregard my complaint. Your aim is not pleasing. HDA I am writing you today to see how your morning is going? Thank you for sharing your feedback regarding your experience, It is disheartening to here that almost nothing on board is to your satisfaction. We are well aware that not everything is for everyone and we appreciate your constructive criticism and will share this with our leaders onboard. We appreciate your feedback and have logged your report. Wishing you a great sea day ??
Latest_Comment: 03/19/24 // 10:24am // HDA TT: Message was sent to the sailor by HDM informing regarding the dinner reservation for Gunbae on the 19th, at 9:30PM.
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: It has been imposdible to get dinner reservations from the moment i set foot on the ship. I dont want to eat all my meals on the 15th floor.
Your wifi is so bad i have zrouble getting on ap. Where are the virtual ques
Latest_Comment: HDM forwarded the case to ROM Harry
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: comment: We were seated and no one spoke to us for 10 minutes. I finally got up and got a pitcher of water and poured our own. Then a manager walked by and I asked if we had a server. She said he was coming which he did and was great. It felt like it was understaffed and chaotic but the food was excellent.
Latest_Comment: RSA Mel - met with sailors and they mentioned this experience - RSA Mel apologised and thanked the sailors for the feedback to us
Resolution_Details: We hosted a party of 19 and another of 15, both scheduled for 6:00 PM. The ladies were seated in the same section due to all other tables being occupied by sailors. I observed them closely from the moment they were seated. While water was promptly offered in accordance with standard operating procedures, due to the bustling environment, the server approached them after approximately 7 to 8 minutes. Sensing their impatience as they looked around, I reassured them that a server would soon attend to them. Within a minute, the server took their orders. Following the experience, I extended apologies and appreciation for their feedback.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: My expectations far exceeded my experience on this ship. From all of the reviews I was ready to have a wonderful time and book the next cruise on board but this will be a one time experience with this cruise line. Good news is I've spent way less than planned and can use my money with companies that value my business.
Latest_Comment: Ahoy Angelia! We received your feedback. We are so sorry to hear that your expectations were not met. Please let us know if you would like to discuss your experience further.
Resolution_Details: 03/17 HDM OM: An apology message was sent

Description: Sailor expressed dissapointment with their experience to date. This is their first voyage with us and they expressed that our delivery has not met their expectations. Some items were promised to be in their cabin but did not arrive until the second day, they asked their rockstar agent about swapping their entire minibar for malibu and were met with just a no and no real discussion. They said service has been ok but they have received better and in general just feel like they have had better experiences on other cruise lines. Adding the missed port and changed itinerary has just been an added frustration.
Latest_Comment: At 16:30 RSM met with both Sailors. RSM listened carefully to all their comments and feedback. Sailors started by embarkation where they felt a little lost not knowing who to reach out to and ended up waiting for about 1h for their RSA to speak with them, the Sailors mentioned they noticed she was busy with other Sailors in a big group, but they were the last ones she spoke with. Then they requested their liquor to be swapped for Malibu rum as it's the only thing that Kenneth drinks, but they were told no, we could only swap for the options already in the mini bar. Sailor then asked for a fresh coconut, to attempt to do his own coconut rum, but never received it. He mentioned it could even be canned as the RSA mentioned to him, but still it never came. They also requested for 80's Rock vinyls but received different albums that they didn't like. Adding to that, the Sailors mentioned the itinerary change, however, were understanding this is out of our powers. Sailor Kenneth also brought up on how he thought RSA would be his outmost resource when asking for things like the bottle of Malibu, but then he met BOM that confirmed this could actually be done. When they got back to the suite, they noticed the bottle of Malibu placed however the wines were gone. Sailor Brenda mentioned she is the one that likes the wine, so that was a bad impression for them as well. The last drop was when they were charged for the Sea Day being booked for a Port Day, they messaged their RSA saying they wanted to cancel that, however, RSA informed them there would be a cancellation fee. Sailor Branda mentioned she became very angry, but RSA made up for it by going to their suite and explaining she understood they wanted to cancel and not that they were mistakenly chaged. Sailor confirmed RSA took care of it very quickly after they spoke, however, they felt this could have been avoided if RSA anticipated the mistake. RSM extended apologies and clarified out mini bar policy to the Sailor, again it was restated to them that RSA followed the procedure, however, BOM in an attempt of making them hapier, authorized the exception of having the Malibu bottle in exchange for all the mini bar in the suite. RSM also explained that the SPA moved appointments from the port day to the next day of the voyage and vice versa, the Sailors were understanding. RSM put himself available for all requests they may have and assured they can contact him whenever they feel unsatisfied with anything onboard. The Sailor appreciated the chat a lot and mentioned they already booked a future voyage in VAL. Sailors also mentioned it was Brenda's first voyage with VV so they had high expectations for it. In the end Sailors said they are enjoying anyways and they are not big complainers. RSM appreciated the Sailors feedback.
Resolution_Details: RSM followed with RSA and new albuns were sent to the suite as they didn't like the previous. Bottle of red wine placed in the suite with anniversary setup. Nothing further.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: I have been unable to book any dinner reservations starting from about 5 weeks before the cruise until today.  I am with a group and they invited me to dinner with them tonight, otherwise I was told nothing is available at all.  I went to the pink agave about 1:15 pm today since the hours for making dinner reservations was 9-2 I was surprised no one was there.  I asked sailor services and they were unable to make any reservations, or provide any assistance at all.  have tried to walk in both nights of the cruise at multiple restaurants and was never called from the waiting list.  Your website and app say there is always tables left open for walk ins, this isn’t true.   The hostess at the Italian restaurant was very rude when I asked about reservations and told me there was never any time available.  It’s frustrating to the point that I considered flying home from Nassau tomorrow and would have done so but for the tour group I am with inviting me to dinner tonight.  On the first day of the cruise I waited in the reservation line for about 30 minutes before giving up.  Your process for dining in the restaurants is convoluted and difficult to navigate.   I am on a full comp from the casino and find the lack of assistance from anyone but my tour group to be zero.  It’s a shame because the embarkation process and  other staff I have encountered are extremely pleasant, as is my room and other amenities on the ship.
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description: 3/17/24 // 4:04pm // HDA TT: Sailor Angela sent by SQ: "Yesterday at the Booty after store I purchased to bottles of white Hennessy. There was one on the shelf. I was sure to inquire that there were more available and was assured there was. Later my husband received a call that none were available and that our account was being credited. very upset as this was a gift . More upsetting is that friends we are traveling with went in AFTER us and purchased one bottle. They have not been notified that I am aware of that it’s not available. Why wouldn’t they take customers in order and have the one bottle for me? They should not sell something unavailable." HDA apologized and said that would follow up with the manager.
Latest_Comment: 3/17/24 // 6pm // HDA TT: Retail Mgr. answered to the HDA that the bottle was refunded.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 4
Q: Menu choices?, A: 5
Q: Vibe of the restaurant?, A: 5
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Drinks alcohol watered-down
Resolution_Details: Ahoy sailor, we thank you very much for your feedback on our onboard survey for the beverage offerings onboard. I would like to guarantee you that our drinks are not watered down but we do measure our drinks very diligently. Our standard pour onboard is 1.5oz which is a standard unit of measurement worldwide. We adhere to these strict pour sizes for the safety of all our sailors. Our bar staff are all trained in responsible service of alcohol and as we are on a moving ship it is very important to ensure no sailor is overserved alcohol. Please feel free to reach out to me through our Sailor Services Help Desk at any time if you would like to discuss this further. Regards, Conor O'Malley, Beverage Operations Manager

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The app is really frustrating. It takes forever to load, it kicks me out mid-use, my husband hasn’t been able to get it to work for 95% of the trip. The food situation is also frustrating. This is our first time with Virgin and we didn’t know that reservations for restaurants would be all booked up by the time we got onboard. All of the cruise info said that restaurants reserve some tables for walk-in’s but we’ve been first in line at opening twice and were told we could only get a table if someone canceled. Essentially we’ve paid for The Wake and got stuck eating in the galley. And the WiFi sucks.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called the sailor, no reply
Resolution_Details: 03/18 HDM OM: The follow up message was sent to the sailor

Description: 03/17/24 // 10:02am // HDA TT: Sailor sent a message by SQ saying that $150 BT was missing. HDA checked Solutions group and there is no records of any BT on his booking. HDA asked the sailor if there is any records that he could provide so we could check it again. Sailor explained : "Unfortunately I do not have an email. I only have ever received the confirmation about booking the cruise within the last Sales with included a bar tab beginning from 150 $ if you book a sea terrace. We booked a sea view but I got assured that if we get the upgrade, we would get the bar tab as well. That’s why I am confused ??". HDA answered: "Ben, thanks for your patience. Unfortunately, as your original booking was The Sea View, we can't honor the Bar Tab because the promotion is not under the sea view cabin, but the Sea Terrace, even with the fact that you upgrade. I apologize for any inconvenience caused about this matter." Sailor also mentioned that he is a bit frustrated as his proposal plans in Dominican Republic is not gonna happen. HDA advised that he could pass by SS to check the new options for the proposal.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Even though I understand about the medical emergency, I don’t understand why Virgin  Cruises did not have a plan b or c when facing a medical emergency. Virgin went with the easy way out: being idle for two days near Miami and changed our destination to two islands in The Bahamas ? That was not what I signed for. Simple disappointing and honestly Virgin to my opinion is going down in sustaining any sort of competitive advantage regarding other companies. I traveled with you last year same time and the level of service went down the drain. The use of the phones is the perfect thing for escaping guess with double charges and the supposedly language barrier at the spa to scam a guest like me. I signed from one thing changed doubled for another service that was not discussed or I was agreeable with. The list is long
Latest_Comment: Please let us know what was your challenge in the Spa so we could efficiently react and inform the respective department?
Resolution_Details: 03/18 HDM OM: HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback and sympathized with her experience.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: First, I booked this cruise specifically because it was going to the Dominican Republic. I understand medical emergencies happen, however, it seems the decision to switch Nassau and how we have been pretty much stationary in the ocean is horrible. Second, I was charged for missing a HIIT class but I was there and the instructor didn’t check me in. The instructor told me to go to the front desk and they would remove the charge. I do so and the charge is still there. Third, the money for canceling my excursion didn’t go back to my card I used for purchase but instead went to my Virgin wallet. That seems ridiculous considering I didn’t use the wallet to purchase.
Resolution_Details: 03/18 HDM OM: HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback. HIT class charge was removed

Description: 03/17/24 @10:00 HDA Barbara Sailor sent message in the chat "When it’s time for my room to be cleaned, a few things need to be addressed, the “freshly laundered” throw that was on my bed, has something gross and sticky on it, that was there when I opened it. also, my bathroom floor has pubic hair and I don’t have that, so… then there’s hair on the back of the toilet, also not mine. And hair all over the balcony floor. In addition to a really dirty table on the balcony. There also been water standing in the mini fridge the entire time. m not ready for cabin cleaning, but I’d really like these things addressed, please. After I’m out of the room ill be here about 2 more hours"
Latest_Comment: 03/18/24  DM Stan: Sailor informed DM that she like to have "treat yourself" in the restaurant, DM follow up
Resolution_Details: 03/18/24 DM Stan: Sailor informed DM that she like to have "treat yourself" in the restaurant, DM follow up

Description:
Q: How would you rate your cabin or RockStar Quarter?, A: 1
Q: Housekeeping service so far?, A: NA
Q: Friendliness of Cabin Host?, A: NA
Q: Cabin Host knowledge?, A: NA
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: My experience with VV has been disappointing thus far. The view from my balcony is totally obstructed by a lifeboat and its rigging. There was no way for me to know from the pics on the website that this was even an option. They let me know there are other rooms available for $475. I’m not willing to spend another dollar to make this right. 

There was a medical emergency this morning that required the sick sailor to be evacuated by helicopter from the ship. As a result, we won’t be stopping at the DR.  We will go to Nassau instead. I don’t blame VV for the change in itinerary but it is disappointing. 

Other than those two things there have been no problems. However I regret booking this trip and will make sure to include this experience in my survey and social media posts.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called, no reply
Resolution_Details: 3/18/24 9:30 DM Rada No compensation for limited view.

03/18/2024 HDA JKG. Sailor came to desk super frustrated that she cannot eat in PA. She would like to know where on the website in our policy does it state that she cannot eat in the same restaurant more than once. HDA went onto the website and checked and there is nothing in so many words stating this. HDA informed the sailor and she said she is aware she read the policy back to HDA. Sailor informed thats she has sailed may times before and always ate in PA its the only restaurant they like and they booked it multiple times on prior sailings. Sailor requested for some type of compensation as the itenary change is also not okay although she does understand that it was an emergency we were circling in fortladerdale for hours and then we stopped. HDA informed the sailor there will be no compensation given to our sailors as per our policy we have full rights to initiate these changes should the circumstance call for it. HDA Apologized profusely for all the inconveniences and frustrations caused. The sailor appreciated the apologies but then requested a manager as she felt as though the dialogue was scripted. She has been told NO the entire voyage and she shouldn't be hearing NO' HDA Informed the sailor that management would be informed. They would reach.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: The sailor didn`t accept the outcome without a compensation. HDM offered to set up a meeting to discuss the sailor's experience

Thanks… It could be called Blue Hawaii, Blue MF, Blue motorcycle. Whatever it’s called it should be equivalent to Long Island… just adding blue. Tx" the service was on 03/17 at The Loose Canon. Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Great 1st day/night. Downhill since. Missed the port and excursion that was expected to be highlight of trip. 2 straight days at sea (literally just sitting in the ocean) only to go to the least desirable port there is. So terriibel we aren’t getting off the ship(nor would we have booked this cruise).  No type of recovery or really any apology offered to Guests.  Spa rebooked our time without telling us. Comedic entertainment is absolutely terrible. Just feels like constantly missing the mark. Had so been looking to trying Virgin, and has been disappointment after disappointment.
Resolution_Details: Duplicated case

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Great 1st day/night. Downhill since. Missed the port and excursion that was expected to be highlight of trip. 2 straight days at sea (literally just sitting in the ocean) only to go to the least desirable port there is. So terriibel we aren’t getting off the ship(nor would we have booked this cruise).  No type of recovery or really any apology offered to Guests.  Spa rebooked our time without telling us. Comedic entertainment is absolutely terrible. Just feels like constantly missing the mark. Had so been looking to trying Virgin, and has been disappointment after disappointment.
Latest_Comment: Thank you for your feedback. We acknowledge the inconvenience you're experiencing, and we empathize with your situation. Nevertheless, it's important to note that the ship reserves the right to alter its port of call in the event of an emergency. This protocol is outlined in the contract signed by all sailors prior to boarding. Thank you for your understanding, and we wish you a delightful day in Nassau. Please inform us if there's any additional assistance we can provide.
Resolution_Details: 03/18 HDM OM: HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback

SAME for Tanqueray 0 it was hit or miss trying to get a zero proof gin and tonic etc  anywhere but a few spots

Description: RSA Mel  - there are 4 Sailors in the cabin. RSA Mel received message from Sailor to say that every morning they have been ordering coffee for 4 people and only receiving 2 mugs. RSA Mel called SE and requested 2 extra mugs for the cabin. Sailor then informed RSA Mel that yesterday they didn't receive any mugs at all and that every day there have been food items missing from their orders.
Resolution_Details: On 03/18/2024 @ 10:03 am QSM Hamed reached out to Sailors through a phone call, where he listened empathized and apologized to the sailors in regards of their SE experience. Lauren answered the call and she was very happy with the follow up call stating everything is amazing and that was just a feedback. Cabin placed into the priority list and we will ensure pre quality check is happening frequently and we will ensure they will not experience the same again.

Description: RSA Gugu received the following  message from Christina - Hey Gugu, We were wondering if Virgin would be willing to give us more in bar tab since our port was changed and we didn’t get to go to Dominican Republic?

Resolution_Details: Sailors are happy and had a good day.

Description: March 18th at 20:00 Sailor Kenneth send a message in SQ:"Hi Gabriel, I know you said feedback was important to you, but the cleaning cart and bag of garbage and vacuum have been outside alone for the last three days. At first I thought they were cleaning our room or the room next to us. But it’s been there every time we come back to our cabin for the last three days. Description: RSA Gugu received the following message from Vanessa - Thank you! We were curious if we would be able to talk with you. We are very happy with the quality of the ship however we are unhappy with the port. We have cruised to the Bahamas many times which was why we chose the Dominican Republic as our destination. Because of this, we do not want to disembark in Bimini but would prefer to stay on the ship. We were wondering if it would be possible to receive an additional drink credit for our time on ship tomorrow. If that is something that would be possible. Thank you so much for all of your help and we think you are amazing!

Leg of lamb wasn’t hot and was pretty chewy. Chicken Souvlaki was overcooked. It would have been nice to have a gyro burger instead of fish.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: We won’t be booking Virgin again, and considering that many of our followers have expressed similar experiences we feel that this is nothing unique to us. We understand that emergencies may cause changes. But when a customer comes to you with questions about how these questions will affect their visa and you tell them that you’ll get back to them by a certain time, you get back to them. You don’t keep pushing them off and ignoring them, that’s just customer service 101. It’s sad because everything else has been amazing, but the customer service standards at Sailor Services fails on ever level. We’ve wasted over $10k on this cruise simply because no one would answer our questions about my partners visa. Honestly, we could have paid less and gotten better service with Carnival, it was that bad. I think the thing I’m most looking forward to at this point is sharing our full experience with our followers, I can’t recommend this cruise line to anyone.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM called to the sailor and wanted to give some update in regards to his feedback. The sailor was not very hesitant to have a conversation. HDM invited the sailor to speak in a person and discuss their experience. The sailor replied: " We will see" and hung up the phone.
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 3
Q: Knowledge of the crew?, A: 5
Q: Service?, A: 5
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The service and staff has been phenomenal, however, the food is bland and doesn’t have much flavor. We’re sorry!

Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: The ship was parked right off the coast of Florida for 2 days to go to the worst port in the Caribbean, Nassau with 4 other cruise ships.  We payed to go on a cruise, at least take us somewhere!  Virgin obviously saved a ton of money by parking the ship instead sailing to Puerto Plata. Hopefully this is taken into consideration for the passengers that were affected by the decision to stay close to Miami. Not trying to minimize the medical emergency but it ultimately diminished my experience drastically.
Resolution_Details: 03/19 HDM OM: HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback and apologized for any rough seas

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: I don’t feel like my experience is what was expected. I am here to celebrate a birthday. Many restaurants are not available, I can’t book excursions and the port I was looking forward to the most was missed. I was not offered any accommodations. I don’t feel valued. Also the app has many errors. Many activities are booked and I was not able to do anything for three days. Value is not worth the experience.
Resolution_Details: 03/19 HDM OM: HDM sent a bottle of bubbles to celebrate the sailor`s birthday. The case was duplicated and resolved

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 5
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 3
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is my second time on a Virgin cruise and the first cruise was impeccable! This current cruise, I booked for Dominican Republic for about $1500. Not only did we not go to Dominican Republic but we aren’t getting a credit or anything . I live in Miami and I’m able to book a ferry to Bahamas and Bimini for $200 per person. I know that this was due to a medical emergency but we should not be penalized because of that. My sister and I also was embarrassed at a bar because they said she didn’t have a card on file but we have a screenshot of the app saying otherwise. We both completed the pre boarding requirements well in advance and the app showed a huge check mark confirming that the card was added.
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:
Q: How was your entertainment?, A: 3
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities during the day?, A: 1
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 1
Q: Are there any shows or activities that you would like to see that we don't currently offer?, A: NA
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This trip fell well below the standard that I’ve come to expect from Virgin. This was supposed to be a trip for my birthday that I shared with my friends. I talked up virgin because of my last experience and talked my friends into spending their money and it was subpar. Instead of spending my birthday in Dominican Republic, I spent it trying to squeeze into other places on ship that were fully booked; adding further frustration. Then, I was unable to book an excursion because the app didn’t allow and then everything was sold out because of the last minute addition. To top it all off I was EMBARRASSED when I went to the bar and it was declined. I went to sailor services and was told that there was no card on file and I should her in Virgin’s app that said I had a card on file, and her responses was “well we don’t have one on file”. I had to walk all the way back to my room and back down to sailor services to get it added, wait while “finance ran my card” and incurred another $250 hold on my card. To say I’m disappointed is an understatement. Really did not enjoy my birthday because of this and nobody cares enough to make it right.
Resolution_Details: 03/19 HDM OM: HDM thanked the sailor for the feedback and apologized for any rough seas

Description: The lady was seated at a window table as requested, and the server promptly took her order. However, upon receiving the salad starter, she found it unsatisfactory and requested a replacement. Although she received a new salad, she took 40 minutes to finish it. The main course was fired at 6:45 PM, arriving on the table by 7:00 PM. Despite this, the lady expressed frustration and requested to speak with the manager. She conveyed feeling neglected and discriminated against, citing that other tables received their mains earlier. The restaurant manager attempted to persuade her to stay for dinner, and after some time, she agreed. However, upon discovering that her food was ready sooner than expected, she decided to leave the restaurant.
Resolution_Details: negative comment is anticipated

First- the large pool in the center had about 6 people who were very loud and treating it like being in a party hot tub. Not relaxing! Next- we had to wait about 25 minutes for our massages-the front desk person said she would tell the massage people that we were already in the spa- but she did not. We started 30 min late- but did get the full time. It wouldn’t have been so bad waiting if the spa atmosphere had been in place. HDA - Sorry to hear you did not receive a tranquil spa experience. I have informed the management of your experience and she will be in touch with you personally before the end of the voyage.

Ended up eating jus salad and fruit. Stop asking how staff performed. It’s how staff performed despite virgin. You are not edgy and cool. You missed the mark completely. Now you can tell me how virgin isn’t for everyone but I’m sick of hearing the same complaints I have come from other “sailors”??. 
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities during the day?, A: 1
Q: Are you satisfied with the amount of shows and activities at night?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: CRIST, just ride the elevator for a damn hour and hear us. Idk how to say virgin  sucked in a nice way. I’m not done but stop asking and start being better. At least you have made me realize how much better royal Caribbean is compared to this pile of farts. I tried to pick an emoji but your stupid app won’t indicate a choice. App actually made trip worse.

Description: Sailors were approached by the RS and RM upon leaving the venue. Sailor asked how he can give a feedback with his experience. He was entertained and RM asked how did it go with his dinner. Sailor mentioned that he did not like the food and it took long time for small portion of food which could be eaten in less than two minutes. He did not like the idea of having a meal in one hour as he values his time.
Latest_Comment: Server spoke to the RS and RM and mentioned that he made the service as fast as he could as the sailors mentioned that they were in a rush. However, sailors asked him dishes, which were not even on the menu like chicken parmiggiano and fried lamb.
Resolution_Details: RM apologized for the experience and explained to the sailors the concept of the venue whereas the average dining experience takes about an hour and a half. Sailor mentioned that it could be understandable if there are some dancers for him to watch while waiting for the next course or a videoke going around the venue. RM appreciated his feedback and apologized again for the inconvenience.

Description: Sailors came for brunch in Razzle Dazzle and mention to RS Nadia, that waffles were dry, RS Nadia offer them another one but sailors refused saying that they are not that hungry and that they were happy with another food they got in Razzle.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Disappointed that we were not able to see the DR on this trip do to the emergency on board but the choice of Nassau was more than disappointing with  at least 5 cruise ships and possibly 23,000 people on same day made the experience unbearable  

This voyage compared to the last voyage seems to be understaffed or overtired 
Galley food for dinner was limited to burger and Indian food (3 options )  butter chicken was offered one the first and 5th night 
Bimini island options  were good. The housekeeping was good  dessert options are good
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Description:

Q: Tell us everything!, A: Service wasn't great at all. Mostly all of the food was bland and nothing to flaunt about. The hottubs are too small. We are really having a hard time keeping an open mind to enjoy the food, service or ship but it's not great overall we have to ve honest. Description: March 20th at 08:15 Sailor disputed the charge of Behind the Scenes tour with MRSA. RSM called the suite and spokw with the Sailor. Sailor Sue informed RSM that she received confirmation from shoreside that BTS tour would be complimentary. RSM saw in their account 4 charges for BTS and 3 refunds, remaining one charge. RSM asked if one of ther Sailor attended and she confirmed, so RSM informed extra charge applied. Sailor then inquired why shoreside confirmed to her it would be comp and said she can show the email (attached). RSM asked for the email and it doesn't state that BTS is complimentary, however, that was specifically the Sailor's inquiry in the email, plus, she sent facebook screenshots of previous Mega Sailors sharing they have been invited to a "behind the scenes (bridge tour)" for free. Due to the confusion and miscommunication, RSM moved the charges to 9024.
Resolution_Details: RSM called back and spoke with Sailor Richard, RSM informed him that the email does not state that it would complimentary in specific. However, due to the miscommunication he was moving the charge. Sailor appreciated a lot.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: On board experiences were terrific. Disappointed that we didn't get to enjoy the destination as advertised. The rumor that Virgin was trying to save fuel is disheartening. I do sympathize that there was a onboard medical emergency.  The alternative destination was not fulfilling or anticipated.  I am not privileged to all the information. I believe we could have made our port of choosing. In hopes that Virgin has  a way to make things right or provide better details for the change.
Sincerely Edward Wolfertz.  13158A
Resolution_Details: 03/20 HDM OM: The sailors disembarked

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I am very upset. We got there early to get seating then all the staff members came and stood in front of us. I politely asked them if they could sit down as we couldnt see. A staff member told me “then get up and stand”. Obviously its great that staff can watch shows but it is unacceptable to stand in front of guests and then to speak like that to me. I am paying customer, if I want to sit, I should be able to. I am very upset at this situation.

03/20/24 03:07pm HDA AC: The sailor approached hda and advised they are meant to have $650 BT and $100 SL as per attached email they got from their Agent but on their account they have $300 BT+ bonus of $50 and a promo bt of $100 and $100 SL. HDA then sent a message to shore side who then responded saying: "Ahoy @Arthur Chabveka The sailor original booked back on  12/12/23 and their total invoice was $3770 with a $300 promotional Bar Tab. The sailor called back on  12/18/23 and wanted the new lower rate which brought the total invoice to $3140 with a $100 promotional Bar Tab.  So the add ons on the booking are current and should be:
$100 -Sailor Loot (Affinity Loot )
$100- Bar Tab Wave 2024 
$300 BT - purchased 
$50 (promotion BT)  We do not owe the sailor an additional Bar Tab. Sailors were then advise but however they were not happy about the respose and asked to speak to the Groups Manager regarding this and Groups Manager was advised and came to speak to the sailors.

Description: March 21st art 16:30 Sailors approached SS to discuss about their cabin configuration. RSM listened to the Sailors, they booked last minute and had a regular cabin. then they bid for all options for suites upgrades and got a SS. They arrived at the terminal around 3:15 pm and upon showing their booking info, the person attending them said:"oh no, not me".  Which raised a flag for them, after this it took 2h for them to checkin. They were assisted by someone else and informed they would have another type of suite. When they arrived at the SG they noticed it being an accessible suite and got dissatisfied. Sailor Lombardo mentioned he would rather go back to his previous cabin, but we wondered if the "mistake" was giving it to someone else. RSM extended apologies for embarkation being slow for them and clarified for him that indeed there was a system error and our idea was to upgrade them to minimize any stress. RSM informed that their previous SS was also an ADA cabin, to which they were very surprised. RSM asked if they were notified about it but they said they weren't. RSM extended apologies and they were fine and appreciated now that we clarified.
Resolution_Details: RSM put himself available for any further requests they might have. Sailors appreciated the attention.

Description:
Passenger - Indecent Exposure

At 2100, Deputy Security Officer Erez notified Security Supervisor Kishor about a female passenger exposing her breasts at the deck 15 starboard side jacuzzi.
