Description: 03/21/24 at 20:30 HDA Lola: Sailor Barbara came to SS to express her disappointment about the restaurant bookings situation. She mentioned that she feels like 2nd class passenger though she is a First Mate. That the only option she has is The Galley and she is tired and frustrated to run around the ship in search for the space in the restaurant. Her whole impression of the cruise line is ruined She also mentioned that ship directions are confusing and crew is not knowledgeable, does not know the location of the venues.
Latest_Comment: HDM OM: HDM was called as the sailor wanted to speak to a manager. The sailor inquired to get her refund asap at 12:30 PM for the port taxes and fees due to the Bimini port cancellation. The sailor wanted to get it on her card. HDM notified the sailor that the refunds to be collected in cash, we do not send the refunds to the credit card ( As we do not do the refunds before finance team posts all of them in the MXP and shares with us a final list of the refunds). The sailor was explained by HDM that due to onboard internal operation the refunds to be issued after 6 PM, however as an exception we will offer the refund for the sailor at this point of time. The sailor appreciated. The sailor also mentioned that her experience with the Sailor Services representatives was not the best one, as she always heard " there is nothing what we can do". It relates to the dinner reservations that the sailor could not get due to unavailability. HDM sympathized with the sailor and informed that we tried to do our best  to make it happen, the requests were sent through the workplace chats + an email was sent to the Restaurant team, asking to book the dinners for the sailor. We managed to book one dinner at Gunbae on 22nd. The sailor shared that the system on VV is not perfect and the sailor has some suggestions on how to improve it: - remove all time slots - first come first serve: - on embarkation day release the rest of the dinner slots at 5 PM once all sailors are onboard, so all sailors have the same fair rights. - to charge sailors for $50 if they don`t cancel their dinner 5 hours prior to or just don`t show up. HDM listened to the sailor`s concerns carefully and thanked for the feedback. HDM mentioned that the sailor`s suggestions are valued and will be forwarded to the restaurant department. HDM also informed the sailor that SS team will get an extra training on customer service skills. HDM asked the sailor whether she had a dinner booked for tonight. The sailor confirmed that it is Test Kitchen. HDM offered a sailor a wine pairing on us as a gesture of goodwill for all the time the sailor spent at the desk. The sailor appreciated attention and HDM`s time and accepted the offer.
Resolution_Details: 03/23 HDM OM: The email to the restaurant team was sent asking to offer a wine pairing to the sailors and charge it to 9024.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Service?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: The night didn’t start good after showing up for our sunset dinner reservation time at 7:30 was not seated until 8:10. Missed sunset.  Ordered my steak, asked for medium well. It came out dry. They then brought me a new one that came out medium rare. I would have done better eating in the galley.
Latest_Comment: Sailors with reservation at 19:30 waited 21 minutes to be seated to sailors were upset about it. Party of 4 only ordered 2 appetizers so we immediately fire the main courses to avoid keeping the other two sailors from waiting. When main courses were served Ms. Tanya was not happy with her Filet Mignon Medium stating it was too dry, sailor ordered butterfly. Server approached and offered a new steak, so she ordered a New York Medium. ARM Oliver asked galley for a new steak which was delivered within two minutes.
Resolution_Details: Oliver and server offered complimentary drinks or anything to compensate for the waiting time + the steaks not being to her liking, but sailors refused and had dessert.

Description: 3/21/24 HDA CANSU - Sailor sent message through SQ: "First cruise, second day and I’m incredibly annoyed! I’ve been down there 5 times to be told my issues are handled and yet I’m embarrassed at every restaurant and bar, time and time again! I purchased the splash for your bash and the splash of romance and I’m told I don’t have either. I have an 800 bar tab and you claimed that I didn’t have my card on file. You have it, but that shouldn’t have mattered! I purchased all of these items and I doubt I will come back. No one has actually tried to help and it’s incredibly frustrating! I even have an email from you guys for my bash reservations where you asked what I was celebrating. This shouldn’t be that difficult!Also, if I shake my phone, I won’t get my wine if you don’t see me registered for anything! Very terrible.
Latest_Comment: 3/21/24 HDA CANSU - As per Restaurant Manager Eduard, Sailor had a meeting with Restaurant Manager and Sailor was appreaciating the service that they had. Vlog will be open for further escalations.
Resolution_Details: 03/22 HDM OM: The sailor discussed their concerns with ROM And clarified all the questions.

Q: Housekeeping service so far?, A: 5
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: I haven’t interacted with my cabin host, but the room was very clean. My concern is with the size of the cabin. When we sailed previously on the valiant lady, our cabin was significantly larger. The space in the cabin, including the bathroom, is quite tight. We barely have room to store two suitcases. In addition, the bed is quite hard and uncomfortable in this cabin. I am disappointed with the room on this ship. My cabin on the last trip was one of the reasons I decided to rebook.

Description: March 22nd at 17:30 RSA called RSM to meet Sailor Tommy (John) for a chat. RSA gave the heads up to RSM that Sailor wanted to invite a group of 20 Sailors to RRT (Rockstars mixed with non Rockstars). RSM had a nice chat with the Sailor who indeed asked for his friends to go to RRT, but not for a normal visit to see the area, Sailor was very clear that he wanted the friends to experience Rockstar world, he mentioned he is from Relationships Management and this was actually a benefit for our business, VV could benefit a lot from approving this. RSM explained to him that the area is exclusive, and by allowing red-bands Sailors in, the Sailors that are actually entitled to this perk are having their rights defeated. The Sailor was understanding, but stated he wanted to use the area when it's empty, and suggested 2 pm. He said they will pay for drinks and etc. RSM asked the Sailor why in specific they wanted to go to a reserved area and asked if we could not offer him a private experience onboard. The Sailor mentioned if RRT doesn't work then this could be a possibility. RSM informed he would double check and revert to him. The Sailor mentioned he appreciated RSM to listen to him with an open mind and said regardless of the outcome, he would have a positive idea of RSM.
Latest_Comment: At 20:15 called the suite and again no response, RSM sent a message in SQ to Tommy asking for a convenient time for a chat.
Resolution_Details: March 23rs Sailor asked to speak with RSM at 10 am in the suite. RSM spoke with the Sailor and explained due to the weather and itinerary change (from Bimini to Sea day) we won't be able to accomodate his specific request or any other venues - all open areas closed-. Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Getting on the ship was the first time I've ever seen line ups like that, terrible. Everyone working onboard seems to be new at service. Had issues with the back to back where we had no internet for hours and back and forth with social team. Then the credit cards weren't hooked up for a drink on sail away even though we were on the week before. All of the food has just been ok and definitely bland. The same food everyday over and over. After 4 or 5 days you are tired of it. We are waiting for something to blow us away but it hasn't happened. Comedy shows were repeated, food is bad. Service is the worst ever, the rooms are small and have little to no storage. The bathroom doesn't have a plug for the hair dryer. So many details missed.
Latest_Comment: HDM replied to the sailor: Tyler thank you very much for sharing with us some details of your voyage. We do apologize if something was not up to your expectations but please be assure that we are here to assist you if you need our help. We will document the feedback given and forward to the relevant departments. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with
Resolution_Details: 03/23 HDM OM: The sailor stopped by to speak to a manager. HDM was called. The sailor brought some concerns to HDM`s attention. Generally, the customer service on board is not great. The sailor was not impressed by the service in the restaurants, bars. The LOLz comedian show had the same comedians and jokes during one voyage which the sailors find ridiculous. The sailor got a lot of miscommunication during his 2 B2B voyages. The basic package of WiFi is not working at all. The sailors are travel agents and will not advertised VV to their clients. HDM sympathized and apologized for any inconveniences that happened on board.  HDM informed that the feedback is valued and we definitely will take all the comments into consideration. HDM mentioned that as it is a Bimini evening , there is not much what we could do to improve their experience. HDM asked the sailor if there was anything that she could do for them. The sailors thanked for the offer, however, confirmed that there is nothing that the sailors need. The sailors thanked HDM for the time and listening. HDM sent a pair of brand VV rocks glasses to the sailor`s cabin as a gesture of a goodwill.

Description: HDA SB - 8:21PM 3/22- Sailor on SQ "Can someone give us an update on our room. Our shower has sewage back up into the bathroom and carpet. Maintenance came at 6pm today and cleaned. We checked back after dinner at 7:45 and there is a huge industrial fan in our room trying to dry the carpet. Was the carpet steam clean and deodorized? And how long does the fan have to stay in there?"
Latest_Comment: 3/23/2024.9.20pm. Carpet still damp wet and blower still running on .
Resolution_Details: 03/24 HDM OM: HDM spoke to the sailors and apologized for the inconvenience with the flood. The sailors were understanding. HDM notified the sailors that we are ready to offer them $200 p/p as a FVC for their next voyage with us. The sailors appreciated the gesture and gladly accepted it. As per SSD, this amount can be issued as a FVC.

Description: Tablet or TV Issue

03/23/24 8:58pm HDA BV / Sailor sent SQ notification: "I am sooooooo unhappy ?? with some of the services we have received here we have been told soooo many different things about booking reservations for dinner etc. The only reason I booked Virgin instead of carnival or my usual Royal Caribbean was because of the class I thought y’all had! We were in our room and the winds blew down a bar or something not safe we didn’t make a big fuss the app has been up and down since I booked and trying to book reservations in a timely manner but was unsuccessful but if you check your phone records of me calling trying to make me and my husband first anniversary special and it’s been nothing but people saying ohhhh if you get to the restaurant 30-45 min before you want to eat you can be seated because we have so many seats available for people with no reservations! If you look I kept calling saying it’s our anniversary and the one restaurant we really want to try was Gunbae and tomorrow is the last night and of course we’ve tried since we been on here and the rude person working tonight said ohhh we booked booked! Stressful because we’ve been told so many different things! " // HDA YM answer: "Ahoy Prisca, thanks for sharing your feedback. We’re sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. It was an uncommon instance and we’ll do better in the future, but I really appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. Your feedback helps us do better. We are looking into this issue and hope to resolve it promptly and accurately. Meanwhile Prisca anything else we can assist you with?" // Sailor answer: " Of course not our 1st year anniversary is tomorrow but I’ll definitely make sure I do an review several because we definitely wanted a nice anniversary and that’s why I kept calling so I’ll day would be special but maybe we didn’t spend enough money but the to maybe train the people at the restaurant that’s apparently under stress and not only me in the line but people in front of the line was treated unfriendly and unkind! We went straight to sailor services upon getting on the boat and asked about everything I had been calling about for weeks and was told the exact same thing about the restaurants 30-45min before but I digress because apparently you all were trained the same!"
Latest_Comment: ROM Eddie called sailors at 9.00am, apologized for the frustrating experience and arranged for them dinner in Gunbae at 8.15 with special anniversary celebration-bubble cake/champagne. Sailors appreciated follow up and the special dinner arrangement.
Resolution_Details: ROM Eddie called sailors at 9.00am, apologized for the frustrating experience and arranged for them dinner in Gunbae at 8.15 with special anniversary celebration-bubble cake/champagne. Sailors appreciated follow up and the special dinner arrangement.

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 1
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Well you wIt till 8am to let us know no BIMI, when we were expecting to get off the boat
So we gonna be in heavy wi ds, pour rain and thunderstorms at ssea?
In stead of docking?
NOT COOL
Latest_Comment:
Thank you so much for your patience and understanding. We’re sorry that we’ve had to change our planned itinerary.
We know you were looking forward to traveling to Bimini, however, the safety of our Sailors and Crew must come first.
Bimini Shore Things will be refunded to your onboard folio in the form of onboard credit, and any unused amount will be refunded to you in a cash
You will also receive a refund of the port taxes and fees in the amount of $45.15 to your onboard folio - any unused amount will be refunded by Sailor Services, on deck 5
If you have any questions or need any assistance with your voyage plans, please do not hesitate to reach out to our epic Sailor Services Crew by visiting them on Deck 5 or reaching out on the Sailor App.

Description:
Q: Welcome Sailor! How did you find coming aboard?, A: 1
Q: Cleanliness of the terminal?, A: 4
Q: Vibe at the terminal?, A: 4
Q: Check in process?, A: 4
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Couldn't dock at the main spot due to weather. But the captain can see the weather well ahead of time. We should have stayed in the keys to enjoy the beach and not be stuck on a ship getting sea sick.
Latest_Comment:
Ahoy Brook! Thank you for reaching out to us regarding your concerns about the current situation. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience or discomfort you may be experiencing due to the unexpected weather conditions.

We understand that the change in itinerary may not have been what you anticipated for your trip, and we regret any disappointment it has caused. Please know that the safety and well-being of our sailors are always our top priorities, and the decision to continue sailing despite the weather was made with these considerations in mind.

Regarding your request for compensation, we regret to inform you that, due to circumstances beyond our control, we are unable to offer complimentary couples massages or additional financial compensation at this time. We have already taken steps to refund applicable port fees and taxes.

We truly appreciate your understanding and patience during this challenging time. If there is anything else we can assist you with or if you have any further concerns, please do not hesitate to let us know.
Resolution_Details: 03/23 HDM OM: HDA thanked the sailor for the feedback, however there is no compensation for the port cancellation

The beds are very disappointing and the fact that on the coldest setting its still relatively warm in our room are the top reasons we haven't booked our next trip yet. it doesn't matter how amazing every other aspect of your trip is when you can't sleep well. It's a complaint I've seen a number of times in reviews, I'm just surprised that with quality of all the other aspect of our voyage that the beds feel so cheap. I would gladly have paid $300-$500 more for a decent bed, and I'm sure others would too.

Description:
RM SAM- PA-
Sailors were a walk in and we accepted them and advised that we can give them 2 tables of 2 next to each other which they agreed.
Sailors were sat and then demanded we clean a table that was next to them in a rude manner, My RS offered to get it clean and the gentleman responded by saying you told us NO already , whats your name i will complain about you to sailor services, , this comment came out of the blue and we believe the sailor  to be intoxicated,

Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Need more staff, need more bathrooms and trash cans throughout, change of plans was a disappointment but spa should honor prices for being in Bimini (not a sea day). First cruise for us, very hesitant to go on another one. Ship could use more direction and signs for restaurants/bars. More activities on sea days, more entertainment by the pool. Also could use more hot tubs. Not enough space to accommodate everyone. Leaving disappointed unfortunately
Resolution_Details: SSM Dane: Survey logged and closed.

Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Time to obtain food was to long. I was scheduled for 830 pm seating and didn't obtain my first dish until 9pm. I wasn't a fan of the mushroom appetizer, and the pea with egg was too salty. The scallop was amazing. The beef was good with the addition of the potatoe cake. My spouse didn't stay he left after the appetizer, because he wasn't a fan of the cold soup gazpacho, but I tried it and it was good. Test kitchen has a particular audience and I don't believe we are the target audience but. I'm one to try something once before I take it completely off the table.

Description: 03/23/2024 HDA JKG.I would like to report being threatened during the Dixie Krystals Cabaret show just now by a blonde woman who claims she works for Virgin Viyages.she repeatedly cursed at us, got in my husband’s face and repeatedly threatened and cursed him even though we asked her to walk away. She shot him a bird and screamed the F word and kept yelling in his face that she works for Virgin, is with Talent, and she would have us removed by security. You can view the security cameras, we did nothing to this woman! We weren’t even standing near her. She came to us! We do not feel safe so we came to our room but I felt this needed to be reported particularly since she repeatedly mentioned she worked for Virgin Voyages in Talent. I do have her photograph as well. HDA- I am sorry to hear of this terrible behavior. This is not acceptable especially from crew. I will inform security. They will reach out to you and would request that you make a statement in person. The security will check cameras. Please do share photographs and any details you may have so that i can add this to your report. It is the blonde woman in the orange dress. I had to get a photo after we had gotten away from her because I was afraid she was going to hit me if I took one when she was close. She said she knows Richard Branson and we are nobodies so she is allowed to do and say anything she wants and she can stand anywhere she wants. If she is a Virgin executive like she says, that does not reflect well on the company.The brunette woman in black is with her but she did not say or do anything. HDA -Thank you very much for sharing. Would you like to meet with security? Yes. My husband would like to. But we aren’t going to leave the room again tonight. Maybe she will sober up before tomorrow. What can I do now about the sailor loot and bar tab that I haven’t used. I am afraid to leave my room and we had planned to go shopping and to the casino?if security can call or come here he would be glad to speak with them. I am sorry you are in fear, This is not right or fair to you that this woman has made you feel this kind of way. Our security will take care of this if you are willing to meet and make a statement. Security will meet you in Sailor Services on deck 5 mid ship. They cannot meet in the cabin in this case. My husband said he will come down there now.He is down there now by the desk
Latest_Comment:
Suspect - Dorinda Medley 59 y/o 

from cabin 8198A
On March 23, 2024, at 22:55hrs, Sailor Services notified security about a complaint from a passenger in Cabin 10158A, named Noel, who reported verbal harassment by another passenger, subsequently identified as Suspect Dorinda Medley. Medley claimed to be a "Virgin Voyages Talent". Noel reported that she insulted him by stating he is a nobody and threatened that she could have him removed by security due to her alleged affiliation with Virgin Voyages.

For further details, please refer to SLSEC- 3575

•       SCP was explained and acknowledge by suspect Noel.
•       Statement obtained from the suspect Noel.
•       CCTV was checked.
•       Suspect passenger was identified.

Sailor Conduct meeting was conducted with Dorinda Medley 59 y/o from cabin 8198A with the SECO/SSM and SSD, Sailor acknowledged the event but the did version was different to that of the effected sailors, Sailor understood the procedure and provided her side of the story, Please see SLSEC- 3575 for further details
Resolution_Details: Please see SLSEC- 3575 for further details

Description: 3/23/24 HDA CANSU - Virgins poor planning is very disappointing. I am going to say it’s becusse if the infantile age of your cruise line. I called us missing Bimini days ago looking at the wind and weather forecast. You all as a cruise line should have done better. Putting the crew , and ship and guests at potential harms way is uncalled for. Never sail into a storm. And even if we could have docked in Bimini it would have been awful and flooded. So what is the point. You should have stayed off the coast of Cuba or more towards Mexico where there was a higher possibility of sunshine and better seas. Also so your crew didn’t have to scramble to get todays events going.I also hate that you could have planned better to not make an announcement and ask us up at 8 am in the room we come to sleep and not be disturbed. If I wanted to be disturbed I would have traveled with my children. Wake us up in the room at 8 am. You could have avoided this. Poor poor planning on virgins part. I don’t care it’s a sea day. I know why you couldn’t dock and understand it. But you could have planned and prepared better ahead of time. Disney even send their guests notice days before warning they will most likely not be docking at castaway. I guess that is what comes with experience. No shows during the day. Just places to spend more money. Shops and casino. And no sports area to watch basketball that isn’t in a echoing hall and crowded with trivia. It’s hard to find a lounge to sit and enjoy music with out of being 1000 decibels. And why why wake us up for this dreary day. It could have been handled last night!!
Resolution_Details: 3/23/24 HDA CANSU - Itinerary changed from Bimini Port to Sea Day due to bad weather. Vlog opened for survey reasons.

Description: 3/23/24 HDA ACNSU - Sailor sent message through SQ: Who do I speak with to get a partial refund due to us not being able to dock at the Bahamas. The whole point of this cruise is the Bahamas and now we don’t get it plus we’re stuck at sea for another full day. That is not sufficient. Description:
Q: How was your bar experience?, A: 3
Q: Menu choices?, A: 5
Q: Vibe of the bar?, A: 5
Q: Service?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: We eventually went and grabbed our own drinks from the bar.
Resolution_Details: Ahoy sailor, we have tried to reach out to you regarding your feedback on our onboard survey. We thank you for bringing a shortfall in service in The Dock to our attention and we will address this to our team there. We have refunded the drinks you purchased in The Dock as a gesture of goodwill and our apologies for falling short of your expectations. Description: Bees Knees was a bit heavy on ice and not as much drink as we’ve experienced on Valiant Lady.
Resolution_Details: Ahoy sailor, we thank you very much for your feedback on our onboard survey regarding the Bee's Knees drink you had in The Dock. We will ensure that our mixologists follow up on this to ensure we are making our drinks consistently not just on this ship but also across our fleet. We apologize that we have fallen short of your expectations on this occasion and as a gesture of goodwill we have removed the charge for these drinks. If you wish to discuss this matter further please reach out to the beverage management team or myself via our Sailor Services Help Desk on d5 or call 0 from any ship phone. Regards, Conor O'Malley, Beverage Operations Manager.

The sailor appreciated a follow up and thanked for the gesture. The email to the restaurant team was sent.

Description: 03/25/24 @9:00 HDa Barbara: Sailor sent message "Hi, I don’t want the full voyage internet but that was the only way to get even basic messaging working. Can I have that removed from my charges and just have regular internet working?"
Latest_Comment: 03/25/24 @9:00 HDa Barbara: HDa explained to sailor that we can cancel the Wifi but it will drop the Premium, only basic package will work. HDa explained what that entails and informed sailor to reach out to SS on Deck5 for assistance if it doesn't work.  "If you don't want to Premium wifi and you purchased it accidentally, we can help you cancel the package and restore the Basic wifi on the phone. We can help with the settings for the Basic wifi, to make sure that it runs well. However please keep in mind, that the basic package is only for basic services. It works fine for wifi based messaging like what's app, messenger, emails." Sailor agreed. "Yeah, that would be great! I don’t want to stream any media on this cruise, I just want to be able to message the people I’m on board with, which wasn’t working before"
Resolution_Details: 03/25 HDM OM: The package is refunded

Description: 03/26/2024 HDA JKG. Sailor lost luggage via the airline. Luggage kit etc sent and comp laundry applied.

Cancelled Chicen Itza tour sailors - Sailors came back by ferry at there own expense, $30, also no food provided as they did not get to the venue where lunch is provided so they had a choice to wait till 630 to come back with the ferry (by that time they would be starving) or come back with a ferry at there own expense 
Tour guide didn’t give much info, only when sailors asked did they give information 
Sailors have already been refunded in full but may ask for additional compensation
Latest_Comment:
On  03/28/2024 at 11am sailor Jason in 15331Z informed MRSA Allan how they were deeply disappointed in the cancellation of their excursion.
Sailor mentioned how their tour had been canceled mid-way into it. Mr Jason did acknowledge the refund that had been applied but noted that the tour operator did not seem to care about their situation.
Sailor said the tour didn't make them feel as VIPs as they had to arrange their own lunch and transport back to the ship.

MRSA apologized for the unfortunate experience and assured the sailor that the issue would be escalated with Shore Things team
Resolution_Details: 03/27/24 ASTM Tobyn: 30 sailors attended "Chichén Itzá's Ancient Wonders" tour yesterday in Cozumel could not do their excursion because because of unforceen taxi strikes that happened in Playa Del Carmen causing the bus not to continue to tour location. All of these sailors have been fully refunded for their tour. Addition to that these sailor had to pay for a ferry from Play Del Cramen back to the ship at their own expense. $12 onboard credit will be applied by the onboard accounting team. Tour Operator advised that 200 Mexican Pecos is the cost for a one way return ticket (not a round trip) back to Cozumel. hence why $12 each will be applied to sailor accounts. Please see the manifest attached of the 30 sailors . The names are received from the Tour Operator from all waivers signed by the sailor who were all in this specific bus.

Description: March 26th at 17:15 RSM received a call from MRSA informing Sailor Donna was in the medical center as she was not feeling well. RSM with SSD went to see the Sailor and spoke with her. Sailor said she is fine and should be released after two hours. RSM asked if her travel companions knew she was there and she confirmed. Sailor opted to stay onboard and not disembark to attend to a hospital. RSM spoke with Juan and Diana in person to inform he had visited Donna, they were appreciative for the follow up.
Latest_Comment: March 28th at 10:45 Sailors were by the forward elevators on the way to the medical center and enagaged in a conversation with crew, as Sailors mentioned they were going to deck 4 and forward gangway was closed, the crew oriented the Sailors to go to midship. However, the Sailors were going to the medical center and were frustrated they were sent to the wrong place. SSM met with the Sailors and escorted them to the medical. The crew met with the Sailors and extended apologies explaining it was understood they were going ashore.
Resolution_Details: March 28th at 10:45 Sailors were by the forward elevators on the way to the medical center and enagaged in a conversation with crew, as Sailors mentioned they were going to deck 4 and forward gangway was closed, the crew oriented the Sailors to go to midship. However, the Sailors were going to the medical center and were frustrated they were sent to the wrong place. SSM met with the Sailors and escorted them to the medical. The crew met with the Sailors and extended apologies explaining it was understood they were going ashore. Nothing further.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 3
Q: Friendliness of the crew?, A: 5
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 3
Q: Menu choices?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Gede was an excellent server! But we didn't enjoy the food here.  I had the fried chicken sandwich which was very dry and the black bun was too hard to enjoy. The fries, churrros with the strawberry sauce and Yass Queen cocktail were great.  My husband had eggs,potatoes and impossible sausage.  His egg was not cooked to medium as requested and the side of bacon was alright.  He expected it to be smoky but it was sweet.  He had the cheesecake which was decent. I would come back here only for the churrros and bottomless Yasss Queen!
Resolution_Details: RM MB called his room to apologized for the inconvenience, Sailor stated that the Food quality is not up to his expectations,RM MB apologized again and invited to try any time the churros, Sailor appreciate it and said will take a consideration thru his voyage, and thanked for the follow up

Description: 3/26/2024 At 7:45pm, a sailor reported that the carpet in front of the bathroom door was wet. Upon inspection by DM and CH, a wet carpet measuring approximately 10 square cm was found in the cabin. Further investigation revealed that the AC drain was not draining, resulting in water overflowing onto the floor. The water was extracted from the technical space and carpet. AIMS was created for HVAC #SCL1240012932, and SS was informed. The sailor declined to have a blower placed in the cabin as they wished to stay there.
Latest_Comment: 3/27/24 10am Cabin was checked, the carpet got better, no more leaks and no more water in the technical space.
Resolution_Details: issue resolved,carpet dry

Description:
03/26 HDM OM: Ahoy team,

The sailor Andrea Meckes is currently sailing on SCL. She approached the desk and requested to speak to a manager. As per her, back in September she was incorrectly advised by a customer service representative via the phone to cancel her voyage and claim with the AON afterwards. The flight was cancelled due to the bad weather, so the sailor could not make it to Barcelona. The sailor is requesting to have an onboard credit as a compensation for her experience.
Latest_Comment: "You may give the sailor 150 gsl for inconvenience and to minimize tensions with the sailor however, we will be denying the entire compensation at this time." - HDM called the sailor, no reply
Resolution_Details: 03/28 HDM OM: The sailor approached the desk to get a follow up. HDM informed the sailor that the shoreside team is not looking into any kind of compensation or refund of the voyage that was cancelled. However, HDM empathized that the sailor is going through some inconveniences and offered a $150 SL to be applied as a gesture of goodwill.  The sailor accepted the loot, however mentioned that she is going through a hell with VV and will never come back to sail with us again, because we scammed her. The sailor requested to have a contact number of the person higher than HDM to speak about compensation. HDM printed a solutions letter

Description:
Please be advised of the following incident/accident that occured on tour: 
Sailor name: Gregory Bloom
Sailor age: 53
Cabin: 11122A
Tour Name: Adventure Time at Xcaret's Xplor Park
Tour Operator: Aviomar 
Port of Call: Cozumel
UPDATE 1: As per the tour operator, sailor Gregory (cabin 11122A), allegedly had an epileptic while waiting for the ferry to depart back to Cozumel after his tour. Sailor is being transported to a local hospital, in Playa Del Carmen. 
As per tour operator, sailor is currently being tended to at Hospital Costamed - Carretera Federal 305 de cuota Mz 285 LT 7. Col ejido sur 77712, Playa del carmen.
Latest_Comment: UPDATE 3: Our Care Team Representative, Darwin Josue Argueta Alvarez, has disembarked and will be escorted by an Aviomar operator to the ferry terminal for transit to the hospital in Playa Del Carmen. Paula Andrea Zapata, our Care Team Manager, will assist Darwin with communication and ensure the well-being of the sailors.
Resolution_Details:
Care team was activated, Items signed over to care team individual. All signed for and cross checked.
Please see signed handwritten log attached in the images

Description:
Following happened in WTP room today 03/25/2024:
An incorrect ruling has been made today during a hand in our $120 "Vegas Baby" poker tournament and the affected player (Sammy Fairchild) was very upset about it, suggesting the entire tournament outcome was altered by the ruling. After the ruling, Sailor immediately said “that’s wrong”. He then got up and scanned WTP QR code we have for the TDA rules and began to look through the rules. Sailor then came up to the desk showing a google result for a rule that does not apply and said “See, I told you that you were wrong, you don’t know the rules”. 
After he was eliminated from the tournament, Sailor came over to the WTP room manager who tried to offer an explanation to him, took full ownership of the issue and apologized to him. Sailor proceeded to be nasty, and the WTP manager tried to defuse the situation, but the Sailor didn’t care and was intent on being loud and badgering the WTP manager for being wrong.
During his complaint to the WTP manager he said he was intent on leaving a bad review and wanted contact info of the person in charge.
Latest_Comment: The incident has been brought to the attention of the Casino Manager (supporting and supervising the WTP room).
Resolution_Details: Casino is taking ownership of the issue by sending an apology bottle of wine to his dinner reservation. Free Play worth of $120 (tournament fee) will be offered to Mr. Fairchild.

Description: 03/27/2024 HDA JKG. Sailors went on the snorkeling excursion yesterday and wanted to share that they had a great time, however there was a guy who worked for the cmpany who was passing comments and being creepy and weird. He was following them around and telling them to take off their life jackets he was grabbing them and touching them in the water, pushing them down. They were very unfomfertable. The girls felt that if they were not a as great of swimmers they would have struggled because this man was pushing them down into the water. This was a mexian man described to be in his fourtys. The girls were infear that there was a possibility that somethings would happen to them. HDA asked the sailors was this visibale to other sailors, The girls said the sailors saw but nobody reached out to assist, defend or protect. Only after the excuriosn some sailors mentioned how wierd the operators behaviour was but still failed to help. They girls were old  enough to be the daughter of the man who was oraying on them and the sailors.
Latest_Comment:
03/28/24 ASTM Tobyn: Response from TO" Dear Tobyn,

We have questioned all parties involved from our side and from our point of view this could be a misunderstanding, 

The crew member that the sailors refer to is very helpful and he and the whole crew try and help ALL guest to done and remove the snorkel gear and hard life vests to avoid guests stepping or getting tangled on the straps,

While in the water, sometimes crew and guides pull guests from the hard vest since as you probably know, snorkel takes place in a high current environment and guests drift from the boat's ladder, but they always grab the vest and not the guests to prevent any misunderstandings,

Yesterday no one from our team received any complaint from the sailors in question, in fact, please see attached the comment form they left behind,

We understand and appreciate the sailors feedback and see how this actions could have been taken the wrong way, so we will have a refresher talk with all our team to emphasize the importance of making clear that their actions are directed to help the guests and to ask for permission at all times before they offer help to the guests either in or out of the water,

As for the refund, we will still maintain the offering, since one of our goals, after safety, is the sailors satisfaction,

Should you have any other question or concern regarding this matter, please let us know,'
Resolution_Details: 03/28/24 ASTM Tobyn: Sailors have been refunded in full to their onboard account

Description: Sailors Carol Costanza and Jennifer Merritt from cabin 12202Z approcahed to our desk to give us their opinion according to their Chichén Itzá's Ancient Wonders tour on which they went. They are aware of the transport time but when they went to explore the ruins the guide took them through the middle of many shops to buy souvenirs. They said that they had only one hour to explore the ruins, but most of the time they spent in the shops and they paid that money to see the Ruins, not to go shopping. They also wanted to add that when they booked the tour was at 10:30 am and they did not think we would change the time when they could take advantage of that time exploring the ruins.
Latest_Comment: The tour operator responded to our email and confirmed that they did not receive any negative comments from any sailors on the excursion. We have applied a 20% discount on each excursion as a gesture of goodwill. Sailors are happy.
Resolution_Details: The tour operator responded to our email and confirmed that they did not receive any negative comments from any sailors on the excursion. We have applied a 20% discount on each excursion as a gesture of goodwill.

Description: 03/27/2024 HDA JKG. Sailors went to the galley for lunch and ordered 2 burgers and fries quickly and swiftly. They were first in the que when the server behind the counter asked for their order she turned around abruptly and said "what do you want" The sailor Was shocked and placed the order. Once the meal had been prepared and placed on the counter the sailor went to grab the burgers and the chef behind the counter responded abruptly and rudely with "no, that is not for you" The sailors that were in the que after them were being served before them. The sailor feels discriminated against as the sailors after them were white and being treated better than they were. HDA apologized profusely and informed the sailors this will be forwarded to Restaurant leaders and they will reach out. HDA thanked the sailors for remaining kind and respectful in the moment of feeling disrespected and unfairly treated.
Latest_Comment: Quick Service Manager Hamed contacted HDA Julia Khanyisile to arrange a meeting with Sailor to give an ear and assist. We will follow up and ensure the recovery..
Resolution_Details: RM Bruno got in touch with Sailors to hear and assisted. Sailors appreciate the follow up stating that everything was great it was just a concern that they felt sharing. Sailors experience will be monitored till the end of the voyage.

Description:
The sailor arrived at Extra Virgin Restaurant seeking accommodation, addressing the Restaurant Supervisor. However, due to the bustling evening, the supervisor could only offer a seat at the bar counter, as it was the only available option at the time. The sailor insisted on a regular table immediately.

The Restaurant Manager intervened, explaining that all regular tables were fully booked but the sailor could return at 9:00 PM or accept a high-top table for the moment. In response, the sailor began to shout profanities (f+++) at the Manager, expressing frustration over losing $10,000 at the casino, mentioning a diabetic medical condition and a waiting time of over 30minutes in Gunbae restaurant. 

Despite the sailor's outburst, the Manager calmly asked him to watch his language and find a solution. After venting his frustrations, the sailor suddenly left, leaving the situation unresolved.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 1
Q: Menu choices?, A: 1
Q: Knowledge of the crew?, A: 1
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 1
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: Staff made me wait for over 20 minutes for others to show up without serving me anything. After that Extra Virgin staff told me they didn’t have any space for one person although they had multiple empty seats! Truly ridiculous
Resolution_Details: ROM Eddie approached sailor in SS, sat down with him, listen to his feedback and emphasized. Sailor was questioning the Gunbae dining concept and the fact he was left waiting for others to join his table since he is a single traveler. ROM Eddie explained the sailor how dining in Gunbae works despite the sailor saying he knows it all as he was with us four times already. During conversation sailor mentioned several times that he is from Jordan and not used to being treated in such a way (referring to negative answers regarding seating). Sailor then mentioned the issue with seating availability in Extra Virgin and that he was only offered seat on bar counter or high table which he didn't want. ROM Eddie offered to arrange dining in one of the venues and offered sailor to wait in comfort in one of the loungers while this will be sorted. Sailor chose to wait in the casino. ROM arranged table in the Wake (where sailor was original booked but gave up his booking to another couple at the door, just before he was being shown to his table!), went to casino to escort sailor to The Wake. During the whole time sailor was calm and understanding apart the initial opening conversation when he wanted his frustrations. Sailor appreciated the resolution of his issue.

The Assistant Manager also assured the sailor that issue has been addressed accordingly with the dealer, also assured him that it will never happen again. The discussion ended in a positive manner.
Resolution_Details: Apology and empathy extended to the sailor as per previous follow-up notes.

Description:
Q: How was your dining experience?, A: 2
Q: Quality of the drinks?, A: 3
Q: Vibe of the restaurant?, A: 3
Q: Quality of the food?, A: 2
Q: Not finished? Tell us everything!, A: This is my second time sailing with Virgin, Scarlett Lady. The food is too exotic, doesn't have to be that exotic. It was generally bland as well. Not just in the Galley but everywhere. 

Secondly, this ship is full of varied age groups. Why do you play music only directed toward 20 somethings? It ridiculous amount of rap and club music. Some of us want classics and 80s, 90s, country and pop. 

I was also disappointed in how many activities were booked up and unavailable. 

Finally, it feel like the food is overly filling somehow. I'd eat a very small
Meal but feel like I just ate Thanksgiving dinner. It made me feel like there was a filler in the food or something. I rarely drink anymore, the drinks seem watered down, like a very low percentage of alcohol in them. 

Finally, why do you close all the bars down? There are areas of the boat that we would want to hang out in and my husband would have to go on a search to find a bar for beer several stories down. 

I don't know, it didn't feel like the same cruise second time around. 

Thank you for the NO single use plastic, very much appreciate that and wish everyone operated that way.
Latest_Comment:
RM sam-PA
Survey came on last day, unable to find sailor due to disembarking

Description: March 28th at 18:30 MRSA asked for RSM to speak with the Sailors as they were dissatisfied by the outcome of the incident they had in Cozumel (March 26th) due to a car accident in Playa Del Carmen, they couldn't make it to their excursion. The excursion amount had been refunded and the approved amount for the ferry ticket back as well ($17). However, the Sailors were claiming another ticket for $1.284.04 Mexican Pesos for the lunch they had. RSM spoke with the Sailors and as per their words the refunds posted didn't cover even for the tickets of the ferry, RSM informed we approved a refund for all Sailors who were affected by the incident and posted the standard ticket amount to their accounts. However, in the case they had paid a highter ticket for the ferry, RSM would double check and honour that amount. Sailors never mentioned anything about lunch and thanked for the follow up.
Resolution_Details: RSM asked MRSA for the picture of the tickets, however, there was one ticket for $1.284.04 in Mexican Pesos for lunch and another for $33 for taxes. There was no proof of the ferry ticket being higher than $17 per person, so there is no refund due. RSM called MRSA and he explained that the Sailors were claiming a refund for lunch, however, the excursion included lunch and this amount has been refunded to them already ($180 dollars).

Description:
Q: How would you rate the overall Virgin Voyages Experience so far?, A: 2
Q: Tell us everything!, A: Our first virgin was a much more positive experience. We have had multiple circumstances where our account declined and where publicly told it was due to our card declining when was that was the case. Our bed was turned down to a couch when we did not request this. When we asked why this happened the staff member was adamant we made this request via the app. At the spa, when I checked in, I was never offer a robe or to check in my bag or to change and when I asked I was I told I declined however I was just told to wait. While we absolutely loved our first cruise and wanted to make Virgin our cruise line of choice we see reconsidering this now. Overall the staff has been very pleasant and the food has been great however we are very surprised by the multiple issues we have had.
Latest_Comment: Ahoy Quinn! Good morning. We received your feedback. We are so sorry to hear that you had some rough seas during your staying with us this time. Rest assured, your comments are valued and will be forwarded to the relevant departments. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Resolution_Details: 03/28 HDM OM: HDM sent a message to the sailor apologizing for their experience.

There’s an awful dealer, Nilam I think, in the casino that told the pit boss that I gave her the middle finger out of nowhere tonight. It was so ridiculous that every single other patron asked what the hell the entire spectacle was about. The dealer told me “they’ll review the footage,” which is great because I’ve never given the middle finger to anyone. It absolutely ruined my night since that’s just not who I am." / HDA Answer: Ahoy Timothy, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We do apologize for the attitude of our crew, definitely it's not the way we show our rock star service. Be assured this will be shared with the Casino management to follow up properly and take action accordingly."
Latest_Comment:
The concern of unpleasant sailor on BJ01 came to the attention of Casino Management from Nilam Shirke, dealer assigned to the mentioned table. Nilam states that Sailor (when losing) was making comments such as “it is your fault” or “you are taking my kids money” "you are horrible dealer" ending up by showing her a middle finger.
Casino management reviewed the CCTV footage, seeing that Sailor made a certain hand gesture which could not be precisely specified as a middle finger, but it may be perceived as such. 
During the time of checking CCTV footage and listening the concern of Nilam, sailor departed from the Casino.
Resolution_Details: Since Casino management did not have a chance to approach Mr. Donlan immediately, there will be an attempt to do so tomorrow upon opening the Casino for business.

Description: 03/29/2024 - 10:00 am - HDA Rone -Sailor came to Sailor Services and advised that they are now sick with Diarrhea due to the lack of cleanliness on the ship. She advised that multiple times she has gone to the restrooms and there has been no soap or sanitizer in the posts. She advised that she has contacted SS on many occasions and wants to know what we are doing. I apologized and advised that we did request assistance with this. I asked the Sailor if we can offer medical assistance and she refused as she will run late then.  She advised that she wanted to speak to a manager.  I came out and advised that the manager is on the way and I again asked if she would like medical assistance. She advised that she wants it.
Latest_Comment: AEHK DM : AEHK was called to speak with the sailor about the dispenser situation. Sailor mentioned that she called multiples times but we only find one request in the chat that was addressed on the spot, our dispenser are all refilled with soap and constantly are checked by PAM and AEHK. For the correct use of the dispenser is by leaving the hand under the sensor for at least 30 seconds. For comfort of the sailor PAM check the dispenser and they are all working properly all the restroom had enough toilet paper. Sailor also mentioned that during the night the casino restrooms looks like they were not checking constantly. PAM night had no comments from any sailor that the restrooms on the casino are were not up to standard or with lack of supervision.
Resolution_Details: 03/29 HDM OM: The sailor was given thee contact number of office to take it further with them.

Description: 03/29/24 @10:15 HDA Barbara: Sailor Samara came to SS saying she bought three jewelry yesterday in the shops. She put them in her purse and was walking in the public area when she opened her purse again, one of the rings were missing.
Latest_Comment: 03/29/24 @10:15 HDA Barbara: HDA checked L&F but no ring was returned. Sailor would like to check the cameras and talk to security. HDA called security. HDA gave cabin information and purchase information. The rung cost 103$ was bought on 03/28 @10:23PM from the Resort shop Deck7. Security came to take her report.
Resolution_Details: 03/29/24 @10:15 HDA Barbara: For documentation purposes

Description: 03/29/2024/ HDa IRINA/ Sailors approached SS for checking out process. As per them they were told at the restaurant that Treat yourself meal would be taken from Bar Tab.
Latest_Comment: RM Carmina spoke to the Server and mentioned that he never talked about the Bar Tab with the sailors. Sailors was informed that they will be charged. RM Carmina tried to speak with them however they left for the disembarkation. All servers was aware as well about the inclusions in each package.
Resolution_Details: 03/29 HDM OM: The sailor disembarked

Description: Please, I need to sleep, I work tomorrow, this music is WAY too loud!!!!! I couldn’t sleep at all!!! NO REST !!!Every single night !!! On deck 7 !!!!!Please refund me ! This is unacceptable!!!!! I tried my best to be positive, But be respectful !!! Take this party to a night club!!!! " HDA Called cabin right away after the messages and apologized from Sailor and offered a new cabin for sleeping purposes. Sailor refused to move due to have an early debarkation. And Sailor told that she will be fight for her rights until she refunded for the cruise. Sailor mentioned that this was her first cruise and she was not able to sleep in whole voyage during nights, she tried her best to be positive. Sailor was so upset and told that today was her birthday, and she paid a lot of money for this cruise over her budget. HDA apologized from the Sailor and Sailor tanked for quick call for HDA's attentions & her kindness.
Latest_Comment: 3/29/24 HDA CANSU - HDA sent message to Sailor: "Ahoy Christiane, this is Jansu here from sailor Services, the lady on the phone with you. Please accept our sincerely apologies for the experience you had in your cabin. We understand that how this cruise is important for you, and would like to make sure we serve you as you deserved. If you would like to sleep in a new cabin, let us know please. I will send the letter to your cabin now. Have a good night ahead.
Resolution_Details: Since Sailor refused to move, HDA offered to send Solutions Letter to Sailor cabin. Sailor asked the informations of Shore Side team due to Sailor claimed that Virgin arranged the cabin for her and she did not picked the cabin specifically Solution letter sent to cabin. .
